original: shar gyi sgo yi steng dang gzhan du yang ni nges par 'gyur te gnyis po dag gi shing rta yang //
analyzed: shar gyi sgo yi steng dang gzhan du yang ni nges par 'gyur te gnyis po dag gi shing rta yang //
translated: U·π£·πáƒ´·π£a and MahƒÅcƒÅragƒÅ, are in the eastern door, and are in the chariot.

original: gsung las skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni nor gyi phyogs su 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi gdan du 'gyur //
analyzed: gsung las skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni nor gyi phyogs su 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi gdan du 'gyur //
translated: In the ma·πá·∏çala born from speech, in the direction of wealth, are the seats of the beings born from the elements.

original: shar du tsa mund'i dang dbang por 'gyur te rtse mo can du khyab 'jug ma dang rig byed gdong //
analyzed: shar du tsa mund'i dang dbang por 'gyur te rtse mo can du khyab 'jug ma dang rig byed gdong //
translated: In the east, Ca·πá·∏çƒ´, and in the northeast, are the seats of Indra. In the southeast, Vi·π£·πáu, and in the southwest, are the seats of BrahmƒÅ.

original: gshin rje phag mo drag por 'gyur te lha min bdag por gdong drug ma dang bgegs kyi mgon po 'o //
analyzed: gshin rje phag mo drag por 'gyur te lha min bdag por gdong drug ma dang bgegs kyi mgon po 'o //
translated: In the south, Yama becomes Rudra, and the lord of the asuras becomes Kshƒìma.

original: nub tu @120b dbang mo bden bral du 'gyur rlung du nges par dus kyi gdod ma dag ni khyab 'jug nyid //
analyzed: nub tu @120b dbang mo bden bral du 'gyur rlung du nges par dus kyi gdod ma dag ni khyab 'jug nyid //
translated: In the west, Indra becomes Varuna, and in the wind direction, Time becomes Vishnu.

original: gnod sbyin du ni drag mo gshin rjer 'gyur te phyugs kyi bdag por dpal mo nyid dang gdong drug pa //
analyzed: gnod sbyin du ni drag mo gshin rjer 'gyur te phyugs kyi bdag por dpal mo nyid dang gdong drug pa //
translated: In the northeast, Rudra becomes Yama, and the lord of cattle becomes Shri.

original: phyi rol gyi ni dbang po'i sgo yi g-yas su lha min bdag dang de yi phyag rgya srin mor 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi ni dbang po'i sgo yi g-yas su lha min bdag dang de yi phyag rgya srin mor 'gyur //
translated: To the right of the outer door of the senses is the lord of the asuras and his consort, Rakshasi.

original: mer ni rlung dang rab gtum ma ste me dang chu lha mo yang lho yi sgo yi g-yas su 'o //
analyzed: mer ni rlung dang rab gtum ma ste me dang chu lha mo yang lho yi sgo yi g-yas su 'o //
translated: In the southeast is Vayu and Ca·πá·∏çƒ´, and in the southwest is Agni and Varu·πáa.

original: lha min bdag por dpal ldan gdong drug pa dang dpal mor 'gyur te nub tu dbang po rlung lha yi //
analyzed: lha min bdag por dpal ldan gdong drug pa dang dpal mor 'gyur te nub tu dbang po rlung lha yi //
translated: To the right of the southern door is the lord of the asuras, the glorious Kshƒìma, and in the west is Indra and Vayu.

original: rlung du tshangs pa dang ni glog mar 'gyur te nor sbyin du yang rgya mtsho dang ni phag mo 'o //
analyzed: rlung du tshangs pa dang ni glog mar 'gyur te nor sbyin du yang rgya mtsho dang ni phag mo 'o //
translated: In the northwest is Brahma and CƒÅmu·πá·∏çƒÅ, and in the north is Kubera and VƒÅrƒÅhƒ´.

original: dbang ldan du ni tshogs kyi dbang po gzhon nu ma ste nor sbyin gshin rje'i sgo yi g-yon gyi char //
analyzed: dbang ldan du ni tshogs kyi dbang po gzhon nu ma ste nor sbyin gshin rje'i sgo yi g-yon gyi char //
translated: In the northeast is the youthful lord of the assembly, i.e. Kubera, the door of Yama, the giver of wealth, in the northern quarter.

original: drag po dus te khyab 'jug dang ni nor sbyin zhes pa lho dang nub kyi sgo yi g-yon du'o //
analyzed: drag po dus te khyab 'jug dang ni nor sbyin zhes pa lho dang nub kyi sgo yi g-yon du'o //
translated: In the southeast is Rudra, i.e. Visnu, and in the southwest is Kubera, the giver of wealth, in the southern and western quarters.

original: de dag rnams kyi phyag rgyar rab grags ri sras gshin rje ma dang dpal mo nor gyi dbang mor 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi phyag rgyar rab grags ri sras gshin rje ma dang dpal mo nor gyi dbang mor 'gyur //
translated: These are the well-known seals of those, i.e. Yama, Sri, and Kubera, the lord of wealth.

original: phyi rol du ni lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin nub kyi kha khyer dag la klu rnams mtha' dag ste //
analyzed: phyi rol du ni lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin nub kyi kha khyer dag la klu rnams mtha' dag ste //
translated: Outside are the gods, Yama, and Kubera, on the western ledge, and all the Nagas.

original: padma dang ni stobs kyi rgyu dag g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong ni //
analyzed: padma dang ni stobs kyi rgyu dag g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong ni //
translated: Padma and Takshaka are on the moving mandala, Vaisvanara and Sankhapala are on the fire,

original: me la gnas pa dag ste chu yi steng du rigs ldan mtha' yas klur ni rab tu grags par 'gyur //
analyzed: me la gnas pa dag ste chu yi steng du rigs ldan mtha' yas klur ni rab tu grags par 'gyur //
translated: and Kulika and Ananta are well-known as Nagas on the water.

original: de bzhin sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas rigs kyi dbang gis 'jog po dang ni padma chen por 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas rigs kyi dbang gis 'jog po dang ni padma chen por 'gyur //
translated: And likewise, on the mandala of the earth, are Elapatra and Mahapadma, according to the families.

original: de rnams shes rab rab gtum ma rnams dur khrod sa la gnas pa khyi gdong ma la sogs pa ste //
analyzed: de rnams shes rab rab gtum ma rnams dur khrod sa la gnas pa khyi gdong ma la sogs pa ste //
translated: Those are the wisdoms, the fierce ones, residing in the charnel grounds, the dog-faced and so forth.

original: de rnams thabs ni padma la sogs gzhan gyi @121a *//
analyzed: de rnams thabs ni padma la sogs gzhan gyi @121a *//
translated: Those are the methods, the lotus and so forth, by the power of the other families.

original: rigs kyi dbang gis bde ba dam pa'i don du 'gyur //
analyzed: rigs kyi dbang gis bde ba dam pa'i don du 'gyur //
translated: They become the supreme bliss in reality.üîΩIn the eastern wheel, in the charnel ground of the piercing with the peak, is the dog-faced one, residing in the mandala of movement.

original: shar gyi 'khor lor rtse mos 'bigs pa'i dur khrod du ni g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas khyi gdong ma; ;gshin rje dag tu nges par ro ni sreg par phag gi gdong ma byang du rul pa dang bcas par //
analyzed: shar gyi 'khor lor rtse mos 'bigs pa'i dur khrod du ni g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas khyi gdong ma; ;gshin rje dag tu nges par ro ni sreg par phag gi gdong ma byang du rul pa dang bcas par //
translated: In the charnel ground of the dead bodies, the pig-faced one is definitely burning the corpses. In the north, in the charnel ground of the putrid, is the tiger-faced one.

original: stag gdong ma ste chu ru rnag gi drir ni de bzhin nyid du lce spyang dag gi gdong mar 'gyur /
analyzed: stag gdong ma ste chu ru rnag gi drir ni de bzhin nyid du lce spyang dag gi gdong mar 'gyur /
translated: In the charnel ground of the water, in the smell of pus, is the jackal-faced one, just as it is.

original: me dang lha min bdag por lhag ma dang ni mi bzad g-yul du bya rog gdong ma bya rgod bcas //
analyzed: me dang lha min bdag por lhag ma dang ni mi bzad g-yul du bya rog gdong ma bya rgod bcas //
translated: In the charnel ground of the fire, in the abode of the demigods, is the crow-faced one, together with the vulture, in the battle of the unbearable.

original: rlung du sbrul gyis zos par mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong ma dbang ldan du yang byis pa shi bar ni; ;'khor lo la gnas 'ug gdong ma ste sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag kyang bsgom par bya //
analyzed: rlung du sbrul gyis zos par mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong ma dbang ldan du yang byis pa shi bar ni; ;'khor lo la gnas 'ug gdong ma ste sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas zla nyi dag kyang bsgom par bya //
translated: In the wind quarter, the snake-eating ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´, in the northeast, the child-killing owl-faced one, who is on the wheel, and also the moon and sun, which are on the earth mandala, should be visualized.

original: g-yon brkyang ba ni yum gyir 'gyur te mnyam pa'i stabs ni 'dab ma dag gi lha mo'i tshogs kyi'o //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang ba ni yum gyir 'gyur te mnyam pa'i stabs ni 'dab ma dag gi lha mo'i tshogs kyi'o //
translated: The left-foot-extended posture is for the mother, and the equal-footed posture is for the host of goddesses on the petals.

original: bcu dang nor gyi tshogs dag gi ni g-yon brkyang sa ga lha min mo rnams kyi yang zlum pa'o //
analyzed: bcu dang nor gyi tshogs dag gi ni g-yon brkyang sa ga lha min mo rnams kyi yang zlum pa'o //
translated: The left-foot-extended posture is for the ten and the host of wealth goddesses, and the round posture is for the demonesses.

original: g-yon brkyang dag la gnas pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa g-yas brkyang stabs su nges par 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang dag la gnas pa rnams kyi snyoms par 'jug pa g-yas brkyang stabs su nges par 'gyur ba ste //
translated: The equipoise of those in the left-foot-extended posture is definitely in the right-foot-extended posture.

original: sa ga la ni sa ga nyid ces bya bar 'gyur zhing nges par zlum po la yang zlum po'o //
analyzed: sa ga la ni sa ga nyid ces bya bar 'gyur zhing nges par zlum po la yang zlum po'o //
translated: The left-foot-extended posture is called the left-foot-extended posture, and the round posture is called the round posture.

original: dkyil 'khor du yang lhag ma'i lha rnams rab tu gsal zhing nges par rdo rje gdan gyis gnas pa ste //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du yang lhag ma'i lha rnams rab tu gsal zhing nges par rdo rje gdan gyis gnas pa ste //
translated: Also, the remaining deities in the ma·πá·∏çala are clearly in the vajra-throne posture.

original: rang rigs phyogs gnas lha mo rnams ni rang rang padma zla ba'i steng du padma'i gdan gyis gnas //üîΩgdengs can rigs dang bcas pa rang rang @121b phyogs kyi gzhom par gnas pa'i lha rnams rdo rje gdan gyis gnas //
analyzed: rang rigs phyogs gnas lha mo rnams ni rang rang padma zla ba'i steng du padma'i gdan gyis gnas // gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa rang rang @121b phyogs kyi gzhom par gnas pa'i lha rnams rdo rje gdan gyis gnas //
translated: The goddesses of one's own caste stand on their own lotuses and moons, on seats of lotuses.üîΩThe Nagas and their castes stand on their own lotuses, on seats of vajras.

original: lha rnams 'dab mar lha mo rnams ni rol ba'i stabs te 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: lha rnams 'dab mar lha mo rnams ni rol ba'i stabs te 'byung po las skyes rnams kyi de bzhin nyid //
translated: The goddesses on the petals stand in the pose of amorous play.

original: g-yas pa bskum pa dag kyang sa gzhi las ni nges par bkod cing rkang pa g-yon pa brkyang pa dag /
analyzed: g-yas pa bskum pa dag kyang sa gzhi las ni nges par bkod cing rkang pa g-yon pa brkyang pa dag /
translated: The Bhuja·πÖgas stand with their right legs drawn in, firmly placed on the ground, and their left legs extended.

original: phyed dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis pa ste mi yi bdag po de ni g-yon pa brkyang ba'i stabs su 'gyur //üîΩg-yon pa'i sbyor ba yis ni g-yas brkyang du 'gyur rkang pa zung ni mnyam pa dag kyang mnyam pa'i stabs //
analyzed: phyed dang bcas pa'i khru gnyis pa ste mi yi bdag po de ni g-yon pa brkyang ba'i stabs su 'gyur // g-yon pa'i sbyor ba yis ni g-yas brkyang du 'gyur rkang pa zung ni mnyam pa dag kyang mnyam pa'i stabs //
translated: O King, that is the pose of extended left leg.üîΩThe pose of extended right leg is by the application of the left. The pose of equal legs is with the pair of legs equal.

original: yon tan dbang gi bus mo zung ni rab tu brkyang ba dag las sa ga dang ni zlum por 'gyur //
analyzed: yon tan dbang gi bus mo zung ni rab tu brkyang ba dag las sa ga dang ni zlum por 'gyur //
translated: The pose of extended heels is with the pair of heels extended.

original: cung zad pus mo phyed ni 'khyog pa rol bar 'gyur te lhag ma dag ni rab tu grags pa nyid //
analyzed: cung zad pus mo phyed ni 'khyog pa rol bar 'gyur te lhag ma dag ni rab tu grags pa nyid //
translated: The half-paryanka is slightly bent at the knee, and the rest are well known.

original: slar yang rnal 'byor pa yis bha ra ta las shes par bya ste rdo rje gar gyi slad du'o //
analyzed: slar yang rnal 'byor pa yis bha ra ta las shes par bya ste rdo rje gar gyi slad du'o //
translated: Again, the yogi should know from the Bharata, for the sake of the vajra dance.

original: cod pan dag la phan tshun rdo rjer 'gyur te sangs rgyas lnga rnams res 'ga' na //
analyzed: cod pan dag la phan tshun rdo rjer 'gyur te sangs rgyas lnga rnams res 'ga' na //
translated: The crowns become mutually vajras, and the five Buddhas sometimes

original: gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa ste gsal bar padma 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa ste gsal bar padma 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad nyid du 'gyur //
translated: on the head of Rupavajrini, Akasagarbha, and the lotus-holding Vairocana become manifest.

original: rin chen dbang po'i chu skyes 'dzin dang don yod grub pa'i cod pan la ni rab mchog nor bu'i phyag /
analyzed: rin chen dbang po'i chu skyes 'dzin dang don yod grub pa'i cod pan la ni rab mchog nor bu'i phyag /
translated: The lotus-holding Ratnasambhava and the supreme jewel-handed Amoghasiddhi are on the crowns.

original: drug gi cod phan ral pa zhes byar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lhag ma'i 'khor lo yi yang gzhan //
analyzed: drug gi cod phan ral pa zhes byar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis lhag ma'i 'khor lo yi yang gzhan //
translated: The crowns of the six are called jatilas, and by the power of qualities, the other wheels also.

original: sa las 'khor lo rab tu skye bar 'gyur te chu las padma dang ni me las nor bu'o //
analyzed: sa las 'khor lo rab tu skye bar 'gyur te chu las padma dang ni me las nor bu'o //
translated: The wheel is born from earth, the lotus from water, and the jewel from fire.

original: rlung las ral gri dang ni stong pa dag las rdo rjer 'gyur te 'gyur med las ni gri gug go //
analyzed: rlung las ral gri dang ni stong pa dag las rdo rjer 'gyur te 'gyur med las ni gri gug go //
translated: From the wind, a sword; from the void, a vajra; from the immutable, a flaying knife.

original: gos dang bdud rtsi'i snod du @122a *//
analyzed: gos dang bdud rtsi'i snod du @122a *//
translated: From the cloth, a skull-cup; from the nectar, a skull-cup.

original: 'gyur te nges par me long dang bcas phreng ba dang ni rgyud mang dang // drug pa chos 'byung nges par sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' zhi bdag las so //üîΩphub dang mdun dang mda' dang dgra sta dang ni d'a ma ru dag mtshan ma lnga ste de bzhin du //
analyzed: 'gyur te nges par me long dang bcas phreng ba dang ni rgyud mang dang // drug pa chos 'byung nges par sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' zhi bdag las so // phub dang mdun dang mda' dang dgra sta dang ni d'a ma ru dag mtshan ma lnga ste de bzhin du //
translated: From the earth, water, fire, wind, and space, respectively, a mirror, a rosary, a lute, a six-spoked wheel, and a source of phenomena.

original: dbyug pa zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang nges pa bde bzhin tho ba dang ni rtse gsum dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: dbyug pa zhags pa lcags kyu dag dang nges pa bde bzhin tho ba dang ni rtse gsum dag tu 'gyur //
translated: From the earth, water, fire, wind, and space, respectively, a cushion, a noose, a goad, a bludgeon, and a trident.üîΩFrom the earth, water, fire, wind, and space, respectively, a bow, a lotus, a head, a kha·π≠vƒÅ·πÖga, a bell, and a chain.

original: gzhu dang autpal dang slar yang de bzhin mgo bo dang ni kha tv'am ga dang dril bu dang // de bzhin lcags sgrog la sogs chu na rgyu ba thod pa stag lpags dang ni glang po'i pags pa ste //
analyzed: gzhu dang autpal dang slar yang de bzhin mgo bo dang ni kha tv'am ga dang dril bu dang // de bzhin lcags sgrog la sogs chu na rgyu ba thod pa stag lpags dang ni glang po'i pags pa ste //
translated: From the earth, water, fire, wind, and space, respectively, a crocodile-skin scabbard, a tiger-skin rug, an elephant-skin rug, a garland of heads, and a garland of bells.

original: 'dir ni lhag ma nye ba'i mtshan ma sa dang chu dang bsreg zla rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa //
analyzed: 'dir ni lhag ma nye ba'i mtshan ma sa dang chu dang bsreg zla rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa //
translated: Here, the remaining secondary signs are born from earth, water, fire, wind, and space.

original: de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis shes par bya ba nyid de lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis shes par bya ba nyid de lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o //
translated: They are to be known by the power of their intrinsic qualities, those of the gods and goddesses.

original: gang zhig la la sogs pa sum cu'i dbyangs ni sa chu bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa //
analyzed: gang zhig la la sogs pa sum cu'i dbyangs ni sa chu bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa //
translated: The thirty vowels such as a are born from earth, water, fire, wind, and space.

original: thad du ring po'i rab dbye rnams kyi rim pas yongs bkod nges par padma la gnas zla ba dang // nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa de dag 'khor lo la sogs mtshan ma rnams kyi rang gi sngags //
analyzed: thad du ring po'i rab dbye rnams kyi rim pas yongs bkod nges par padma la gnas zla ba dang // nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa de dag 'khor lo la sogs mtshan ma rnams kyi rang gi sngags //
translated: Arranged in order on the lotus, in the sequence of the long and short vowels, they are on moon and sun seats, on the seats of the wheel and so forth, the signs of the mantras.

original: gang zhig kho nar mtshan ma drug par gyur pa der ni yon tan dbang gis gzhom du med par 'gyur //
analyzed: gang zhig kho nar mtshan ma drug par gyur pa der ni yon tan dbang gis gzhom du med par 'gyur //
translated: Those that are the six signs become invincible by the power of their qualities.

original: n'a da dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur te mi yi bdag po thugs kyi rdo rje aa yig go //
analyzed: n'a da dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' 'gyur te mi yi bdag po thugs kyi rdo rje aa yig go //
translated: The nada is glorious Vajrasattva, the king of men, the vajra of mind, the letter a.

original: ai yig thung ngur ral gri ldan par 'gyur te slar yang ri yig dag ni phyag na rin chen no //
analyzed: ai yig thung ngur ral gri ldan par 'gyur te slar yang ri yig dag ni phyag na rin chen no //
translated: The short vowel i is the sword, and again the syllable ri is Ratnasa·πÉbhava.

original: @122b au yig thung ngu snang ba mtha' yas su 'gyur slar yang 'dir ni li yig rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: @122b au yig thung ngu snang ba mtha' yas su 'gyur slar yang 'dir ni li yig rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The short vowel ≈´ is AmitƒÅbha, and again here the syllable li is Vairocana.

original: bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas dbyangs kyi tshogs pa ring po mtha' dag rgyal ba drug gi rim pas so //
analyzed: bsam pa'i rab tu dbye bas dbyangs kyi tshogs pa ring po mtha' dag rgyal ba drug gi rim pas so //
translated: By the division of the mind, the entire collection of long vowels is in the order of the six victors.

original: dpal ldan yum ni gzhom du med pa zhes par 'gyur te de bzhin aa yig las skyes nam mkha' khams //

original: skra rnams kyis ni grub pa mtha' dag pa spu rnams kyis dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs //
analyzed: skra rnams kyis ni grub pa mtha' dag pa spu rnams kyis dur khrod sa gzhi la gnas 'byung po'i tshogs //
translated: The eight periods beginning with the moon are by the petals of the lotus, the lunar activities by the hours.üîΩThe eight periods beginning

original: de nyid rnams kyis gtso bo'i mtshon cha rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khams kyi phyi yi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de nyid rnams kyis gtso bo'i mtshon cha rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khams kyi phyi yi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The external seal of the elements is the nature of the principal's weapon, by the power of the qualities.

original: rdo rjes nang gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du yang dag gnas pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rjes nang gi phyag rgya rdo rje 'dzin pa'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du yang dag gnas pa'o //
translated: The internal seal is the vajra, which abides perfectly on the moon in the heart of the vajra-holder.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje can dang sna tshogs yum ni rnam gsum srid gnas 'gyur med ye shes dbye ba las //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje can dang sna tshogs yum ni rnam gsum srid gnas 'gyur med ye shes dbye ba las //
translated: The glorious vajra-holder and the various mothers are the three, abiding in existence, unchanging, by the division of intuition.

original: dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur te chos las nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku bzang po'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur te chos las nges par longs spyod rdzogs sku bzang po'o //
translated: From the glorious pure one, the dharma body arises; from the dharma, the excellent enjoyment body arises.

original: longs spyod las ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems can kun don byed pa po //
analyzed: longs spyod las ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems can kun don byed pa po //
translated: From the enjoyment, the emanation body arises, the lord of victors, the one who acts for the benefit of all beings.

original: bzhi pa'i gnas skabs shin tu gnyid log nges par slar yang gzhan dang lus kyi dbye bas sad pa ste //
analyzed: bzhi pa'i gnas skabs shin tu gnyid log nges par slar yang gzhan dang lus kyi dbye bas sad pa ste //
translated: In the fourth state, deeply asleep, one definitely awakens again, by the division of other and body.

original: de ltar lus kyi rab tu dbye bas srog chags rnams kyi lus la yid ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas //
analyzed: de ltar lus kyi rab tu dbye bas srog chags rnams kyi lus la yid ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas //
translated: Thus, by the division of the body, the mind of beings abides in four ways in the body.

original: sprul par yid ni longs spyod byed pa po ru rab tu 'gyur te lus dang ngag gi dbang pos so //
analyzed: sprul par yid ni longs spyod byed pa po ru rab tu 'gyur te lus dang ngag gi dbang pos so //
translated: The mind becomes the enjoyer in the emanation, by means of the body and speech organs.

original: longs spyod rdzogs la ma mthong sems par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis chos kyi sku la gnyid kyang ngo //
analyzed: longs spyod rdzogs la ma mthong sems par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis chos kyi sku la gnyid kyang ngo //
translated: In the enjoyment, it becomes the seer, by the power of the qualities, in the Dharma Body, even in sleep.

original: dag @127b pa la ni bde bar rang 'gyur 'dir ni nyin mtshan dus su thig le grol ba gsum gyi mthar //
analyzed: dag @127b pa la ni bde bar rang 'gyur 'dir ni nyin mtshan dus su thig le grol ba gsum gyi mthar //
translated: In the pure, it becomes the blissful, in the self-empowerment. Here, in the day and night periods, the three releases of the drop are at the end.

original: de phyir de ni nyin mtshan dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bye ste 'gyur med don du'o //
analyzed: de phyir de ni nyin mtshan dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bye ste 'gyur med don du'o //
translated: Therefore, the yogi/nƒ´ should meditate on it in the day and night periods, for the sake of the unchanging reality.

original: g-yon du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ni g-yas pa bskum pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: g-yon du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ni g-yas pa bskum pa gang yin pa //
translated: When the life-force moves to the left, the right one is contracted.

original: de ni g-yon brkyang stabs te mnyam pa'i stabs dang gzhan pa g-yas brkyang me dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba las //
analyzed: de ni g-yon brkyang stabs te mnyam pa'i stabs dang gzhan pa g-yas brkyang me dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba las //
translated: That is the left-extended step, the equal step, and the other right-extended step. From the movement of the fire and sun,

original: sa ga dang ni zlum po nyid dang mchog gi rol ba'i stabs dang padma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan //
analyzed: sa ga dang ni zlum po nyid dang mchog gi rol ba'i stabs dang padma dang ni rdo rje'i gdan //
translated: the peacock, the circle, the supreme play step, the lotus, and the vajra seat.

original: nam mkha' sogs la rab tu rgyu ba mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa dag la srog rlung rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: nam mkha' sogs la rab tu rgyu ba mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa dag la srog rlung rnam pa lnga //
translated: The life-force wind moves in the sky and so forth, and is the same and not the same in the paths of the even and uneven.

original: gtum mo lte ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro tsa rtsi ka sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan //
analyzed: gtum mo lte ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro tsa rtsi ka sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan //
translated: The hero with the nine wheels of the navel cakra, possessing the supreme deity, Ca·πá·∏ça, Ca·πá·∏çƒÅlƒ´, and so forth,

original: ho yig ye shes snying po la ni dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes me ni rab rgyas pa //
analyzed: ho yig ye shes snying po la ni dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes me ni rab rgyas pa //
translated: the wisdom fire, which is like a stainless lightning bolt, is fully expanded in the essence of the syllable ho.

original: lte bar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs sreg cing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sogs pa rnams //
analyzed: lte bar rnam par snang mdzad la sogs sreg cing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sogs pa rnams //
translated: Having burned the navel, Vairocana, and so forth, the lord of humans, LocanƒÅ, the eyes, and so forth,

original: thams cad bsregs nas mgo bor zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzugs ni 'dzag pa gang de rdo rje can //
analyzed: thams cad bsregs nas mgo bor zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzugs ni 'dzag pa gang de rdo rje can //
translated: having burned everything, the bindu form drips from the excellent moon at the head, which is the vajra holder.

original: shes rab chos 'byung dag la gnas pa mtha' dag slar yang spro ba byas te nges par thig le yis //
analyzed: shes rab chos 'byung dag la gnas pa mtha' dag slar yang spro ba byas te nges par thig le yis //
translated: The bindu, having again emanated all the wisdoms that abide in the lotus of the wisdom, definitely

original: sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan zhing me long dag la gnas pa lta bu'i ye shes 'khor lo rang byung ba //
analyzed: sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan zhing me long dag la gnas pa lta bu'i ye shes 'khor lo rang byung ba //
translated: the self-originated wisdom wheel, endowed with various ornaments, is like that which abides in a mirror.

original: 'dod pa dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med srid pa rnam pa gsum pe dag kyang rim pas sbyangs byas te //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med srid pa rnam pa gsum pe dag kyang rim pas sbyangs byas te //
translated: The three realms of desire, form, and formlessness are purified in sequence.

original: phyi nas ye shes me lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus gcig tu ni dgug par bya //üîΩzla ba nyi ma aa sogs @128a *//
analyzed: phyi nas ye shes me lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus gcig tu ni dgug par bya // zla ba nyi ma aa sogs @128a *//
translated: Then, with the flame of wisdom, the entire triple world is summoned in an instant.

original: rnams kyis rnam gsum bgrod gnas sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa //
analyzed: rnams kyis rnam gsum bgrod gnas sku yi rdo rje sogs bzlas pa //
translated: The three realms are purified by the moon, sun, and so forth, and the three vajras of body and so forth are recited.

original: so sor sdud pa la sogs drug gis gser bzang padma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor te //
analyzed: so sor sdud pa la sogs drug gis gser bzang padma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor te //
translated: The yoga of body, speech, and mind is on the excellent lotus through the six, such as withdrawal.

original: dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje chu skyes dag la ro mnyam gyur pas sgom pa rdo rje gsum //
analyzed: dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje chu skyes dag la ro mnyam gyur pas sgom pa rdo rje gsum //
translated: The three vajras are meditated on through the equality of taste with the vajra lotus through joy and so forth.

original: shes rab padmar sems kyi thig le dag la lhan skyes bde ba'i dbang gis sgom pa gzhom med 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab padmar sems kyi thig le dag la lhan skyes bde ba'i dbang gis sgom pa gzhom med 'gyur //
translated: The meditation on the bindu of mind in the lotus of wisdom through the power of innate bliss becomes the indestructible.

original: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs dang chu gter rdo rje rnams dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bsnyen pa ste //
analyzed: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs dang chu gter rdo rje rnams dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bsnyen pa ste //
translated: The approach is through the five nectars and so forth, the ocean, the vajra, and so forth, and the recitation of mantra.

original: so sor sdud pa sogs dang rdo rje padma las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni nye ba'i sgrub par 'gyur //
analyzed: so sor sdud pa sogs dang rdo rje padma las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni nye ba'i sgrub par 'gyur //
translated: The near-accomplishment is the nectar born from the vajra and lotus, through the withdrawal of the senses and so forth.

original: dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dang chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa sgom pa sgrub par 'gyur //
analyzed: dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dang chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa sgom pa sgrub par 'gyur //
translated: The accomplishment is the meditation on the vajra-union of the equal taste of the lotus and the moon through the joy and so forth.

original: shes rab sbyar la gang tshe 'pho med phra mo'i rnal 'byor dag las nges par sgrub pa chen por 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab sbyar la gang tshe 'pho med phra mo'i rnal 'byor dag las nges par sgrub pa chen por 'gyur //
translated: The great accomplishment is the definite attainment from the yoga of the subtle, unmoving union with the wisdom.

original: dang por stong nyid byang chub nges par slar yang de nas zla ba thig le dag ni yang dag 'dzin //
analyzed: dang por stong nyid byang chub nges par slar yang de nas zla ba thig le dag ni yang dag 'dzin //
translated: First, definitely the enlightenment of emptiness, then again the moon and the drop are held.

original: de nas gzugs dag bskyed cing rab mchog ro yi rigs rnams dag gis yi ge bgod pa nyid yin te //
analyzed: de nas gzugs dag bskyed cing rab mchog ro yi rigs rnams dag gis yi ge bgod pa nyid yin te //
translated: Then, the forms are generated, and the syllables are distributed by the supreme taste of the families.

original: 'di ni spyi yi bsnyen pa chu yi gter gyi rdo rje rnams kyis sgrub pa dag ni 'bring po yang //
analyzed: 'di ni spyi yi bsnyen pa chu yi gter gyi rdo rje rnams kyis sgrub pa dag ni 'bring po yang //
translated: This is the general approach, the medium accomplishment by the vajra-oceans of water.

original: 'di la thabs ni rnam bzhir 'gyur te dman dang brtan bsgrub pa'i yan lag dag la de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: 'di la thabs ni rnam bzhir 'gyur te dman dang brtan bsgrub pa'i yan lag dag la de bzhin nyid //
translated: There are four methods here: the inferior, the branch of the stable accomplishment, and so forth.

original: so sor sdud pa rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur zhing rnam pa bcu ste bsam gtan mi bskyod pa nyid do //
analyzed: so sor sdud pa rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur zhing rnam pa bcu ste bsam gtan mi bskyod pa nyid do //
translated: The ten aspects of withdrawal are the king of victors, and the meditative concentration is the immovable.

original: srog rtsol dag kyang ral gri can no slar yang rnam pa bcu ste 'dzin pa phyag @128b na rin chen no //
analyzed: srog rtsol dag kyang ral gri can no slar yang rnam pa bcu ste 'dzin pa phyag @128b na rin chen no //
translated: The ten aspects of vitality control are the sword-bearer, and the retention is the jewel-bearer.

original: gdol ba mo la rjes su dran pa padma 'dzin par 'gyur te dpal ldan ting 'dzin 'khor lo can //
analyzed: gdol ba mo la rjes su dran pa padma 'dzin par 'gyur te dpal ldan ting 'dzin 'khor lo can //
translated: The ten aspects of recollection are the lotus-bearer, and the glorious meditative absorption is the wheel-bearer.

original: re re dbye ba lnga rnams kyis te slar yang gang las aa sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye ba'o; ;so sor sdud pa lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: re re dbye ba lnga rnams kyis te slar yang gang las aa sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye ba'o; ;so sor sdud pa lus la yul dang yul can bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o //
translated: Each of these is divided into five, and again they are divided by the vowels and consonants. The withdrawal is in the body, and the ten objects and subjects do not engage.

original: bsam gtan dag kyang shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa dga' dang g-yo med bde ba rtse gcig sems pa'o /
analyzed: bsam gtan dag kyang shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa dga' dang g-yo med bde ba rtse gcig sems pa'o /
translated: The meditative concentration is the wisdom, the investigation, the analysis, the joy, the non-wavering, the bliss, and the one-pointed mind.

original: srog gi rtsol ba dag kyang lam ni gnyis po bskyel zhing dbu mar srog ni zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: srog gi rtsol ba dag kyang lam ni gnyis po bskyel zhing dbu mar srog ni zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur //
translated: The vitality control is the path of the two, and the life-force enters into the central channel.

original: thig ler srog ni rab tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: thig ler srog ni rab tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The life-force well entered into the drop, having destroyed the path of both, is the retention of the mind focused one-pointedly.

original: gtum mo'i snang bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur //
analyzed: gtum mo'i snang bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus dang nam mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur //
translated: Whatever is the appearance of ca·πá·∏çƒÅlƒ´, that is certainly the recollection in the body and in space.

original: shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis ye shes gzugs la ting nge 'dzin //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis ye shes gzugs la ting nge 'dzin //
translated: By the power of unchanging bliss through the union of wisdom and means, there is the form of gnosis, which is samƒÅdhi.

original: 'di dag dman pa la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di dag dman pa la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum du 'gyur //
translated: These are the three types of sƒÅdhana of the principal deity, with the divisions of inferior and so on.

original: phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skabs gsum ni rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis las dang kun rtog mchog rnams so //
analyzed: phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skabs gsum ni rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis las dang kun rtog mchog rnams so //
translated: The three mudras and the three states are the supreme karma and concepts through the power of the three paths.

original: so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob //
analyzed: so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul dang rnam par bral ba sngags rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob //
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ of prƒÅ·πáƒÅyƒÅma, free from objects, is empowered by all mantras.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dag pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dag pa'o //
translated: The five superknowledges are attained, O king, through the application of meditative concentration.

original: srog gi rtsol bas dag pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis @129a *//
analyzed: srog gi rtsol bas dag pa ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis @129a *//
translated: The bodhisattvas worship the pure moon, free from the sun, by the power of prƒÅ·πáƒÅyƒÅma.

original: mchod // bdud dang nyon mongs la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis so //
analyzed: mchod // bdud dang nyon mongs la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis so //
translated: The demons, afflictions, and so on are destroyed, and one enters into the ten powers by the power of retention.

original: rjes su dran pa legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyis dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las so //
analyzed: rjes su dran pa legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyis dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las so //
translated: The ma·πá·∏çala of the pure, stainless light of recollection is also from the form of gnosis.

original: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus ni 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis ye shes lus ni 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Then, by the purity of samƒÅdhi, in a few days, the gnosis body is accomplished.

original: so sor sdud pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur na //
analyzed: so sor sdud pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te sngags pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur na //
translated: If the desires of the mantrins are not accomplished by means of the withdrawal and so forth,üîΩthen, by the force of practice, one should accomplish [it] by blocking the bindu in the vajra jewel, abiding in the lotus, by the method.

original: n'a da goms pas btsan thabs chu skyes su gnas rdo rje nor bur thig le bkag nas bsgrub par bya; ;bsnyen pa la ni dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bcu mkha' la 'khor lo can gyis khro bo'i lta bas so //
analyzed: n'a da goms pas btsan thabs chu skyes su gnas rdo rje nor bur thig le bkag nas bsgrub par bya; ;bsnyen pa la ni dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bcu mkha' la 'khor lo can gyis khro bo'i lta bas so //
translated: In the approach, the angry view of the one with the wheel in the sky is the first yoga with its ten aspects.

original: bgegs mthar byed pa'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lam du son pa yis kyang nye ba'i sgrub la yan lag drug /
analyzed: bgegs mthar byed pa'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lam du son pa yis kyang nye ba'i sgrub la yan lag drug /
translated: The path of the nectar of the view of Vinayaka, the one who puts an end to obstacles, is also the means of approach.

original: shes rab la spros zla ba thig le rdo rje nor bur gnas pa'i 'gyur med gsum ni sgrub pa la //
analyzed: shes rab la spros zla ba thig le rdo rje nor bur gnas pa'i 'gyur med gsum ni sgrub pa la //
translated: The three immutable [states]‚Äîthe drop of the moon of the elaboration of wisdom, which is the state of the vajra jewel‚Äîare the approach.

original: bde ba ma nyams gcig pu zhi ba'i lhan skyes ye shes rnal 'byor 'dir ni sgrub pa chen po la //
analyzed: bde ba ma nyams gcig pu zhi ba'i lhan skyes ye shes rnal 'byor 'dir ni sgrub pa chen po la //
translated: The innate pristine awareness, which is the bliss of the single [state] of peace, is the great approach in this yoga.

original: srog gi rtsol ba kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba ji srid mgo yi bar du 'dod pa ste //
analyzed: srog gi rtsol ba kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba ji srid mgo yi bar du 'dod pa ste //
translated: The life-force energy, which bestows the fruit of the bliss of the state of union, is desired as far as the head.üîΩAbove that, it is not desired, for it causes the fear of death, the destruction of the aggregates.

original: de las steng du 'dod pa ma yin 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa phung po nges par 'jig pa'i rgya; ;gtsug tor sgo ni phug nas 'gro na mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la nges par sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: de las steng du 'dod pa ma yin 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa phung po nges par 'jig pa'i rgya; ;gtsug tor sgo ni phug nas 'gro na mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la nges par sbyar bar bya //
translated: If one goes through the aperture of BrahmƒÅ, one is certainly united with the state of supreme bliss.

original: phung po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni bde mnyam 'jug ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa @129b min; ;dbus su srog ni rab tu zhugs pa sna tshogs yum la yul dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khyud pa ste //
analyzed: phung po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni bde mnyam 'jug ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa @129b min; ;dbus su srog ni rab tu zhugs pa sna tshogs yum la yul dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khyud pa ste //
translated: The life-force entering into the center, embracing the mother of variety, free from objects,

original: padmar zhugs pa'i rang gi rdo rje spro ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus su rab zhugs pa //
analyzed: padmar zhugs pa'i rang gi rdo rje spro ba dag kyang de bzhin zla nyi'i dbus su rab zhugs pa //
translated: the self-vajra entering into the lotus, the emission, likewise, entering into the middle of the moon and sun,

original: bde ba'i sa bon ma lhung pa la rab dga'i dga' bar gnas pa rnal 'byor rnams kyi rnal 'byor 'di //
analyzed: bde ba'i sa bon ma lhung pa la rab dga'i dga' bar gnas pa rnal 'byor rnams kyi rnal 'byor 'di //
translated: the seed of bliss not falling, abiding in the joy of supreme joy, this yoga of the yogis,

original: phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang mchog tu gsang ba'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang mchog tu gsang ba'o //
translated: for the sake of the accomplishment of the consort, is the supreme secret, more secret than the glorious secret of the Lord.

original: gtsug tor du ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te phyi rol rtse mo dag ni nyis 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gtsug tor du ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te phyi rol rtse mo dag ni nyis 'gyur gyi /
translated: In the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a, the vajra becomes five-pointed, with the outer points double that.

original: rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lor 'gyur zhing nyis 'gyur gzhan ma dang ni de yi nyis 'gyur dag kyang gzhan; ;de yi yang na nyis 'gyur gzhan du 'gyur te lhan skyes longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro //
analyzed: rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lor 'gyur zhing nyis 'gyur gzhan ma dang ni de yi nyis 'gyur dag kyang gzhan; ;de yi yang na nyis 'gyur gzhan du 'gyur te lhan skyes longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro //
translated: The wheel of Vajradharma, doubled again, and that again doubled, and that again doubled, is the wheel of the innate, the enjoyment body, and the emanation body.

original: de yi snying por rtse mo gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras ster gsang ba'i padma'i khongs su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de yi snying por rtse mo gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras ster gsang ba'i padma'i khongs su gnas pa'o //
translated: In the heart, in the secret lotus, is the single peak, the abode of the bliss of the result.

original: rnal 'byor ba yis nyin dang mtshan mor srog gcod pa dag bya ba de ni srog nyams par gsungs te //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba yis nyin dang mtshan mor srog gcod pa dag bya ba de ni srog nyams par gsungs te //
translated: The yogin should kill life day and night, for that is said to be the loss of life.

original: sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang  la gyur pa de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid //
analyzed: sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang  la gyur pa de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid //
translated: The sound that is the lowest of faces is the very lying down.

original: gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa ni 'dzin pa dag kyang rnal 'byor ba yi bkru bar gsungs //
analyzed: gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa ni 'dzin pa dag kyang rnal 'byor ba yi bkru bar gsungs //
translated: That which holds the stage of the gnosis of the omniscient one is said to be the bathing of the yogin.

original: thig le ma lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral min las gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa'o //
analyzed: thig le ma lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral min las gzhan gyi bud med bsten pa'o //
translated: The bliss from the nonemission of the bindu is the reliance on another‚Äôs wife, not from the absence of passion.

original: srog gi rtsol ba'i me yis ri bong can ni zhu ba dag kyang gtung ba chang ni 'thung ba'o //
analyzed: srog gi rtsol ba'i me yis ri bong can ni zhu ba dag kyang gtung ba chang ni 'thung ba'o //
translated: The wine is drunk, the moon is drunk by the fire of prƒÅ·πáƒÅyƒÅma.

original: mthe bo'i tshigs nas gtsug tor dag tu nya yi mthar ni rang sems @130a *//
analyzed: mthe bo'i tshigs nas gtsug tor dag tu nya yi mthar ni rang sems @130a *//
translated: The self-mind goes from the joint of the thumb to the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a, to the end of the moon,

original: 'gro ste tshes kyi dbang gis so //
analyzed: 'gro ste tshes kyi dbang gis so //
translated: by the power of the lunar day.

original: gtsug tor nas ni sor mo rnams su slar yang 'di nyid 'gro ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ru'o //
analyzed: gtsug tor nas ni sor mo rnams su slar yang 'di nyid 'gro ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ru'o //
translated: From the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a, it goes again to the fingers, to the end of the dark fortnight.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod pa gang de nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod pa gang de nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba //
translated: That conduct of the yogis bestows the desired accomplishments at the time of each day.

original: bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang kha mchog padma skam dang zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang // 'dar dang smyo dang rab tu rmongs par 'gyur dang yid ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu brgyal ba dag /
analyzed: bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang kha mchog padma skam dang zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang // 'dar dang smyo dang rab tu rmongs par 'gyur dang yid ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu brgyal ba dag /
translated: Fever, vomiting, dry lotus, indigestion, trembling, insanity, complete delusion, mental confusion, and fainting‚Äî

original: rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu ste srog chags lus la 'jig rten du //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu ste srog chags lus la 'jig rten du //
translated: the ten clear signs of smoke and so on of the vajri·πáƒ´s occur in the body of the living being in the world.

original: rab tu gsal zhing nges par de rnams yid srub gnas skabs su zhig rgyal ba 'dod pa de ni su //
analyzed: rab tu gsal zhing nges par de rnams yid srub gnas skabs su zhig rgyal ba 'dod pa de ni su //
translated: The one who desires to conquer them in the state of the mind's churning, he is the one who is very clear and certain.

original: nyin dang mtshan mor thig le dag las dkar po'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig m'a ma k'i ste chang ma yin //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mor thig le dag las dkar po'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig m'a ma k'i ste chang ma yin //
translated: From the drops, day and night, there flows a stream of white, which is MƒÅmakƒ´, not beer.

original: go ku la sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro ste sha gzhan res 'ga' dag kyang min //
analyzed: go ku la sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro ste sha gzhan res 'ga' dag kyang min //
translated: Go, ku, etc. are the eyes, etc. They are emitted daily, not other flesh even occasionally.

original: rang rigs sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dag gis dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste //
analyzed: rang rigs sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dag gis dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste //
translated: The gods who abide on the stage of their own family worship the pure body with the five nectars.

original: stong par sems ni rab tu zhugs pas ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la ma yin //
analyzed: stong par sems ni rab tu zhugs pas ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la ma yin //
translated: By the mind's entry into emptiness, the equalizing of taste is sex, not the womb.

original: nor ni gtong ba sbyin pa yid dang bud med 'grogs pa las kyang 'pho ba med pa tshul khrims te //
analyzed: nor ni gtong ba sbyin pa yid dang bud med 'grogs pa las kyang 'pho ba med pa tshul khrims te //
translated: Giving wealth is generosity, and from the union of mind and woman, the imperishable is morality.

original: bzod pa sgra la sogs pa mi 'jug pa ste rlung gi gnyi ga'i bgrod pa 'jig pa brtson 'grus nyid //
analyzed: bzod pa sgra la sogs pa mi 'jug pa ste rlung gi gnyi ga'i bgrod pa 'jig pa brtson 'grus nyid //
translated: Patience is the non-engagement in sound, etc., and the destruction of the path of both winds is diligence.

original: bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang lhan skyes bde la gnas pa'i sems @130b dang kun tu 'gro ba kun gyi skad //
analyzed: bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang lhan skyes bde la gnas pa'i sems @130b dang kun tu 'gro ba kun gyi skad //
translated: The concentrations and the wisdoms are the mind abiding in the innate bliss and the language of all the omnipresent ones.

original: de las sems can don dang rdzu 'phrul srid pa mthar byed mi skye 'thob ste gzhan pa bzhi rnams so //
analyzed: de las sems can don dang rdzu 'phrul srid pa mthar byed mi skye 'thob ste gzhan pa bzhi rnams so //
translated: From that, the benefit of sentient beings, the magical power, the end of existence, and the attainment of non-arising are the other four.

original: gcig pu'i sku ni nus pa dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid la sogs pa //
analyzed: gcig pu'i sku ni nus pa dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas nyi shu lnga yi bdag nyid la sogs pa //
translated: The body of the sole hero, endowed with power, with nine abodes, with the nature of twenty-five, and so on,

original: bsgoms na phyag rgya la sogs grub pa rnams su nges par nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis yang dag 'gyur //
analyzed: bsgoms na phyag rgya la sogs grub pa rnams su nges par nyin zhag 'ga' zhig dag gis yang dag 'gyur //
translated: if meditated upon, will certainly be accomplished in a few days, in the accomplishments of the seal, and so on.

original: rengs ba dang ni zhi dang dbang dang srid pa 'jig pa dag ni zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis byed //
analyzed: rengs ba dang ni zhi dang dbang dang srid pa 'jig pa dag ni zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis byed //
translated: Paralysis, pacification, control, and the destruction of existence are done with the divisions of the face.

original: 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas lha min lag 'gro'i rigs 'di bsgom pa yis ni bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas lha min lag 'gro'i rigs 'di bsgom pa yis ni bsgrub par bya //
translated: This meditation on the asura and nƒÅga families abiding in the ma·πá·∏çala of the elements is to be accomplished.

original: dkar po yis ni zhi dang rgyas pa byed de rang gi yid la dmar po yis ni dgug dang dbang //
analyzed: dkar po yis ni zhi dang rgyas pa byed de rang gi yid la dmar po yis ni dgug dang dbang //
translated: With the white, one should do pacification and increase; with the red, one should summon and control with one‚Äôs mind.

original: ser bas rengs dang rmongs pa dag ste nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa'o //
analyzed: ser bas rengs dang rmongs pa dag ste nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa'o //
translated: The white one paralyzes and confuses, like a white cloud, and kills and expels.

original: sgom dang bzlas pa de bzhin nyid du rang gi yid la byed de sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje ni //
analyzed: sgom dang bzlas pa de bzhin nyid du rang gi yid la byed de sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje ni //
translated: One should visualize the mantra in the heart of the deity, and recite it in the same way, with one's mind.

original: 'byung ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor la gnas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag las kyi dbye bas bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: 'byung ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor la gnas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag las kyi dbye bas bsgrub par bya //
translated: The body, speech, and mind vajras, in the ma·πá·∏çala of the elements, are the three worlds, which are accomplished by the division of action.

original: phyogs ni lhag pa las byung pung pa dang ni gser dang mtshungs pa g-yas dang gcig shos dag dang ni //
analyzed: phyogs ni lhag pa las byung pung pa dang ni gser dang mtshungs pa g-yas dang gcig shos dag dang ni //
translated: The right and left arms, which are born from the excess, are like gold and a heap.

original: phung po'i bdud la glang chen pags pa dag kyang ma lus bshus te rkang pa zung zhig dag nas 'dzin //
analyzed: phung po'i bdud la glang chen pags pa dag kyang ma lus bshus te rkang pa zung zhig dag nas 'dzin //
translated: The demon of the aggregates is completely flayed, and the elephant skin is held in both hands.

original: lha min dbang po'i khrag gi thong ba rab mchog phyag mthil na ste 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdong gi phyag /
analyzed: lha min dbang po'i khrag gi thong ba rab mchog phyag mthil na ste 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdong gi phyag /
translated: The supreme skull cup of the blood of the lord of the demigods is in the palm of the hand, and the face of the demon of death is in the lap.

original: nyon mongs bdud ni zhabs kyis bsgyel ba gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ni gzhan gyi don du bsgom par bya //
analyzed: nyon mongs bdud ni zhabs kyis bsgyel ba gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ni gzhan gyi don du bsgom par bya //
translated: The demon of the afflictions is overthrown by the feet, and the other two are conquered by the hands, which are meditated upon for the sake of others.

original: de la yum ni @131a *//
analyzed: de la yum ni @131a *//
translated: The mother is

original: zhal gcig zung gi phyag gi padma dag la gri gug dpal ldan thod pa ste //
analyzed: zhal gcig zung gi phyag gi padma dag la gri gug dpal ldan thod pa ste //
translated: one-faced, and in the lotus of her two hands is a flaying knife and a glorious skull-cup.

original: nyi ma las ni zla bas rang gi rgyu ba bcu gnyis lhag pa'i gcig rgyu bgrod pa'i dbang gis so; ;de phyir lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te sna tshogs yum ni de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: nyi ma las ni zla bas rang gi rgyu ba bcu gnyis lhag pa'i gcig rgyu bgrod pa'i dbang gis so; ;de phyir lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te sna tshogs yum ni de bzhin nyid //
translated: The moon moves in its orbit, which is one degree more than twelve degrees of the sun, by the power of its motion. Therefore, by the division of the body, one becomes the lord of the victors, and the mother of the variety is suchness.

original: shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa bde mnyam 'bras ster zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas so //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa bde mnyam 'bras ster zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas so //
translated: Wisdom and means, the body and the mind, bestow the result of the bliss of union, by the motion of the moon and the sun.

original: gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal te phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dog mun pa dag gi mthar //
analyzed: gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal te phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dog mun pa dag gi mthar //
translated: The infinite faces, beginning with one, and the many hands and feet, are the colors of the directions.

original: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nges par bde mnyam ster te rtsa ni zla ba nyi ma 'gog pa las //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nges par bde mnyam ster te rtsa ni zla ba nyi ma 'gog pa las //
translated: The nature of wisdom and means definitely bestows the bliss of union, from the cessation of the channels, moon, and sun.

original: sa la sogs pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs byed dri med nor bu dang mtshungs stong ba gcig bu ste //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs byed dri med nor bu dang mtshungs stong ba gcig bu ste //
translated: Earth and so forth are completely pierced, like a stainless jewel, empty, and singular.

original: thog ma med cing mtha' med dbus kyang med la yul med yul ni sgrub pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: thog ma med cing mtha' med dbus kyang med la yul med yul ni sgrub pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: Without beginning, without end, without middle, without object, the object is the Wheel of Time.

original: khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs ni gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa //
analyzed: khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs ni gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis pa //
translated: The Lord of Wrath, Vajrakarma, has two more hands than the Victorious Ones, has faces and feet,

original: dmar ser spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser rgyal ba'i bdag po'i spyod  pan mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa ste //
analyzed: dmar ser spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser rgyal ba'i bdag po'i spyod  pan mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa ste //
translated: red-orange eyes and red-orange hair, and the behavior of the Lord of Victors. He bares sharp fangs,

original: sprul gyi rgyan dang rab mchog stag gi phags pa'i sham thabs dang ni gtso bo'i bzhin du mtshon cha'i phyag /
analyzed: sprul gyi rgyan dang rab mchog stag gi phags pa'i sham thabs dang ni gtso bo'i bzhin du mtshon cha'i phyag /
translated: has snake ornaments, and the best tiger-skin skirt. His hands hold weapons, like the principal one.

original: spyi bor mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi thod pa kha dog lnga rnams dag gi phreng ba nges par bcings //
analyzed: spyi bor mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi thod pa kha dog lnga rnams dag gi phreng ba nges par bcings //
translated: On his head is the skull of the entire Victorious One‚Äôs family, with a garland of five colors definitely bound.

original: dri med 'od zer 'phro ba sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma'i steng du dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdog la ni //
analyzed: dri med 'od zer 'phro ba sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma'i steng du dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdog la ni //
translated: He is of various colors, and on a variegated lotus and sun, he radiates stainless light rays.

original: zhabs @131b gnyis dag gis 'byung bo'i mgon po lhag pa'i stobs kyis mnan cing g-yas brkyang stabs kyis yang dag gnas //
analyzed: zhabs @131b gnyis dag gis 'byung bo'i mgon po lhag pa'i stobs kyis mnan cing g-yas brkyang stabs kyis yang dag gnas //
translated: He stands with two legs in the extended-right posture, trampling on the lord of spirits, Bali, with his left foot.

original: 'byung po rnams dang lha min gdengs can lha rnams skrag par byed cing ye shes sems dpa' gcig gyur pa //
analyzed: 'byung po rnams dang lha min gdengs can lha rnams skrag par byed cing ye shes sems dpa' gcig gyur pa //
translated: He terrifies the spirits, demigods, and serpents, and is the single one of the wisdom beings.

original: bsgom na zla ba gcig nyid kho nas dur khrod sa la gnas pa 'byung po'i tshogs ni bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: bsgom na zla ba gcig nyid kho nas dur khrod sa la gnas pa 'byung po'i tshogs ni bsgrub par bya //
translated: If meditated upon, in just one month, he will accomplish the hosts of spirits dwelling in the charnel grounds.

original: klu rnams chu skyes 'dab brgyad la ste rgyal dang rnam rgyal dag ni nyi ma'i steng du bsgyel byas nas //
analyzed: klu rnams chu skyes 'dab brgyad la ste rgyal dang rnam rgyal dag ni nyi ma'i steng du bsgyel byas nas //
translated: The nƒÅgas are on an eight-petaled lotus, and Indra and Upendra are on a sun, lying prone.

original: zhabs dag gis ni gdengs can bdag po zung dang padma'i 'dab mar gnas pa rnams kyi mjug ma yi //
analyzed: zhabs dag gis ni gdengs can bdag po zung dang padma'i 'dab mar gnas pa rnams kyi mjug ma yi //
translated: With his two feet, he tramples on the heads of the nƒÅga lords, who are on the lotus petals.

original: rtse mo thams cad mnan nas sprin gyi rigs ni lto ba dag nas nges par kun tu spro byed pa //
analyzed: rtse mo thams cad mnan nas sprin gyi rigs ni lto ba dag nas nges par kun tu spro byed pa //
translated: Having pressed down all the peaks, the cloud-family definitely radiates from the bellies.

original: de ltar khro bo'i dbang po bsgoms pas nyin zhag dag gi sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: de ltar khro bo'i dbang po bsgoms pas nyin zhag dag gi sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrub par bya //
translated: Thus, by meditating on the Lord of Wrath, the mass of clouds of the days is accomplished.

original: zhes pa la sogs mi yi bdag po lha rnams dang ni lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru //
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs mi yi bdag po lha rnams dang ni lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru //
translated: Thus, O Lord of Men, the means of achieving the gods and goddesses individually,

original: dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis las kyi dbye ba mtha' dag rnams kyis 'gyur //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis las kyi dbye ba mtha' dag rnams kyis 'gyur //
translated: in this mandala, by the power of one's own victorious family, all the divisions of action occur.

original: rengs dang zhi ba dag dang dbang dang gzhan nor 'phrog dang bsad ba dang ni bskrad pa dag la yang //
analyzed: rengs dang zhi ba dag dang dbang dang gzhan nor 'phrog dang bsad ba dang ni bskrad pa dag la yang //
translated: For paralyzing, pacifying, controlling, robbing others of their wealth, killing, and banishing,

original: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gyur te slar yang bzlas dang sbyin sreg rang gi sa bon gyis //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma rnams 'gyur te slar yang bzlas dang sbyin sreg rang gi sa bon gyis //
translated: the yoginis of the thirty-six [channels] transform, and again with the recitation and fire sacrifice of one's own seed syllable.

original: zhi ba la ni bsam gtan dag kyang zhi ba ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar lha ni zhi ba'i gzugs //
analyzed: zhi ba la ni bsam gtan dag kyang zhi ba ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar lha ni zhi ba'i gzugs //
translated: For pacification, the meditations are also peaceful, white like the moon, with the form of a peaceful deity.

original: drag po la yang bsam gtan drag po dang ni sbrin nag dang mtshungs lha rnams drag po nyid kyi gzugs //üîΩdbang du bya ba bsam gtan @132a *//
analyzed: drag po la yang bsam gtan drag po dang ni sbrin nag dang mtshungs lha rnams drag po nyid kyi gzugs // dbang du bya ba bsam gtan @132a *//
translated: In the case of the fierce rite, the fierce contemplation is like a black cloud, and the fierce deities have the form of fierce deities.
