original: kun tu khrid de dpal ldan dur khrod @134b dag tu rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis bya rgod bya rog dang // lte spyang rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i yan lag kun las khrag 'thung sha dang de bzhin du ni khams kun zos //
analyzed: kun tu khrid de dpal ldan dur khrod @134b dag tu rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis bya rgod bya rog dang // lte spyang rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i yan lag kun las khrag 'thung sha dang de bzhin du ni khams kun zos //
translated: He is led all around to the glorious cremation ground, and by the command of the Lord of Victors, the vultures, crows, and jackals drink the blood from all the limbs of the victim, and likewise consume all his bodily constituents.

original: de ltar ma lus pa ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la bsgom par bya ste bsad pa dag la'o //
analyzed: de ltar ma lus pa ni rab mchog sa yi gzhi la bsgom par bya ste bsad pa dag la'o //
translated: Thus, he should be visualized in this way on the excellent ground, in the place of killing.

original: bsam gtan 'di yis brgya byin dag kyang gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro na mngal nas skyes pa smos ci dgos //
analyzed: bsam gtan 'di yis brgya byin dag kyang gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro na mngal nas skyes pa smos ci dgos //
translated: By this meditation, even Indra goes to the city of Yama, what to speak of one born from a womb.

original: zhi dang rgyas pa la yang regs kyi dbang gis chu yi sa bon las ni bsam gtan dkar por 'gyur //
analyzed: zhi dang rgyas pa la yang regs kyi dbang gis chu yi sa bon las ni bsam gtan dkar por 'gyur //
translated: For pacifying and increasing, by the power of the mantra, from the water seed syllable, the meditation becomes white.

original: dbang dang dgug pa la yang dmar po lus ni sreg par byed pa me yi sa bon bdag nyid do //
analyzed: dbang dang dgug pa la yang dmar po lus ni sreg par byed pa me yi sa bon bdag nyid do //
translated: For subjugation and attraction, it is red, and for burning the body, it is the fire seed syllable itself.

original: dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa la yang 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid do //
analyzed: dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa la yang 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid do //
translated: For the division and the expulsion, the seed of wind is like a cloud.

original: rengs pa dang ni phur bus gdab pa sogs la gser zhun dang mtshungs sa yi sa bon rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rengs pa dang ni phur bus gdab pa sogs la gser zhun dang mtshungs sa yi sa bon rang bzhin no //
translated: For the paralysis, the nailing down, and so forth, the seed of earth is like melted gold.

original: stong pa'i sa bon la ni sngon po'i mdog dang ljang gur 'gyur te bsad dang gso ba dag la'o //
analyzed: stong pa'i sa bon la ni sngon po'i mdog dang ljang gur 'gyur te bsad dang gso ba dag la'o //
translated: For the killing and the reviving, the seed of space is blue or green.

original: sa yi zad par kun nas chu yi gter du 'gro ba la ste rlung gi zad par char pa ni //
analyzed: sa yi zad par kun nas chu yi gter du 'gro ba la ste rlung gi zad par char pa ni //
translated: For the exhaustion of earth, it goes into the treasure of water. For the exhaustion of wind, the rain

original: nyams pa'i don te me yi zod par dag kyang sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhu ba'i don te me dag kyang //
analyzed: nyams pa'i don te me yi zod par dag kyang sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhu ba'i don te me dag kyang //
translated: is for the purpose of the exhaustion of fire. For the exhaustion of fire, the earth mandala is for the purpose of melting.

original: nyams pa'i don du chu yi zad par du 'gyur stong pa'i zad par mkha' la 'gro dang snang min la //
analyzed: nyams pa'i don du chu yi zad par du 'gyur stong pa'i zad par mkha' la 'gro dang snang min la //
translated: For the exhaustion of water, it becomes fire. For the exhaustion of space, it is for the purpose of moving in space and invisibility.

original: glang po'i bdag po gzhom ba la ni me yi sa bon nyid las gdong lnga pa yi bsam gtan 'gyur //
analyzed: glang po'i bdag po gzhom ba la ni me yi sa bon nyid las gdong lnga pa yi bsam gtan 'gyur //
translated: For the destruction of the lord of elephants, the contemplation of the five faces is from the seed of fire.

original: klu yi dbang po gzhom pa la ni mkha' lding dkar po chu yi sa bon bdag nyid can du 'gyur //
analyzed: klu yi dbang po gzhom pa la ni mkha' lding dkar po chu yi sa bon bdag nyid can du 'gyur //
translated: For the subjugation of the lord of the Nagas, the white Garuda becomes the seed of water.

original: bse dang seng+ge dag la rkang brgyad @135a *//
analyzed: bse dang seng+ge dag la rkang brgyad @135a *//
translated: For the subjugation of the rhinoceros and the lion, the eight-footed

original: 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid can //
analyzed: 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid can //
translated: one becomes the seed of wind, like the cloud at the end of the world.

original: rta yi dgra la bse zhes grags pa sa yi rigs kyi dbang gis lha min gzhom la khro bo skyes //
analyzed: rta yi dgra la bse zhes grags pa sa yi rigs kyi dbang gis lha min gzhom la khro bo skyes //
translated: For the subjugation of the enemy of the horse, the rhinoceros is known, born as Rudra for the subjugation of the asuras by the power of the earth family.

original: khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan sngags dang sangs rgyas gzugs kyang rnal 'byor pa yis dang por bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan sngags dang sangs rgyas gzugs kyang rnal 'byor pa yis dang por bsgrub par bya //
translated: The glorious mantra and the form of the Buddha of the all-pervading lord should first be accomplished by the yogi.

original: phyi nas nyi ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis gnas pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi nas nyi ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis gnas pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Later, by the divisions of the sun, the activities of immeasurable qualities are accomplished.

original: sngags dang gzugs brnyan ma grub par ni srid gsum gnas su ci yang 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin //
analyzed: sngags dang gzugs brnyan ma grub par ni srid gsum gnas su ci yang 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin //
translated: Without the accomplishment of the mantra and the image, nothing at all is accomplished in the three worlds.

original: de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag la sngags dang gzugs ni bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag la sngags dang gzugs ni bsgrub par bya //
translated: Therefore, O king, the mantra and the form should be accomplished by those whose own minds are completely free from stains.

original: dpa' bo g-yul gyi dus su lhung bar gyur ba zhes pa'am ni de bzhin chom rkun dbyangs pa dag /
analyzed: dpa' bo g-yul gyi dus su lhung bar gyur ba zhes pa'am ni de bzhin chom rkun dbyangs pa dag /
translated: ‚ÄúA hero fallen in battle,‚Äù or likewise a thief,

original: brgyad dang 'byung po'i mtshan mo mi yi bdag po ro bsreg sar ni bum pa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya //
analyzed: brgyad dang 'byung po'i mtshan mo mi yi bdag po ro bsreg sar ni bum pa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya //
translated: a singer, on the eighth or an inauspicious night, the lord of men should be bathed with eight pitchers at the cremation ground.

original: dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni rnam mang kha zas me tog dmar po rnams kyis rab mchod nas //
analyzed: dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni rnam mang kha zas me tog dmar po rnams kyis rab mchod nas //
translated: Having made abundant offerings of perfume, incense, lamps, various foods, and red flowers,

original: mgo dang snying ga dang ni spyi bo lte ba la sogs su yang rdo rje dgod pa rab byas te //
analyzed: mgo dang snying ga dang ni spyi bo lte ba la sogs su yang rdo rje dgod pa rab byas te //
translated: one should place the vajras on the head, heart, crown, navel, and so forth.

original: thab khung zur gsum du ni rdul tshon dmar pos snying po'i padma gang zhig mtshan mar bcas pa dang // 'dab mar rgyal rnams mtshan ma phyogs su phyogs bral du ni de bzhin lha mo rnams kyi rang mtshan ma //
analyzed: thab khung zur gsum du ni rdul tshon dmar pos snying po'i padma gang zhig mtshan mar bcas pa dang // 'dab mar rgyal rnams mtshan ma phyogs su phyogs bral du ni de bzhin lha mo rnams kyi rang mtshan ma //
translated: In the triangular hearth, with red powder, one should mark the essential lotus, with its sign, and the petals, with the signs of the victors in the directions and the intermediate directions, and likewise the signs of the goddesses.

original: phyi rol ra kh'a gsum la phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin khro bo'i mtshan ma rnams byas nas //
analyzed: phyi rol ra kh'a gsum la phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin khro bo'i mtshan ma rnams byas nas //
translated: Outside, in the three corners, in the ma·πá·∏çala of the ten directions, one should make the signs of the wrathful ones.

original: @135b de yi g-yas min du ni yi dvags lag pad ral gri dkyil 'khor lag na g-yas su rkang pa'o //
analyzed: @135b de yi g-yas min du ni yi dvags lag pad ral gri dkyil 'khor lag na g-yas su rkang pa'o //
translated: To the left of that is the ghost Padmarakshasa, holding a sword and a lotus in his hands.üîΩThe adept should protect himself with the vajras of the lords of the directions, which are victorious over the faults of the mothers mentioned before.

original: sngar brjod ma mo'i skyon las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis bdag nyid srung ba rab byas nas; ;sngags pas thab kyi g-yas su khrag dang bcas pa'i sha rnams dag gis sbyin sreg nyid ni rab byed pa //
analyzed: sngar brjod ma mo'i skyon las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis bdag nyid srung ba rab byas nas; ;sngags pas thab kyi g-yas su khrag dang bcas pa'i sha rnams dag gis sbyin sreg nyid ni rab byed pa //
translated: The mantrin should perform the homa to the right of the hearth with flesh together with blood.

original: de yi sngags ni aom hrim phrem h'um phat kyi mtha' ste bcu yis bsgyur ba'i brgyar ni sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: de yi sngags ni aom hrim phrem h'um phat kyi mtha' ste bcu yis bsgyur ba'i brgyar ni sbyin sreg bya //
translated: His mantra is OM HRIM PHREM HUM PHAT, multiplied by ten, and the oblation should be performed one hundred times.

original: rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas 'chi med ri bo bzhin du g-yo ba med pa nyid du mtshan mo byed //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas 'chi med ri bo bzhin du g-yo ba med pa nyid du mtshan mo byed //
translated: Seated in the vajra posture, he should remain motionless like the mountain of immortality, performing the rite at night.

original: sbyin sreg rdzogs na ro 'dzin ral gri lta bur 'khyug cing 'bar la mche ba rnon po mig gsum pa //
analyzed: sbyin sreg rdzogs na ro 'dzin ral gri lta bur 'khyug cing 'bar la mche ba rnon po mig gsum pa //
translated: When the homa is finished, he should visualize the god, his trident blazing like a sword, with sharp fangs and three eyes,

original: gang zhig sgra sgrog sa yang rkang pas rnam par 'gems shing sgrub pa po ni 'jigs par byed pa de //
analyzed: gang zhig sgra sgrog sa yang rkang pas rnam par 'gems shing sgrub pa po ni 'jigs par byed pa de //
translated: roaring and trampling the earth with his foot, terrifying the adept.

original: thab kyi mtha' ru gnas nas ka ha ka ha dgod par byed cing 'jigs pa'i lus kyis gar byed de //
analyzed: thab kyi mtha' ru gnas nas ka ha ka ha dgod par byed cing 'jigs pa'i lus kyis gar byed de //
translated: Standing around the fire, he laughs ka ha ka ha, and dances with a terrifying body.

original: de mthong nas ni 'jigs pa'i sngags pa sems nyams skad cig gis ni gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de mthong nas ni 'jigs pa'i sngags pa sems nyams skad cig gis ni gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: Seeing him, the frightened mantrin, his mind disturbed, in an instant goes to the city of the Lord of Death.

original: ro sreg gnas su sngags pas dngos grub rgyur ni lha min dbang po las kyang 'jigs par mi bya ste //
analyzed: ro sreg gnas su sngags pas dngos grub rgyur ni lha min dbang po las kyang 'jigs par mi bya ste //
translated: In the cremation ground, the mantrin should not be afraid of even the lord of the demigods, for he is the cause of power.

original: g-yo ba med pa'i sems mthong nas ni slar yang bsgrubs pas 'byung po'i mgon po 'di skad smra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: g-yo ba med pa'i sems mthong nas ni slar yang bsgrubs pas 'byung po'i mgon po 'di skad smra bar 'gyur //
translated: Seeing the unwavering mind, the Lord of Spirits again speaks, saying,

original: dpa' bo bzang po khyod kyis bdag ni grub bo mtha' dag smos shig da ni bdag gis ci zhig bgyi //
analyzed: dpa' bo bzang po khyod kyis bdag ni grub bo mtha' dag smos shig da ni bdag gis ci zhig bgyi //
translated: ‚ÄúO hero, I am satisfied with you. Tell me everything. Now what can I do for you?‚Äù

original: de skad brjod na sgrub pa po yis gzhan gyi don du rang yid la 'dod don du gnyer bar bya //
analyzed: de skad brjod na sgrub pa po yis gzhan gyi don du rang yid la 'dod don du gnyer bar bya //
translated: When he says this, the adept should request for the sake of others what he desires for himself.

original: ral gri reg pa bcud kyi dbang @136a *//
analyzed: ral gri reg pa bcud kyi dbang @136a *//
translated: The sword, the touch, the elixir,

original: po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ril bu ro tsa na dang mig sman dang // rkang pa byug dang shing lham dag dang 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub brgyad po khyod kyis bdag la stsol; ;dbye dang bskrad pa dang ni srid pa gzhom pa nyid dang rengs pa dang ni dgug pa dag dang dbang //
analyzed: po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ril bu ro tsa na dang mig sman dang // rkang pa byug dang shing lham dag dang 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub brgyad po khyod kyis bdag la stsol; ;dbye dang bskrad pa dang ni srid pa gzhom pa nyid dang rengs pa dang ni dgug pa dag dang dbang //
translated: Divination, exorcism, the destruction of existence, paralysis, summoning, and enthrallment,

original: bdag gi dngos grub thams cad mdzod cig de yis slar yang 'di dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o smra //
analyzed: bdag gi dngos grub thams cad mdzod cig de yis slar yang 'di dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o smra //
translated: grant me all accomplishments. He replies, I will do all of this again.üîΩ Having accomplished the lord of spirits, the adept, the lord of men, goes to the underworld, the sky,

original: 'byung po'i dbang po bsgrubs nas mi yi bdag po sgrub pa po ni sa 'og dag dang bar snang dang // lha yi mchog gi khang pa dang ni lhun po'i rtse dang rgya mtsho'i pha rol gang yin der 'gro ste //
analyzed: 'byung po'i dbang po bsgrubs nas mi yi bdag po sgrub pa po ni sa 'og dag dang bar snang dang // lha yi mchog gi khang pa dang ni lhun po'i rtse dang rgya mtsho'i pha rol gang yin der 'gro ste //
translated: the celestial palace of the supreme gods, the peak of Mount Meru, and the other side of the ocean,

original: de la zhon pa phyag na ral gri thogs bas sa yi steng gi gnas su 'jig rten bya ba byed //
analyzed: de la zhon pa phyag na ral gri thogs bas sa yi steng gi gnas su 'jig rten bya ba byed //
translated: mounted on him, wielding a sword in his hand, he performs worldly activities on the surface of the earth.

original: de phyir sems can don gyi slad du mchog gi snying rje yis ni lha min dbang po bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: de phyir sems can don gyi slad du mchog gi snying rje yis ni lha min dbang po bsgrub par bya //
translated: Therefore, for the sake of sentient beings, one should accomplish the lord of the asuras through supreme compassion.

original: ming gi dang po thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: ming gi dang po thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o //
translated: The first letter of the name becomes the mind vajra, the lord of men, the god and goddess.

original: gsung gi rdo rje ming gi yi ge thams cad de las lhag pa dag kyang sku yi rdo rje ste //
analyzed: gsung gi rdo rje ming gi yi ge thams cad de las lhag pa dag kyang sku yi rdo rje ste //
translated: The speech vajra is all the letters of the name, and the body vajra is more than that.

original: de las yan lag so so yan lag so so'i sngags ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te bklags pas grub pa brgya lam na //
analyzed: de las yan lag so so yan lag so so'i sngags ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur te bklags pas grub pa brgya lam na //
translated: From that, the individual limbs become the many individual mantras, accomplished by recitation.

original: bsgom bya mchod bya bzla bya rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis thugs gsung sku yi dbye bas so //
analyzed: bsgom bya mchod bya bzla bya rang gi rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis thugs gsung sku yi dbye bas so //
translated: The object of meditation, the object of worship, and the object of repetition are divided into mind, speech, and body by the power of one's own buddha family.

original: so sor sngags kyi rigs ni nges par bye ba bzlas par rab tu 'gyur te rab tu grags pa'o //
analyzed: so sor sngags kyi rigs ni nges par bye ba bzlas par rab tu 'gyur te rab tu grags pa'o //
translated: The individual mantra families are definitely repeated a hundred million times, and they become well-known.

original: sbyin sreg de las bcu yi cha shas rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis grub par @136b 'gyur ba ji srid nyid //
analyzed: sbyin sreg de las bcu yi cha shas rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis grub par @136b 'gyur ba ji srid nyid //
translated: By the power of the natural qualities, the fire offering is a tenth part of that, and one becomes accomplished for as long as it lasts.

original: phyi nas zhi ba la sogs rnams la 'bras bu ster bar rab 'gyur rnam pa gzhan du 'grub mi 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi nas zhi ba la sogs rnams la 'bras bu ster bar rab 'gyur rnam pa gzhan du 'grub mi 'gyur //
translated: Later, they will certainly bestow the fruit on ≈öiva and the others, but not otherwise.

original: bsam gtan dang bcas bzlas dang sbyin sreg brtul zhugs nges ldan rnams kyis sngags kyi skye gnas bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang bcas bzlas dang sbyin sreg brtul zhugs nges ldan rnams kyis sngags kyi skye gnas bsgrub par bya //
translated: Those who are endowed with concentration, repetition, fire sacrifice, and observances should accomplish the birth of the mantra.

original: grub pa lcags gsum gyis bcings mkha' la 'gro ba'i sha yi ril bus mkha' la spyod pa nyid dag ster //
analyzed: grub pa lcags gsum gyis bcings mkha' la 'gro ba'i sha yi ril bus mkha' la spyod pa nyid dag ster //
translated: The pill of flesh that flies through the sky, bound by the three metals, bestows the state of flying through the sky.

original: khyi dang rta la sogs pa'i sgron ma rnams kyis lus la bkres skom la sogs nad rnams 'phrog par byed //
analyzed: khyi dang rta la sogs pa'i sgron ma rnams kyis lus la bkres skom la sogs nad rnams 'phrog par byed //
translated: The lamps of dogs, horses, and so forth, take away the diseases of hunger, thirst, and so forth, from the body.

original: de dag rnams kyi mig dang mkhris pa rnams kyis mi mchog rnams kyi mig smen sa ni rab 'phyed dang // mi snang ba dang dbang du bya ba na chung yid 'phrog dpal ldan dur khrod du ni bsgrubs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi mig dang mkhris pa rnams kyis mi mchog rnams kyi mig smen sa ni rab 'phyed dang // mi snang ba dang dbang du bya ba na chung yid 'phrog dpal ldan dur khrod du ni bsgrubs pa'o //
translated: The eye ointment of their eyes and bile, the supreme human eye ointment, is applied in the glorious cemetery for the sake of invisibility, subjugation, and captivating a young woman.

original: nag po'i brgyad kyi mtshan mo dag gam yang na ma nu'i nyin zhag la ni dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas //
analyzed: nag po'i brgyad kyi mtshan mo dag gam yang na ma nu'i nyin zhag la ni dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas //
translated: On the eighth day of the dark fortnight, or on a day of MƒÅgha, one should construct the ma·πá·∏çala.

original: srung ba dag kyang kun nas byas te de yi dbus su sha yi ril bu dag gam mig sman ni //
analyzed: srung ba dag kyang kun nas byas te de yi dbus su sha yi ril bu dag gam mig sman ni //
translated: Having made the protection rite all around, in the middle of it one should place a pill of flesh or collyrium.

original: byas nas shin tu dri bzang me tog rnams kyis yang dag mchod de sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya //
analyzed: byas nas shin tu dri bzang me tog rnams kyis yang dag mchod de sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya //
translated: Having made offerings with very fragrant flowers, one should perform the recitation of the mantra.

original: ji srid mkha' la nyi ma bzhin du 'od zer 'phro ba'i bar te de nas blangs la gzung bar bya //
analyzed: ji srid mkha' la nyi ma bzhin du 'od zer 'phro ba'i bar te de nas blangs la gzung bar bya //
translated: As long as it emits light rays like the sun in the sky, then one should take it and hold it.

original: 'tsho bar pho nya de ni 'tsho la nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas na sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'tsho bar pho nya de ni 'tsho la nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas na sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur //
translated: If the messenger lives, he should stand in the direction of the sky; if he dies, he will be revived.

original: pho nya'i dri ba mi mnyam pa gang nges par bde ba'i 'bras ster mnyam pa 'chi ba ster bar brjod //
analyzed: pho nya'i dri ba mi mnyam pa gang nges par bde ba'i 'bras ster mnyam pa 'chi ba ster bar brjod //
translated: It is said that an uneven question from the messenger will certainly give the result of life, while an even one will give death.

original: pho nya sprul la sogs pa'i ming dag rab tu brjod na de las sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: pho nya sprul la sogs pa'i ming dag rab tu brjod na de las sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur //
translated: If the names of the messengers, such as NƒÅgƒ´, are uttered, then he will die even if revived.

original: @137a *// gal te srog ni rab tu 'jug la dris na dge bar 'gyur te 'byung pa la ni dge min 'gyur //
analyzed: @137a *// gal te srog ni rab tu 'jug la dris na dge bar 'gyur te 'byung pa la ni dge min 'gyur //
translated: If the life [breath] moves in the right [nostril], it is good; if it moves in the left, it is not good.

original: pho nya'i rkang pa g-yon pa mdun nan chung mar brjod g-yas pa mdun du yin na skyes pa'o //
analyzed: pho nya'i rkang pa g-yon pa mdun nan chung mar brjod g-yas pa mdun du yin na skyes pa'o //
translated: If the left foot of the messenger is in front, it is said to be the wife; if the right foot is in front, it is the husband.

original: lag pas rang gi yan lag la gang du reg pa'i phyogs 'dir mi de so yis zin pa ste //
analyzed: lag pas rang gi yan lag la gang du reg pa'i phyogs 'dir mi de so yis zin pa ste //
translated: In whatever place the man touches his own limb with his hand, he will bite there.

original: mig dang kha ni rab tu gdangs pa dag dang rna ba'i rtsa bar nag po yang ni 'chi bar brjod //
analyzed: mig dang kha ni rab tu gdangs pa dag dang rna ba'i rtsa bar nag po yang ni 'chi bar brjod //
translated: If the eyes and the mouth are wide open, and there is a black spot at the base of the ear, it is said that he will die.

original: gal te snying ga'i padma dkar por sgra ni cung zad gyur na de ni rab tu bsdu bar bya //

original: der ni snying po dag nas ya yig 'gro ste yon tan dbang gis phyi rol thams cad snga ma bzhin //
analyzed: der ni snying po dag nas ya yig 'gro ste yon tan dbang gis phyi rol thams cad snga ma bzhin //
translated: there the essence goes to Ya, and all the outer [letters] are as before by the power of the qualities.

original: yi ge rnams kyi yan lag mchog las mdun du dbyangs kyi 'khyud pa dag ni ma ru rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: yi ge rnams kyi yan lag mchog las mdun du dbyangs kyi 'khyud pa dag ni ma ru rab tu 'gyur //
translated: From the supreme limb of the letters, in front the embrace of the vowels becomes Maru.

original: yi ge rnams kyi sde mtha'i yi ge rdo rje rigs kyi dbang gis lnga pa h'am dang sam du gsungs //
analyzed: yi ge rnams kyi sde mtha'i yi ge rdo rje rigs kyi dbang gis lnga pa h'am dang sam du gsungs //
translated: By the power of the Vajra family, the last letter of the group of letters is said to be the fifth, Ha·πÉ and Sa·πÉ.

original: thig le gnyis kyis dbyangs mchog sbyar ba la ni 'di yang bdag gis shes rab yi ge au ru 'gyur //
analyzed: thig le gnyis kyis dbyangs mchog sbyar ba la ni 'di yang bdag gis shes rab yi ge au ru 'gyur //
translated: The syllable u, which is my wisdom, is formed by the union of the two bindus with the supreme melody.

original: mam mu:ham su:manydzu:nyid ni padma nor 'dab la ste nyi ma'i 'dab ma la //
analyzed: mam mu:ham su:manydzu:nyid ni padma nor 'dab la ste nyi ma'i 'dab ma la //
translated: Mam, muh, ham, su, mju, and nyid are on the lotus petals of the jewel and sun petals.

original: phyi rol tu shr'i badzra gho sha: sa dang ldan pa'i ma/nta bha dra h'um dang phat du 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi rol tu shr'i badzra gho sha: sa dang ldan pa'i ma/nta bha dra h'um dang phat du 'gyur //
translated: The external is shar vajra ghosha, and the ma endowed with the earth is nat bhadra hum phat.

original: bsgrub bya 'dir ni lte ba la ste che ge mo yang mdzod cig dpal ldan zhi ba sogs la bskul //
analyzed: bsgrub bya 'dir ni lte ba la ste che ge mo yang mdzod cig dpal ldan zhi ba sogs la bskul //
translated: The one to be accomplished is here at the navel, and also please do so and so for the glorious peace, and so on.

original: de bzhin sngar brjod 'khor lo rnam dag la yang rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri bar bya bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin sngar brjod 'khor lo rnam dag la yang rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri bar bya bar 'gyur //
translated: Likewise, the name of the one to be accomplished should always be written on the pure wheel as stated before.

original: 'di dag thams cad bdag gi drin las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis mi rnams kyi sa ni 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad bdag gi drin las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis mi rnams kyi sa ni 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: All of these are accomplished by humans through my kindness, by the command of the Lord of Conquerors.

original: sgra ni gang zhig snying ga'i phyogs na yod pa mi mchog rnams kyi ni rna ba'i bugs thos gyur pa //
analyzed: sgra ni gang zhig snying ga'i phyogs na yod pa mi mchog rnams kyi ni rna ba'i bugs thos gyur pa //
translated: The sound that exists in the region of the heart, heard by the ear holes of the supreme humans,üîΩ on that, the mind of humans is one.

original: de la mi yi sems ni gcig @140a *//
analyzed: de la mi yi sems ni gcig @140a *//
translated: üîΩOm, hum, tram, hrƒ´·∏•, ƒÅ·∏•, kham, and the syllable ha are the seven syllables.üîΩ The one to be accomplished is in the middle of the lotus, and also please do so and so for the glorious peace, and so on.üîΩ The external is shar vajra ghosha, and the ma endowed with the earth is nat bhadra hum phat.üîΩ The one to be accomplished is here at the navel, and also please do so and so for the glorious peace, and so on.üîΩ The external is shar vajra ghosha, and the ma endowed with the earth is nat bhadra hum phat.üîΩ The one to be accomplished is here at the navel, and also please do so and so for the glorious peace, and so on.üîΩ The external is shar vajra ghosha, and the ma endowed with the earth is nat bhadra hum phat.üîΩ The one to be accomplished is here at the navel, and also please do so and so for the glorious peace, and so on.üîΩ The external is shar vajra ghosha, and the ma endowed with the earth is nat bhadra hum phat.üîΩ The one to be accomplished is here at the navel, and also please do so and so for the glorious peace, and so on

original: tu gyur par sbyar ba dag kyang ro ni mnyam par 'gyur pa ste //
analyzed: tu gyur par sbyar ba dag kyang ro ni mnyam par 'gyur pa ste //
translated: The taste becomes the same.

original: 'jig rten kun tu sgra ni gang zhig srid par skyes pas brjod pa da dang de ni de bzhin thos //
analyzed: 'jig rten kun tu sgra ni gang zhig srid par skyes pas brjod pa da dang de ni de bzhin thos //
translated: Whatever sound is possible in the world, that sound is heard just so, by one born into existence.

original: khyab bdag gi ni rnam shes nyid dang ring du thos pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
analyzed: khyab bdag gi ni rnam shes nyid dang ring du thos pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
translated: The consciousness itself of the all-pervading Lord, and even distant hearing, is cultivated by the yogi.

original: skyil krung bcing ba byas nas phan tshun so dag reg pa min par kha ni rnam par phye ba yis //
analyzed: skyil krung bcing ba byas nas phan tshun so dag reg pa min par kha ni rnam par phye ba yis //
translated: Having bound the crossed legs, with the teeth not touching each other, but the mouth slightly open,

original: phyi rol rlung dag bkug ste de dang bdud rtsir bcas pa lte ba'i dbus su rab tu bcug pa yis //
analyzed: phyi rol rlung dag bkug ste de dang bdud rtsir bcas pa lte ba'i dbus su rab tu bcug pa yis //
translated: the external winds are drawn in, together with the nectar, and inserted into the center of the navel.

original: kun tu gdung ba dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog cing mchog gi lus la dug kyang yang dag 'gog /
analyzed: kun tu gdung ba dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog cing mchog gi lus la dug kyang yang dag 'gog /
translated: This removes all burning, hunger, and thirst, and completely stops poison in the body.

original: dpral bar thig le dkar po dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bdud rtsi spro bar byed pa yis kyang ngo //
analyzed: dpral bar thig le dkar po dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bdud rtsi spro bar byed pa yis kyang ngo //
translated: A white drop on the forehead, surrounded by the vowels, radiates nectar.

original: kha yang bkab ste sna yi bu ga rnam pa gnyi ga dag nas phyi rol dag gi rlung ni ma lus pa //
analyzed: kha yang bkab ste sna yi bu ga rnam pa gnyi ga dag nas phyi rol dag gi rlung ni ma lus pa //
translated: Having also covered the mouth, all the external air is drawn in through both nostrils.

original: srog gi shugs kyis bkug ste dri ma med pa'i glog dang mtshungs pa thur sel rlung dang sbyar byas pa //
analyzed: srog gi shugs kyis bkug ste dri ma med pa'i glog dang mtshungs pa thur sel rlung dang sbyar byas pa //
translated: By the force of the prƒÅ·πáa, it is mixed with the apƒÅna wind, which is like a stainless lightning bolt.

original: dus kyis goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las zla ba nyi ma me yi dbus su ro ni mnyam par 'gyur //
analyzed: dus kyis goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las zla ba nyi ma me yi dbus su ro ni mnyam par 'gyur //
translated: Through the practice of the yoga of time, the moon, sun, and fire become equal in taste in the middle.

original: lus la zas la sogs pa dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog ste 'chi ba med pa nyid kyang ster //
analyzed: lus la zas la sogs pa dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog ste 'chi ba med pa nyid kyang ster //
translated: It takes away food and so on and hunger and thirst in the body and bestows immortality.

original: nyi ma las ni gzhan du phyogs te nyid 'od la gnas rang gi gri ba ma brtan pa'i mig gis blta //
analyzed: nyi ma las ni gzhan du phyogs te nyid 'od la gnas rang gi gri ba ma brtan pa'i mig gis blta //
translated: Looking with eyes steady in the gaze of the sun, one should look at the light that is separate from the sun.

original: phyi nas nam mkha' dag la mngon par brtag na ro mnyam skyes bu du ba'i kha dog mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi nas nam mkha' dag la mngon par brtag na ro mnyam skyes bu du ba'i kha dog mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: Later, when one observes space, the person of equal taste will see the color of smoke.

original: zla ba drug tu goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las sa la @140b gnas pa'i gter ni sa yi bu gar mthong //
analyzed: zla ba drug tu goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las sa la @140b gnas pa'i gter ni sa yi bu gar mthong //
translated: Through the practice of the yoga of time, in six months, one will see the treasure that exists in the ground in a hole in the ground.

original: yang na shing gi grib mar rab tu zhugs te nam mkha'i mthil du thig le'i phreng ba bsgoms pas so //
analyzed: yang na shing gi grib mar rab tu zhugs te nam mkha'i mthil du thig le'i phreng ba bsgoms pas so //
translated: Or else, having entered the shade of a tree, one should meditate on a garland of bindus in the middle of space.

original: nus ma gang zhig lte ba'i dbus nas gzhan gyi gnas su bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mthar 'gro ba //
analyzed: nus ma gang zhig lte ba'i dbus nas gzhan gyi gnas su bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mthar 'gro ba //
translated: The yoginƒ´ who goes from the middle of the navel to the other place, to the end of the twelve and the end of the part,

original: de ni lte bar 'gog pa dang bcas dri med glog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i gzugs can langs pa yang //
analyzed: de ni lte bar 'gog pa dang bcas dri med glog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i gzugs can langs pa yang //
translated: she, having stopped at the navel, is stainless like lightning, and arises in the form of a club.

original: 'khor lo nas ni 'khor lo'i bar du nges par dman zhing rol pa'i bgrod pas dbu ma'i rtsal bskyod //
analyzed: 'khor lo nas ni 'khor lo'i bar du nges par dman zhing rol pa'i bgrod pas dbu ma'i rtsal bskyod //
translated: From wheel to wheel, she certainly moves in the avadh≈´ti, the path of sport, by the power of the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´.

original: ji srid gtsug tor bug par btsan thabs nyid kyis phyi rol gyi ni pags pa dag la khab bzhin reg /
analyzed: ji srid gtsug tor bug par btsan thabs nyid kyis phyi rol gyi ni pags pa dag la khab bzhin reg /
translated: As long as she touches the skin externally, like a needle, in the aperture of the crown, by force,

original: de yi dus su thur du sel ba mchog gi btsan thabs nyid kyis steng gi lam du bskul bar bya //
analyzed: de yi dus su thur du sel ba mchog gi btsan thabs nyid kyis steng gi lam du bskul bar bya //
translated: at that time, she is urged on the upper path by the force of the supreme downward-clearing [vƒÅyu].

original: zung gi rlung dag 'gag pa na ni gtsug tor phug nas mchog gi grong khyer dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: zung gi rlung dag 'gag pa na ni gtsug tor phug nas mchog gi grong khyer dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: When the pair of vƒÅyus are blocked, she goes to the supreme city through the aperture of the crown.

original: de ltar yid la rdo rje rab tu sad pas yul dang bcas pa mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar yid la rdo rje rab tu sad pas yul dang bcas pa mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur //
translated: Thus, by the arousal of the Vajra Mind, one becomes a sky-farer together with the object.

original: mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin du 'gyur slar yang 'di ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sna tshogs yum //
analyzed: mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin du 'gyur slar yang 'di ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gi sna tshogs yum //
translated: And this is the Universal Mother of the yogis, the nature of the five superknowledges.

original: phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa yid dang nam mkha' la ni me long dag la gzugs bzhin te //
analyzed: phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa yid dang nam mkha' la ni me long dag la gzugs bzhin te //
translated: The illusory seal, in accord with the illusion, is in the mind and in the sky, like a form in a mirror.

original: 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed cing dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed cing dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed //
translated: It radiates many light rays, illuminating the three worlds, like a stainless lightning flash.

original: phyi dang lus la dbyer med yul dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas pa yi //
analyzed: phyi dang lus la dbyer med yul dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas pa yi //
translated: Inseparable from the external and the body, free from objects, the mere appearance, abiding in the sky,

original: sems dang sems byung la ni bdag gis 'khyud de 'gro ba du ma'i @141a *//
analyzed: sems dang sems byung la ni bdag gis 'khyud de 'gro ba du ma'i @141a *//
translated: the mind and mental factors are embraced by me.

original: gzugs kyi de ni gcig pu'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi de ni gcig pu'o //
translated: The form of the many beings is just one.

original: snying ni rnyog pa dang bcas las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag brtags pa'i ye shes phyag rgya btang bya ste //
analyzed: snying ni rnyog pa dang bcas las kyi phyag rgya 'di dag brtags pa'i ye shes phyag rgya btang bya ste //
translated: The mind, with its turbid water, should let go of the action seal, the wisdom seal, which is the examination.

original: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub slad du rgyal ba mchog gi skyed ma mchog gi phyag rgya gos pa med //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub slad du rgyal ba mchog gi skyed ma mchog gi phyag rgya gos pa med //
translated: The supreme mudrƒÅ of the mother of the supreme Victor, for the sake of perfect, complete enlightenment, is unstained.

original: rnam par 'gyur ba med cing mkha' mnyam mun bcom khyab byed rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya brtsegs par gnas //
analyzed: rnam par 'gyur ba med cing mkha' mnyam mun bcom khyab byed rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya brtsegs par gnas //
translated: The yogƒ´ should meditate on the sun, which is unchanging, equal to space, which destroys darkness, and which pervades the peak of existence.

original: ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig pa bsgom par bya //
analyzed: ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing dus kyi 'khor lo rjes su rig pa bsgom par bya //
translated: The sun, which has the splendor of pristine consciousness, robs the stains of existence and should be meditated upon as the wheel of time.

original: srid gsum phra rab gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes pa de bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med de //
analyzed: srid gsum phra rab gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes pa de bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med de //
translated: The subtle form of the three existences is not here, and likewise, consciousness itself does not exist.

original: sangs rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur //
analyzed: sangs rgyas shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur //
translated: The words ‚Äúthe pristine consciousness of the buddhas does not abide anywhere‚Äù are taught by the buddhas.

original: gang gis 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de bzung nas stong par lta byed pa //
analyzed: gang gis 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de bzung nas stong par lta byed pa //
translated: Those who are devoid of changelessness grasp emptiness and view it as empty.

original: de na gtso bos gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan //
analyzed: de na gtso bos gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan //
translated: The principal one taught the innate, changeless bliss of the body in the vehicle of mantra.

original: ba lang bes rta glang po'i mgon song mchod sbyin dus su lus kyi yul la khyod kyi dbang po ni //üîΩbde bar gzung bgyi gang de yul dang yul can rnams ni ye shes sbyor ba dag la 'geg pa ste //üîΩbslab ldan rnams kyi ba glang pags par so ma ba lla'i btung ba khrag dang bcas par gyur pa gang //üîΩde ni spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi bha ga'i rdul la gnas shing kun tu 'gro ba dga' ba'i gzugs @141b tshangs pa'i srog chags rnams kyi lus dang 'phrog byed ngag ste khyab 'jug kyang yid de dag rig byed gsum //üîΩaom yig de dag yi ge gsum ste zla nyi bsreg za de dag rnams dang yon tan rtse gsum mo //
analyzed: ba lang bes rta glang po'i mgon song mchod sbyin dus su lus kyi yul la khyod kyi dbang po ni // bde bar gzung bgyi gang de yul dang yul can rnams ni ye shes sbyor ba dag la 'geg pa ste // bslab ldan rnams kyi ba glang pags par so ma ba lla'i btung ba khrag dang bcas par gyur pa gang // de ni spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi bha ga'i rdul la gnas shing kun tu 'gro ba dga' ba'i gzugs @141b tshangs pa'i srog chags rnams kyi lus dang 'phrog byed ngag ste khyab 'jug kyang yid de dag rig byed gsum // aom yig de dag yi ge gsum ste zla nyi bsreg za de dag rnams dang yon tan rtse gsum mo //
translated: The bull, the horse, the elephant, the lord of the elephants, at the time of the sacrifice, your senses in the field of the body,üîΩare to be held in bliss. The objects and the subjects are blocked in the application of knowledge.üîΩThe skin of the cow of the one who possesses the training, the drink of the unripe palmyra fruit with blood,üîΩis the nectar of the moon of the crown, the dust of the bhaga, the form of the all-pervading joy, the body of the Brahma-creature, the speech of the all-pervading, and the mind of Vishnu. Those are the three Vedas.üîΩThose syllables are the three syllables, the moon, sun, and fire, and the three points of the qualities.

analyzed: rigs can lus kyi rigs la gzhan pa yul dang yon tan la gnas srid srung na da'i gzugs can te //
