analyzed: 'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang ba zhes pa bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni //
translated: This jewel of bliss is the passion of desire.

original: padmo nyon mongs zad pa ral gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed pa'o //
analyzed: padmo nyon mongs zad pa ral gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes sku chen rnam par mi phyed pa'o //
translated: The lotus is the exhaustion of afflictions, the sword is the vajra, and the great wisdom body is indivisible.

original: mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa //
translated: The curved knife cuts through ignorance, and the supreme six families are generated by these.

original: phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya //
analyzed: phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang de bzhin rig par bya //
translated: The aggregates, elements, sense faculties, and so forth are of one taste like space, and they should be known as such.

original: gang du nges par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs //
analyzed: gang du nges par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs //
translated: Where the form of the family is definitely impaired, that is said to be the form of the great one.

original: gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste //
analyzed: gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste //
translated: Where the suffering of samsara is impaired, that is said to be the great feeling.

original: gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o //
analyzed: gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o //
translated: Where the perception of samsara is impaired, that is the great vajra perception.

original: gang du 'khor ba 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dag ni rdo rje 'du byed kho na'o //
analyzed: gang du 'khor ba 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dag ni rdo rje 'du byed kho na'o //
translated: Where the increase of samsara is impaired, those are the vajra formations alone.

original: gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs //
analyzed: gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs //
translated: And where the state of sleep and so on is lost, that is consciousness.

original: gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid //
analyzed: gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid //
translated: And where the thing that is not consciousness is lost, that is the wisdom of the Sage.

original: 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams //
analyzed: 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad la sogs mchog gi rgyal ba mchog ni rnam pa drug ste rigs drug rnams //
translated: These are the six supreme Victors, Vairocana and so on, the six families.

original: gzhan gyi khams drug dbye ba @162a *//
analyzed: gzhan gyi khams drug dbye ba @162a *//
translated: The other six elements are the divisions

original: rnams te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba rnams //
analyzed: rnams te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba rnams //
translated: of earth, water, fire, wind, space, and peace.

original: gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni 'dzin ma'o //
analyzed: gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni 'dzin ma'o //
translated: Where all delusion is lost, that is LocanƒÅ, that is P·πõthivƒ´.

original: gang du nga rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa m'a ma k'i ste de ni chu nyid do //
analyzed: gang du nga rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa m'a ma k'i ste de ni chu nyid do //
translated: Where all pride is lost, that is MƒÅmakƒ´, that is water.

original: gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sogs dkar mo ste de ni me yin no //
analyzed: gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sogs dkar mo ste de ni me yin no //
translated: Where all passion is lost, that is PƒÅ·πá·∏çaravƒÅsinƒ´, that is fire.

original: gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sgrol ma yin te de ni rlung yang ngo //
analyzed: gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sgrol ma yin te de ni rlung yang ngo //
translated: Where all envy is destroyed is Tara, and she is the wind.

original: gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'//
analyzed: gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'//
translated: Where all hatred is destroyed is Vajradhatvi≈õvarƒ´, and she is space.

original: gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sna tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med do //
analyzed: gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sna tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med do //
translated: Where all avarice is destroyed is the Mother of the Multitude, and she is the immutable.

original: mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni yid dang nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig /
analyzed: mthong dang ma mthong gzugs ni yid dang nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig /
translated: The eye is that which sees visible forms, whether seen or unseen, in the mind and in space.

original: ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o //
analyzed: ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba bzhin du thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o //
translated: The ear of the Victorious One is that which hears sound from afar, as if it were very clear.

original: mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri ni thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang po //
analyzed: mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri ni thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna bzang po //
translated: The nose of the all-pervading Lord is that which perceives all smells, which create supreme bliss.

original: rang gi zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang yin de ni lce //
analyzed: rang gi zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang rtag tu myang bar byed pa gang yin de ni lce //
translated: The tongue is that which always tastes the nectar of one's own moon, which bestows bliss.

original: rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste //
analyzed: rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste //
translated: The sense of touch, which is the body of the vajra, is the one that always steals the vajra touch.

original: thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de ni 'di yi chos //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab rab tu 'grogs las bde mnyam la 'jug yid gang yin pa de ni 'di yi chos //
translated: The mind that enters into the bliss of union of method and wisdom is the dharma of this [vajra body].

original: dbye ba drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams //
analyzed: dbye ba drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams //
translated: These objects and subjects, divided into six divisions, are for the bodhisattvas together with their queens.

original: gzugs la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul @162b rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni //
analyzed: gzugs la gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag rgyal ba mchog gi yul @162b rnams rnam pa drug ste kun nas ni //
translated: These objects, form and so forth, are the six objects of the supreme victors.

original: dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste //
analyzed: dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste //
translated: They are pure, unborn, unceasing, the supreme bliss, unattached, and to be realized by wisdom.

original: khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min //
analyzed: khams gsum dag tu gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min //
translated: They are not to be realized by the sense faculties of all transmigrating beings in the three realms.

original: ye shes dgug par byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis //
analyzed: ye shes dgug par byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin tu stobs te de ni gzhug pa rmugs byed kyis //
translated: Here, the summoning of wisdom is again the power of the goad, which is the one that impels.

original: rengs byed de ni bcing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang //
analyzed: rengs byed de ni bcing ba nges par mchog gi bde ba'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang //
translated: That paralysis is certainly produced by the mudra of the supreme joy.

original: ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo de ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor lo de ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste //
translated: That wheel is made to turn by the wheel of gnosis by the vajra speed.

original: de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni rab gsal nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi sku la'o //
analyzed: de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni rab gsal nges par rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi sku la'o //
translated: Likewise, the wrathful goddesses are certainly in the body of the yoginis' tantra.

original: srid ba gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed pa ste //
analyzed: srid ba gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams dag la bsnun pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed pa ste //
translated: The slaying of the demons in the three worlds is certainly done by the blue club.

original: bcing ba khro bo mi g-yo dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab //
analyzed: bcing ba khro bo mi g-yo dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha' yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab //
translated: The wrathful one, the binding, is impaled by the stake of infinite diligence, like the sun at the end of time.

original: 'dod pas de yi brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'dod pas de yi brtson 'grus nyams pas sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod mdzes nyid kyis so //
translated: The paralysis of the one on the ground by the loss of his diligence through desire is done by Sumbha.

original: gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams //
analyzed: gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gsal zhing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams //
translated: The loss of magical power by the crown protrusion is certainly done by the wrathful goddesses as before.

original: yi dvags rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas tsartsi k'a la sogs pa spros par gyur ba ste //
analyzed: yi dvags rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas tsartsi k'a la sogs pa spros par gyur ba ste //
translated: For the sake of the maturation of the hungry ghosts, Ca·πõcikƒÅ and so forth are emanated.

original: skye bo rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams de bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du //üîΩklu rnams @163a *//
analyzed: skye bo rnams ni bsrung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams de bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du // klu rnams @163a *//
translated: For the sake of the protection of beings, the gods such as Indra are emanated in the directions and intermediate directions.

original: smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros //
analyzed: smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros //
translated: For the sake of the maturation of the nƒÅgas, the entire family of the hooded ones is emanated by the Vajra Holder.

original: lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen mo la sogs rnams kyang spros //
analyzed: lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen mo la sogs rnams kyang spros //
translated: For the sake of the maturation of the demigods, MahƒÅ≈õvƒÅnasƒ´ and so forth are emanated.

original: gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar //
analyzed: gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar //
translated: Whatever else is emanated is born from the elements in the ma·πá·∏çala of the lord.

original: sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'di dag rang gi lus la rig par bya //
translated: For the sake of all sentient beings, these many supreme qualities should be known in one‚Äôs body.

original: de bzhin rgyud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye ba ste //
translated: Likewise, the many tantras and mantras abiding in the families are the divisions of the yoginƒ´s and yogins.

original: 'di ni dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o //
translated: This is the two-fold consecration, which is due to the disciple's qualities, mundane and supramundane.

original: gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin dang // shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang //
analyzed: gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin dang // shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang //
translated: The one who touches the breast of Wisdom, the other who tastes the nectar and embraces, and the one who melts the bodhicitta in union with Wisdom, and the one who realizes the nectar of the fourth moment,

original: de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan //
analyzed: de dag thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan //
translated: all of these are certainly mundane, taught as the cause of the path by supreme compassion.

original: 'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mchog la rjes su sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mchog la rjes su sbyor ba'o //
translated: The supramundane consecration is the union with the supreme seal of the Lord of Conquerors.

original: sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid //
analyzed: sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid //
translated: It is merely an appearance of the mind, born from one's own mind, like a reflection in a mirror.

original: gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bsten bya ste //
analyzed: gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bsten bya ste //
translated: The one who is relied upon by all the Bodhisattvas and Buddhas, the one to be relied upon by the Lord of Yogins,

original: ye shes @163b mi lce rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing //
analyzed: ye shes @163b mi lce rab tu rgyas pa de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing //
translated: That wisdom fire, which is very expansive, burns all the hosts of demons and their objects.

original: lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed //
analyzed: lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed //
translated: It burns attachment to the body and so forth, and bestows the bliss of union to the yogis through the practice of years.

original: shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur //
translated: The wisdom of wisdom is the mind and its appearances in ten aspects.

original: dbang ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: dbang ni dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa //
translated: The initiation is stainless, like the moon, and is the reflection in the mirror of one who has entered this.

original: de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste //
analyzed: de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med nyid ni bzhi pa ste //
translated: From that, the bliss of nirvana, the unchanging innate bliss, is the fourth.

original: sangs rgyas zhal 'di gang gi snying dang kha la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhal 'di gang gi snying dang kha la gnas par gyur pa de ni dpal ldan bla ma'o //
translated: He in whose heart and mouth this face of the Buddha resides is the glorious guru.

original: nam mkhar kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi 'dzum rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa yis //
analyzed: nam mkhar kun nas zhen pa'i sems dang mig ni mi 'dzum rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs pa yis //
translated: The mind and eyes, which are attached to space, enter the path of the vajra without winking.

original: stong pa las ni du ba smig rgyu rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang // 'bar ba dang ni zla ba nyid ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: stong pa las ni du ba smig rgyu rab gsal dri ma med pa'i mkha' snang nyid dang mar me dang // 'bar ba dang ni zla ba nyid ma rdo rje rnams dang mchog gi cha dang thig le mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: From the empty [appear] smoke, mirage, clear and stainless light in the sky, a lamp, a flame, the moon, the sun, a vajra, the supreme part, and the drop.

original: de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
analyzed: de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
translated: In the middle of that, the form of the Buddha, free from objects, is the sambhogakƒÅya.

original: nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis bgrad pa'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste //
analyzed: nam mkha' chu 'dzin bral ba dag ni rnal 'byor pa yis bgrad pa'i mig gis blta bar bya ba ste //
translated: The sky, free from clouds, should be seen by the yogi with wide-open eyes.

original: re kh'a nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba dus kyi rtsal mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o //
analyzed: re kh'a nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba dus kyi rtsal mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o //
translated: Until the black line, radiating stainless light rays, is seen.

original: de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni chu la nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te //
analyzed: de la kun mkhyen gzugs ni chu la nyi ma lta bu gos pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te //
translated: The form of the Omniscient One, like the sun in water, unstained, with various colors,

original: rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul dang rnam par bral ba dag go sems @164a *//
analyzed: rnam pa kun ldan rang sems yul dang rnam par bral ba dag go sems @164a *//
translated: is the mind endowed with all aspects, free from objects, pure,

original: ni gzhan ba min pa nyid //
analyzed: ni gzhan ba min pa nyid //
translated: and not different from one's own mind.

original: gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'geg par rab bya ste //
analyzed: gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'geg par rab bya ste //
translated: When form is seen, one should block the life-force wind for each day and night,

original: 'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la yongs su bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o //
analyzed: 'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la yongs su bskor cing 'khor bar byed pa mthong gi bar du'o //
translated: until one sees the light-circle completely surrounding one's body.

original: zla ba drug gis sdom pa brtson rnams kyi reg byas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur //
analyzed: zla ba drug gis sdom pa brtson rnams kyi reg byas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur //
translated: For those diligent in the practice, the path-consciousness of equal, inferior bliss arises in six months.

original: chags dang chags bral mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo //
analyzed: chags dang chags bral mtha' thog la gnas skad cig ma yang khyab bdag gi ni dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo //
translated: The count of the breaths of the all-pervading lord increases in the final moment of the end of attachment and non-attachment.

original: aodd'a 'bar ba'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes dag gi dbus //
analyzed: aodd'a 'bar ba'i bar dang khyad par dga' ba lhan skyes dag dang ye shes dag gi dbus //
translated: Between the blazing of the flame and the special innate joy, in the middle of the wisdoms,

original: gnyid dang gnyid yur mtshams su rdo rje padma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bde ba gang //
analyzed: gnyid dang gnyid yur mtshams su rdo rje padma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la ni bde ba gang //
translated: the bliss of the union of the two vajras and lotuses at the juncture of sleep and drowsiness,

original: de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel 'gyur 'di la ngo mtshar med //
analyzed: de yi 'phel ba rab tu bya ste bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel 'gyur 'di la ngo mtshar med //
translated: its increase should be accomplished. There is no wonder in this increase by the power of the guru's definitive empowerment.

original: nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug ste lo yi sbyor bas rnal 'byor bzang po'o //
translated: Having conquered the demons of the afflictions, he enters the state of the victorious lord, and is thus a good yogi by the process of years.

original: sa yi rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu ba chu lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir //
analyzed: sa yi rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu ba chu lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir //
translated: The earth is not of the nature of solidity, and water is not of the nature of fluidity, because it is not liquid.

original: me yi rnam pa me min g-yo ba rlung gi lus ni gang zhig g-yo ba min pas rlung ma yin //
analyzed: me yi rnam pa me min g-yo ba rlung gi lus ni gang zhig g-yo ba min pas rlung ma yin //
translated: Fire is not of the nature of fire, and wind is not of the nature of motion, because it is not moving.

original: stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min //
analyzed: stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang blta bya dkar dang ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min //
translated: Although it is of the nature of emptiness, it is not color, because it is the object of sight, green and white, and various great colors.

original: rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya min te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so //üîΩn'a da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i @164b gnas su son pa lu gu rgyun du bcings pa'i rtsa //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad pa yang blta bya min te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so // n'a da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i @164b gnas su son pa lu gu rgyun du bcings pa'i rtsa //
translated: It is not the object of sight in all aspects, because of the power of the demon of the afflictions, the stain of one's heart.üîΩThe nƒÅ·∏çƒ´, bindu, part, and the place of the nectar of intuition, bound in a chain, is the path of the three: life, downward-voiding, and evacuative.

original: srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas padma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid //
analyzed: srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas padma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid //
translated: The lotus and vajra are endowed with the vajra and lotus, respectively.

original: rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste //
analyzed: rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su yul rnams yul can rnams ni 'byung dang rab tu 'jug pa ste //
translated: In the middle of the union of the two energies, the objects and the subjects arise and enter.

original: du ba la sogs ra rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams cad gsang bar bya //
analyzed: du ba la sogs ra rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag kyang gang zhig 'di dag thams cad gsang bar bya //
translated: The signs of the smoke and so forth are grasped, and all of this is to be kept secret.

original: dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod ba g-yas dang g-yon la bcing //
analyzed: dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bgrod ba g-yas dang g-yon la bcing //
translated: The life-energy is fully introduced into the central channel, and the movement of the sun and moon is held in the right and left.

original: phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslad ba yang //
analyzed: phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslad ba yang //
translated: The mind is placed in the mudra, and one abides in supreme bliss, and the vajra is fully drawn up.

original: padmar rdo rje'i sgra'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor ba bde ba'i slad du ste //
analyzed: padmar rdo rje'i sgra'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor ba bde ba'i slad du ste //
translated: The sound of the vajra in the lotus, or the tossing of one‚Äôs own hand lotus, is for the sake of bliss.üîΩThat bliss which is not the emission of the seed is the snatcher of the fear of death. This is the face of the glorious guru.

original: sa bon gtong ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal; ;sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o //
analyzed: sa bon gtong ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal; ;sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o //
translated: The earth enters into the water, and the water into the blazing fire, and the fire into the pure wind.

original: rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni //
analyzed: rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni //
translated: The wind is in the void, and the void is definitely the ten signs.

original: rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sku //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sku //
translated: The signs are of all aspects, the imperishable, supreme, invincible bliss, the body of gnosis.

original: ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub tu 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o //
analyzed: ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub tu 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o //
translated: From gnosis, the magical power of spiritual attainments comes to the human beings, the lords of men, in this very life.

original: 'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid do //
analyzed: 'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid do //
translated: The desire is definitely the emanation body, and the perfection is its speech.

original: 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni ao tta nyid //üîΩ@165a *// dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim pas 'di yi ni //
analyzed: 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni ao tta nyid // @165a *// dga' ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim pas 'di yi ni //
translated: The blazing is the emanation mind, and its supreme bliss is the gnosis of O·∏ç·∏çiyƒÅna.üîΩJoy is the body of perfect rapture, and with the supreme joy, the special joy, is its speech and mind.

original: gsung dang thugs so lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur //
analyzed: gsung dang thugs so lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid kyang bde 'byung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur //
translated: The innate joy itself, the source of bliss, is its gnosis vajra.

original: 'dra ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur //
translated: The similarity is the Dharma Body, bowed to by the three worlds, which is his speech.

original: gnyid yur gnyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o //
analyzed: gnyid yur gnyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o //
translated: The sleep is the Dharma Mind, and the sleep is the wisdom that conquers the fear of existence.üîΩThe syllable is the Pure Body, the part without vowels, and the nada in stages,

original: yi ge nyid ni dag ba'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le n'a da rim pa yis; ;bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge nyid ni dag ba'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le n'a da rim pa yis; ;bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o //
translated: the speech and mind of the Pure Body, the source of bliss, and the three vajras of wisdom abide in existence.

original: sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ni //
translated: The nature of waking and dreaming, and again the other, is the nature of sleep and the fourth.

original: lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par spyod cing g-yo med sems la zhen pa ste //
analyzed: lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par spyod cing g-yo med sems la zhen pa ste //
translated: The body is the abode, and the breath is attachment, the objects are the conduct, and the mind is attachment to immobility.

original: ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs las byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur //
analyzed: ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs las byang chub sems ni zhu ba la yang skad cig 'gyur //
translated: The abode of wisdom is the woman, and from the union the bodhicitta melts and becomes the instant.

original: sprul pa la sogs pa dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: sprul pa la sogs pa dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur //
translated: The four vajra states of the mind of the emanation and so forth are definitely well known in sequence.

original: de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su ste //
analyzed: de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus su ste //
translated: Thus, the four states of the mind are in the middle of the bindu of all living beings who abide in the three existences.üîΩThe lords of yoga should protect the all-pervading, bestowers of the result of the bliss of equality, for the sake of liberation.

original: rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar @165b bya; ;thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba'i sa bon mchog gi bde ba song la thar pa gang //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar @165b bya; ;thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba'i sa bon mchog gi bde ba song la thar pa gang //
translated: When the bindu is released, the seed of birth of the yogis is the supreme bliss.

original: de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su dor bar bya //
analyzed: de phyir 'khor ba'i bde ba'i skad cig 'dir ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su dor bar bya //
translated: Therefore, the practitioners of yoga should abandon all the moments of the bliss of samsara at all times.

original: gang phyir aa sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdang min zhing //
analyzed: gang phyir aa sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed gcig nyid rdo rje can gyi gdang min zhing //
translated: Because the vowels and consonants, the moon and sun, are not the single reality of the vajra possessor,

original: h'um yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod de //
analyzed: h'um yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod de //
translated: and because the syllable h≈´·πÉ does not desire the signs and complete transformation of other colors and forms,

original: 'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni //
analyzed: 'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni //
translated: The supreme organ, which is generated by the unchanging, and which is the loss of change, is endowed with the supreme organ.

original: rnam pa kun ldan thig le mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa 'di la'o //
analyzed: rnam pa kun ldan thig le mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sna tshogs sgyu ma 'dzin pa 'di la'o //
translated: This is the holder of the illusion of the diversity of the lord of victors, the bindu endowed with all aspects.

original: li sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du 'gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams //
analyzed: li sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul gyi yon tan du 'gyur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams //
translated: The eight vowels such as ‚Äúi‚Äù and so on, which are the qualities of the object, are divided by the half-vowel.

original: phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbu ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste //
analyzed: phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbu ma'i dbugs ni 'bab pa ste //
translated: The tastes and the arrows, divided by the mutual separation, are the vƒÅyu of the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´.

original: dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams //
analyzed: dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul gyi yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rnams //
translated: In the second conjunction, the long [vowels], divided by the mutual separation, are the qualities of the object.

original: slar yang thun mtshams gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi yon tan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams 'bab //
analyzed: slar yang thun mtshams gsum pa la ni shin tu ring po yul gyi yon tan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams 'bab //
translated: Again, in the third period, the very long [vowels], the qualities of the object, are the vƒÅyu of the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´.

original: de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bo ro rnams dbu ma yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs //
analyzed: de ltar thun mtshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bo ro rnams dbu ma yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs //
translated: In that way, the four periods are the sounds of the vƒÅyu of the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´, the tastes, and the arrows.

original: ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu sum cu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal bar dgu brgya nyid //üîΩdbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams dus sbyob @166a *//
analyzed: ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum cu sum cu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal bar dgu brgya nyid // dbyangs drug gi ni dbye bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams dus sbyob @166a *//
translated: The thirty consonants beginning with ka are distinguished by thirty divisions, thus making nine hundred.

original: gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
analyzed: gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
translated: The six vowels are distinguished by the divisions of space, space, time, and arrow, in the three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the three muh≈´rtas.

original: de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phye ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
analyzed: de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phye ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
translated: Likewise, the long vowels are distinguished in the three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the three muh≈´rtas of the daytime journey.

original: slar yang dbyangs drug dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
analyzed: slar yang dbyangs drug dag gis phye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
translated: Again, the six vowels are distinguished in the three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the three muh≈´rtas of the nighttime.

original: de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod pa dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
analyzed: de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod pa dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la //
translated: Likewise, the long vowels are distinguished in the three nƒÅ·∏çƒ´s of the three muh≈´rtas of the subsequent nighttime.

original: nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab //
analyzed: nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung dang 'jug pa mkha' mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab //
translated: In each day and night, the exhalations and inhalations of the breath, the six spaces, space, the moon, and the eyes descend.

original: snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya //
analyzed: snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya //
translated: Having gathered the previous empty [breaths], one should apply them to the central nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ in the equal and unequal [journeys].

original: phyi rol tu ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas //
analyzed: phyi rol tu ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gyur sgra gcan longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas //
translated: Externally, when RƒÅhu is in the other half of the eighth lunar mansion,

original: de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste //
analyzed: de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste //
translated: it is the half-breath in one‚Äôs own body, the illumination of the entire world free from darkness.

original: snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa dag tu thim pa'o //
translated: The first half is the dissolution of the entire triple world into emptiness, together with darkness.

original: de phyir de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug /
analyzed: de phyir de ni phug nas dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug /
translated: Therefore, the yogƒ´ who is endowed with the yoga of the KƒÅlacakra enters into that cave, alone, free from darkness.

original: zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thun mtshams bzhi la ste //
analyzed: zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thun mtshams bzhi la ste //
translated: The part of the supreme lord that is deficient in the moon and in excess in the sun is here in the four periods.

original: thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis //
analyzed: thun dang thun la nyin dang mtshan mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis //
translated: In each period, by the power of day and night, it moves, divided into half-periods.

original: sum cu rtsa drug dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa drug dus kyi pho nya nyis 'gyur mi bdag gzhan rnams tshes ni brgyad gnyis dbye ba la //
translated: By the division of the thirty-six double-fold messengers of time, the other lords of men move in the eight and sixteen lunar days.

original: gza' rnams @166b kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams du ma tshigs kyi tshogs la'o //
analyzed: gza' rnams @166b kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la ste slar yang gzhan rnams du ma tshigs kyi tshogs la'o //
translated: The eight divisions of the planets, and again the others, the many groups of stars.

original: rig byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma srid gsum skyed par mdzad ma mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs gzugs //
analyzed: rig byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma srid gsum skyed par mdzad ma mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs gzugs //
translated: The dakini of the form of the sky, the producer of the three worlds, the remainder of the breath of the time of the Vedas.

original: zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur //
analyzed: zla ba'i dbus su dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur //
translated: That which is inferior in the middle of the moon is the two-fold seal of the supreme king of lords.

original: gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dbye phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab mar thun tshod longs spyod mtha'//
analyzed: gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyad dbye phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab mar thun tshod longs spyod mtha'//
translated: That which abides in the sun is the end of the enjoyment of the periods in the directions and the directions without petals.

original: lhag ma 'khor lo'i lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o //
analyzed: lhag ma 'khor lo'i lha mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o //
translated: The remainder of the supreme terrifying goddesses of the wheel are all external and internal.

original: spen par bug ba mun can nyin zhag ces bya lha yis bla ma'i byed bcas mig dang mig gi grangs //
analyzed: spen par bug ba mun can nyin zhag ces bya lha yis bla ma'i byed bcas mig dang mig gi grangs //
translated: The one called the day of the dark fortnight of Saturn is the eye of the eye of the guru with the addition of the deity.

original: phyed bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes //
analyzed: phyed bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyur de rnams mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs rdo rje las skyes //
translated: The six and a half [signs] are the Vedas, born from the mind-vajra of the Lord of Supreme Conquerors.

original: sa skyes stong pa sprul zla nyi ma gza' lhag pa sangs mjug ring la yang stong pa sbrul mkha' gcig /
analyzed: sa skyes stong pa sprul zla nyi ma gza' lhag pa sangs mjug ring la yang stong pa sbrul mkha' gcig /
translated: The earth, the empty, the nƒÅga, the moon, the sun, and the planet Jupiter are one in the sky.

original: mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las byung //
analyzed: mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las byung //
translated: They are born from the pure speech of the Supreme Lord, and they are one with the sky and the eye.

original: gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung //
analyzed: gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' mkha' ro me de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las byung //
translated: The enjoyments of the moon, the sky, the sky, the taste, and the fire are born from the body-vajra.

original: mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug sprul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshong de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug sprul dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshong de bzhin nyid //
translated: The six tastes, the nƒÅga, and the times are one, and the half-ghatis are just so.

original: mkha' 'gro dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma //üîΩde phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag pa byas nas de rnams @167a *//
analyzed: mkha' 'gro dus kyi gzugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed ma // de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag pa byas nas de rnams @167a *//
translated: The sky-wanderers, the forms of the times, abide in the body and steal the life of living beings.

original: bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya //
translated: Therefore, at each time of the day, having blocked one's own path, one should practice them.

original: ji srid gza' rnams dag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las //üîΩde srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci //üîΩpho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems dang 'gyur med la //üîΩsgrib bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyis ma yin no //
analyzed: ji srid gza' rnams dag gi longs spyod rang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las // de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci // pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyu ba bla ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems dang 'gyur med la // sgrib bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyis ma yin no //
translated: As long as the planets are in their own or other's exaltation, in the breathing and movement,üîΩwill the messenger of time, the pervader, give the supreme in the three worlds?üîΩThe messenger, the subtle one, moves, abiding in the guru's speech, in the bodhicitta and the unchanging,üîΩto be known by the yogis free of obscurations, not by others with desirous minds.üîΩ

original: nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis sred pas bsnun pa rnams //üîΩyan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la yang mjug ring za //üîΩthun mtshams kun dang thun brgyad nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams //
analyzed: nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis sred pas bsnun pa rnams //üîΩyan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la yang mjug ring za //üîΩthun mtshams kun dang thun brgyad nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams //

face, in their own or other's parts of fortune, in their own or other's term, in their own or other's own sign, in their own or other's domicile of the year, in their own or other's domicile of the original: dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab par yan lag gsungs //
analyzed: dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab par yan lag gsungs //
translated: In each conjunction, the breaths are doubled, and the life-winds flow in nine hundred.

original: yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par //
analyzed: yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la thog ma'i nyin zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par //
translated: In two branches each, by the power of the first day, there is the first link, ignorance.

original: de phyir dus la sogs pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar bzhin gang yin de rnams so //
analyzed: de phyir dus la sogs pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar bzhin gang yin de rnams so //
translated: Therefore, the links are by time, etc., and the other nine are as before.

original: de ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis dag las 'gyur //
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni kun nas zla ba gnyis dag las 'gyur //
translated: Thus, in five ways, in time, there are two months altogether.

original: gang du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dang po'i zla ba de nyid kho na'o //
analyzed: gang du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa dang po'i zla ba de nyid kho na'o //
translated: Where one part of the moon is lost, that is the first month itself.

original: zla ba @167b drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyis //
analyzed: zla ba @167b drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel ba yan lag bcu gnyis kyis //
translated: By six months and three times, there is conception, by the twelve links of dependent origination.

original: drug pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang ba'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu zhugs; ;reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi ma dag gis rkang pa de 'dzin no //
analyzed: drug pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang ba'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu zhugs; ;reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan gyis ni zla ba nyi ma dag gis rkang pa de 'dzin no //
translated: The moon and sun are seized by RƒÅhu at the middle of the node.

original: nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de dag grub pa ster //
analyzed: nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de dag grub pa ster //
translated: The herbs seen by RƒÅhu at the time of day and night give success.

original: sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes spen //
analyzed: sa skyes khu ba gza' lag zla ba nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes spen //
translated: The herbs born on the earth are in the lunar mansions of A≈õvinƒ´, Bhara·πáƒ´, Rohi·πáƒ´, M·πõga≈õira, ƒÄrdrƒÅ, Punarvasu, Pu·π£ya, ƒÄ≈õle·π£ƒÅ, MaghƒÅ, and P≈´rvƒÅphƒÅlgunƒ´.

original: sngags pa lug la sogs pa'i khyim la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing can rnams te dus kun tu //
analyzed: sngags pa lug la sogs pa'i khyim la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing can rnams te dus kun tu //
translated: The herbs born in the lunar mansions of the sheep and so forth are in their respective places on the days of the week.üîΩThe lunar mansions of the moon and sun are for peace; the lunar mansions of A≈õvinƒ´, Bhara·πáƒ´, A≈õvinƒ´, and Rohi·πáƒ´ are for increase;

original: zhi la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang bsad pa dag la rab 'gyur gal te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o //
analyzed: zhi la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang bsad pa dag la rab 'gyur gal te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o //
translated: and the lunar mansions of M·πõga≈õira, ƒÄrdrƒÅ, Punarvasu, Pu·π£ya, ƒÄ≈õle·π£ƒÅ, and MaghƒÅ are for subjugation, summoning, separating, and killing, if they are in their own places.

original: zhi la dkar po'i zhal ta dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang gser mtshungs thun tshod lag pa la //üîΩrengs la ser po me yi thun la'o rmongs la gser dang nyi mchungs chu gter la ste dgug pa la //
analyzed: zhi la dkar po'i zhal ta dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang gser mtshungs thun tshod lag pa la // rengs la ser po me yi thun la'o rmongs la gser dang nyi mchungs chu gter la ste dgug pa la //
translated: For pacification, the white face is first; for prosperity, the white and golden face is for the first watch.üîΩFor paralysis, the yellow face is for the fire watch; for stupefaction, the golden face is for the water watch; for attraction, the red face is for the fifth watch.

original: dmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gter dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o //
analyzed: dmar po lnga pa dag las 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gter dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o //
translated: For subjugation, the sun and water face is for the sixth watch.

original: bsad la nag po'i zhal te ri bong la'o bskrad la nag dang dkar 'dir sbrul la mtshan mo'i mthar //
analyzed: bsad la nag po'i zhal te ri bong la'o bskrad la nag dang dkar 'dir sbrul la mtshan mo'i mthar //
translated: For killing, the black face is for the moon; for banishing, the black and white face is for the snake; for impeding, the black face is for the end of the night.

original: sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod byed po min //
analyzed: sa chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod byed po min //
translated: Earth, water, fire, wind, moon, sun, and the gods are not the life-force or enjoyer.

original: 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni @168a *//üîΩlongs spyod sems par byed //
analyzed: 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni @168a *// longs spyod sems par byed //
translated: By the power of the result of nonvirtue, I think of the life-force as the enjoyer.

original: sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don gnyer byed //
analyzed: sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags 'byung po'i tshogs ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams dag la don gnyer byed //
translated: The assembly of craving, suffering, and attachment is the host of spirits, the planets, and the RƒÅhu gods, who are intent on the life-force.

original: gang gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The one who is the cause of liberation is not the mind, which is peace.

original: dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam gsum yon tan dbang gi de yang gsum grangs 'gyur //
analyzed: dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med pa'i bdag nyid rnam gsum yon tan dbang gi de yang gsum grangs 'gyur //
translated: The first breath, which is of the nature of the three qualities, becomes three due to the power of the qualities.

original: de yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis tshes zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang sum 'gyur ni //
analyzed: de yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis tshes zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang sum 'gyur ni //
translated: That also becomes the lunar day due to the power of the object. Those again, tripled,

original: 'byung ba chu gter grangs 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsnun pa de dag rnams //
analyzed: 'byung ba chu gter grangs 'gyur slar yang de nas rgyu ma'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsnun pa de dag rnams //
translated: are struck by the divisions of the zodiac.

original: chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tshod bugs kyi grangs rnams so //
analyzed: chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gyur chu tshod bugs kyi grangs rnams so //
translated: The number of breaths in half a watch, doubled, is the number of breaths in a watch.

original: gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad gza' dang bcu rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste //
analyzed: gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad gza' dang bcu rnams kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste //
translated: This channel of time increases by two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, and ten.

original: de nas sde yi rab dbye rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum //
analyzed: de nas sde yi rab dbye rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum //
translated: Then, by the divisions of the army, the channel of time in the three worlds is in two ways.

original: kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba las //
analyzed: kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba las //
translated: The moon and sun, which grant the fruit of the bliss of union, are filled with the nectar of the moon and sun.

original: ji srid rig byed sbrul dang me ste nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can du rab tu gyur //
analyzed: ji srid rig byed sbrul dang me ste nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can du rab tu gyur //
translated: The Vedas, the snake, and fire are the knife, skull, and trident of the one who is certain.

original: 'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rab dbye yis //
analyzed: 'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rab dbye yis //
translated: The wheel, arrow, and ocean are the divisions of body, speech, and mind by the number of the qualities of the country.

original: gtso bo srung bar byed de bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so //
analyzed: gtso bo srung bar byed de bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba du ba la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so //
translated: The chief one, who grants the fruit of the bliss of union, is protected by the eight goddesses, beginning with DhumƒÅ.

original: de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can @168b gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugs //
analyzed: de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can @168b gyi cha yis 'khyud pa sna tshogs gzugs //
translated: Thus, the chief one, who resides in the sun, is embraced by the supreme portion of the moon, the form of variety.

original: lha mo sangs rgyas 'chi med rnams dang yul dang yul can sgra gcan zla ba nyi mas phyag 'os pa'o //
analyzed: lha mo sangs rgyas 'chi med rnams dang yul dang yul can sgra gcan zla ba nyi mas phyag 'os pa'o //
translated: The goddesses, the deathless buddhas, the country, the object, RƒÅhu, the moon, and the sun are worthy of homage.

original: gtso bo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang //
analyzed: gtso bo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang //
translated: The object of the supreme qualities of the subtle nature of the chief one is the inner and outer mudrƒÅ.

original: de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo'i sems las rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo'i sems las rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so //
translated: They are the dakinis who are born from the mind of the fierce Heruka, the supreme terror in the three worlds.

original: gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
analyzed: gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste //
translated: The principal lords, the three worlds, are the vajra of body, speech, and mind.

original: de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shes la sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di rnams so //
analyzed: de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shes la sogs rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di rnams so //
translated: They are embraced by their objects and qualities, and are these dakinis, Vajra, and so forth.

original: gzugs dang  dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya du ba rdul dang ni //
analyzed: gzugs dang  dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya du ba rdul dang ni //
translated: Form, taste, smell, and the others, then touch, smoke, dust, and so forth,

original: snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra can gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste //
analyzed: snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra can gyis kyang 'khyud pa ste //
translated: are embraced by sattva, rajas, and tamas, respectively, in the mind.

original: de dag rnams kyi dal rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi dal rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs rgyu ba las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di //
translated: Their path is the many paths of the six-limbed one, the swift, the crooked, and so forth.

original: brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas pa 'khor lo'i tshul //
analyzed: brgyad po rnams kyi rkang pa drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas pa 'khor lo'i tshul //
translated: The eight are the six-limbed one, the path of the eight, the wheel of the eight objects and qualities.

original: dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad de yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa //
analyzed: dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad de yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa //
translated: The first breath is divided into eight parts, and it is located in the object, the qualities, and all around.

original: mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyams te 'gro ba drug tu gnas //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma rnams dag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyams te 'gro ba drug tu gnas //
translated: Surrounded by the dakinis, it wanders by the power of the three movements, and it is located in the six migrations.

original: de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku //üîΩgang zhig dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal pa'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus @169a *//
analyzed: de yi dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku // gang zhig dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal pa'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus @169a *//
translated: In its middle is the Wheel of Time, embraced by the part that radiates nectar, the pure body.

original: kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The one who, having stopped the breath, enters the body of the Victor, is the Wheel of Time itself.

original: dbugs ni chad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te //
analyzed: dbugs ni chad pa'i mtha' ru rnam gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te //
translated: At the end of the stopping of the breath, there is no longer this three-fold movement, nor even the six-fold one.

original: thig le bkag pa 'gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: thig le bkag pa 'gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur //
translated: When the drop is blocked, the supreme lord of all, infinite bliss, enters at the time.

original: 'khor bdag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
analyzed: 'khor bdag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
translated: The yogi/nƒ´ should meditate on the face of the supreme guru, abandoning the bliss of the self of cyclic existence.

original: spyod pa sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams dgyes pa ma yin no //
analyzed: spyod pa sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams dgyes pa ma yin no //
translated: The yoginƒ´s are not pleased with the form of the conduct of the hero, which is most frightening.

original: gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim gyur te //
analyzed: gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim gyur te //
translated: The entire host of planets dissolves into the feet of the principal one by the yoga of time.

original: dbugs ni mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter song na thams cad stong par skul bar byed //
analyzed: dbugs ni mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter song na thams cad stong par skul bar byed //
translated: The breath goes into the sky, the sky, the sky-eye, the fire, and the ocean, and all are aroused to emptiness.

original: lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol tu ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la //
analyzed: lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol tu ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa spro dang sdud pa'i ngo bo la //
translated: By these years, externally, the supreme lord is in the form of the expansion and contraction of the feet.

original: rang rang tshad kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dbugs kyi dbus su 'gro dang gnas pa shes par bya //
analyzed: rang rang tshad kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dbugs kyi dbus su 'gro dang gnas pa shes par bya //
translated: By their own measures, the feet of the lord of victors should be known to move and rest in the middle of the breath.

original: stong pa la ni spen pa 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te //
analyzed: stong pa la ni spen pa 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te //
translated: In the empty, RƒÅhu enters by the power of its own motion, at the end of time.

original: stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mtsho chu gter zla ba'i nyin zhag longs spyod lhag ma rnams kyis nam gru'o //
analyzed: stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mtsho chu gter zla ba'i nyin zhag longs spyod lhag ma rnams kyis nam gru'o //
translated: The empty sky, the sky-ocean, the ocean, and the moon are the days of the nak·π£atras. The remaining enjoyments are the nak·π£atras.

original: rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho mig gi der ni sgra gcan 'jug /
analyzed: rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho mig gi der ni sgra gcan 'jug /
translated: RƒÅhu enters the sky-sky-space-space-ocean-eye days of its own path.

original: rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' @169b mkha' dus dus kyis lha yi blon po 'jug /
analyzed: rang gi bgrod par 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' @169b mkha' dus dus kyis lha yi blon po 'jug /
translated: The divine minister enters the sky-sky-space-space-time-time days of its own path.

original: nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa mkha' brgyad sbrul dang mig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra shis 'jug pa ste //
analyzed: nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa mkha' brgyad sbrul dang mig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra shis 'jug pa ste //
translated: The sky-sky-space-space-void-space-serpent-eye days are auspicious entries.

original: mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug /
analyzed: mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug /
translated: The sky-sky-space-space-eye-fire-water-treasure-number days are entries for the sun, etc.

original: mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin zhag rnams kyis zla ba der 'jug ste //
analyzed: mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtsho brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin zhag rnams kyis zla ba der 'jug ste //
translated: The sky-sky-space-space-ocean-eight-moon-arrow days are entries for the moon.

original: de yi dus su rgyal po 'gro ba dag ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi dus su rgyal po 'gro ba dag ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur //
translated: At that time, the kings of the moving [planets] will be diminished by their own measures.

original: de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun tu spyod pa 'di ni rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun tu spyod pa 'di ni rab tu 'gyur //
translated: Then, the conduct of the channels is as follows with respect to the rising of the moon and sun.

original: gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mda' dang ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsi //
analyzed: gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mda' dang ro dang ri bo nor rnams 'phel bar gyur pa gsang ba'i rtsi //
translated: One, two, three, ocean, arrow, corpse, mountain, wealth, increase, secret, elixir.

original: bug pa zhes bya sgo yi rtsar 'gyur bcu pa phra mo'i rtsa ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o //
analyzed: bug pa zhes bya sgo yi rtsar 'gyur bcu pa phra mo'i rtsa ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o //
translated: The channel called ‚Äúhole‚Äù is at the door, the tenth subtle channel is again on the upper path.

original: de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams dag tu 'gyur //üîΩgtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgo bo ri bong can gnas mgrin pa phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang // lte bar 'khor lo'i rtsi ni dus dang lag 'gro mi bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams //
analyzed: de ni sde yis phye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams dag tu 'gyur // gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang mgo bo ri bong can gnas mgrin pa phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang // lte bar 'khor lo'i rtsi ni dus dang lag 'gro mi bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams //
translated: It is divided into the six families, with qualities and objects, in the channels of the chakra.üîΩThe movement of the sun is in the ushnisha, heart, forehead, and throat, the channels of the chakra in the navel, the thirty-two and their doubles of the zodiac and the planets.

original: zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha' dag nyid rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dang // brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtsa ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams //
analyzed: zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad ma yin mtha' dag nyid rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dang // brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtsa ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams //
translated: The lunar mansions are not separate, all of them mixed together, and also by the mixed feet. The channels of the joints in the hands and feet, which are in one hundred and eighty-one, are divided into two.

original: gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i rkang @170a *//
analyzed: gtsug tor snying ga'i phyogs dang ri bong can dang nyi ma'i rkang @170a *//
translated: The crown, the heart, the moon, the sun, the feet, the throat, and the wheel are the eight places.

original: pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams //
analyzed: pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams //
translated: The remaining [planets] are the eight [planets] beginning with Mercury.

original: brgyad cu rtsa gcig tha ma rang gsal rnams bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gza' rnams te //
analyzed: brgyad cu rtsa gcig tha ma rang gsal rnams bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gza' rnams te //
translated: The last one is self-luminous. These are the eight planets, both peaceful and wrathful.

original: de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag zhabs la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa yis longs spyod cing //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi thog mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag zhabs la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa yis longs spyod cing //
translated: The first and last parts of these [planets] are enjoyed by the nƒÅ·∏çƒ´ of time, which is located at the feet of the Lord.

original: gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi skyed mrdo rje sku yi mkha' 'gro ma yis longs spyod do //
analyzed: gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi skyed mrdo rje sku yi mkha' 'gro ma yis longs spyod do //
translated: The end of the planets is enjoyed by the ·∏çƒÅkinƒ´ of the vajrakƒÅya, the mother of the three existences.

original: dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas de yi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas de yi rang bzhin dag tu 'gyur //
translated: First, whatever is the nature of emptiness, abiding in the field and the qualities, becomes its nature.

original: khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste //
analyzed: khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste //
translated: Again, having entered the elements and the skandhas, [it] is equal in the sense organs, such as the eyes.

original: sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab zhugs pa //
analyzed: sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab zhugs pa //
translated: Having entered the state of waking, dreaming, and so on, [it] perfectly enters into the supreme, equal, indestructible bliss.

original: rig ma sangs rgyas yum de rdo rje yi ni tshigs la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis btsal bar bya //
analyzed: rig ma sangs rgyas yum de rdo rje yi ni tshigs la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis btsal bar bya //
translated: The yogin should search for the Buddha‚Äôs mother, the knowledge consort, in the joints of the vajra.

original: gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gis mchog gi lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur //
analyzed: gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gis mchog gi lus la lha yi spyan du 'gyur //
translated: By the power of the principal‚Äôs body, the yogins will have the divine eye in the supreme body.

original: de yi gsung gi mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa shes par 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi gsung gi mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa shes par 'gyur //
translated: By the power of his speech, they will have the divine ear, and by the power of his mind, they will know the thoughts of others.

original: shes rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum sred pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum sred pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par 'gyur //
translated: By the power of the body of wisdom, they will remember their previous lives, which are based on the three cravings.

original: shes rab kyi ni gsung gi mthu las mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul du rab 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab kyi ni gsung gi mthu las mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul du rab 'gyur //
translated: By the power of the speech of wisdom, they will have the magical power of omnipresence throughout space.üîΩBy the power of the wisdom of wisdom, they will have the bliss of the supreme, which is indestructible at all times.

original: shes rab ye shes rang bzhin las ni gang zhig bde mnyam thams cad dus su gzhom du med par @170b 'gyur; ;lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis ma mthong pa dang srid pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes rang bzhin las ni gang zhig bde mnyam thams cad dus su gzhom du med par @170b 'gyur; ;lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis ma mthong pa dang srid pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: By the power of the divine eye, they will see with their eyes what is not seen, and the three existences.

original: lha yi rna bdag gi mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgra ni thos par 'gyur //
analyzed: lha yi rna bdag gi mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgra ni thos par 'gyur //
translated: By the power of the divine ear, one hears the sounds of the heart and mouth of beings.

original: de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor bdag las mi yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thams cad 'gyur //
analyzed: de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor bdag las mi yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thams cad 'gyur //
translated: In the same way, by the union of body, speech, and mind, the lord of men experiences all tactile sensations and so forth.

original: rtsa ni gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba bshang ba khu ba 'bab ba rnams //
analyzed: rtsa ni gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba bshang ba khu ba 'bab ba rnams //
translated: The three channels in the middle of the downward-voiding [channel] are the path for the flow of urine, feces, and semen.

original: srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te tha ma sangs rgyas zhal //
analyzed: srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu rgyu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te tha ma sangs rgyas zhal //
translated: The movement of those [winds] is ninefold, and the last is the face of the Buddha.

original: rna ba sna dang mig la rnam gnyis shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung ni lce dang bcas pa dang // thig le gtsug tor pug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes ba min pa rnams la rgya yis btab pa gang //
analyzed: rna ba sna dang mig la rnam gnyis shes par 'gyur te lce'u chung ni lce dang bcas pa dang // thig le gtsug tor pug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes ba min pa rnams la rgya yis btab pa gang //
translated: The two [channels] of the ear, nose, and eye are known as the two [channels], and the uvula together with the tongue and the bindu are the crown protuberance. The tenth is the seal upon the unknowable.

original: srog dang thur sel 'gags par gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod pa nyi ma'i gzugs su rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: srog dang thur sel 'gags par gyur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod pa nyi ma'i gzugs su rab tu 'gyur //
translated: When the life and downward-voiding [winds] are arrested, the shaking of the rabbit-holding [wind] becomes the form of the sun.

original: rdo rje padmas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed //
analyzed: rdo rje padmas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed //
translated: If the vajra and lotus are fully awakened, then this is melted by the flame of the form of the sun.

original: rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes gcig tu 'gyur //
analyzed: rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes gcig tu 'gyur //
translated: When the wind, moon, and sun are stopped, consciousness and wisdom become one.

original: de ltar de ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin //
analyzed: de ltar de ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rnam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin //
translated: In this way, in this way, and in this way, there are three, and nothing else exists.

original: zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang min pa nyid //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang min pa nyid //
translated: When the form of the moon and sun are eaten, there is never day or night in the sky.

original: thun mtshams de ni lus kyi dbus su rnal 'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o //üîΩphyogs zang zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni @171a *//
analyzed: thun mtshams de ni lus kyi dbus su rnal 'byor rnams kyi dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o // phyogs zang zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni @171a *//
translated: That period is the state of nectar for yogis at all times in the middle of the body.

original: mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta bar //
analyzed: mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta bar //
translated: Just as the form of the moon in the sky is of equal taste in the form of the sun,üîΩso also

original: srog dang thur sel zad par gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su de 'gag go /
analyzed: srog dang thur sel zad par gyur na gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su de 'gag go /
translated: when the life-force and downward-voiding [vƒÅyus] are arrested, there is clarity in the body, and at the time of siddhi, they cease.

original: zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams shing lam ni gnyi ga yi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po 'gag /
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams shing lam ni gnyi ga yi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po 'gag /
translated: The movement of the moon and sun is impaired, and the great life-force wind of both paths is blocked.

original: chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs //
analyzed: chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni rab tu zhugs //
translated: The water-born vajra is fully awakened, and the form of the great sun enters into the melted moon.

original: dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam gsum srid ba la gnas gzhom med legs par rab tu rtogs gyur pa //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam gsum srid ba la gnas gzhom med legs par rab tu rtogs gyur pa //
translated: The unity of existence and nonexistence, abiding in the three existences, is fully realized as indestructible.
