original: de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa ste gang la gnyis ni cung zad med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro //
analyzed: de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa ste gang la gnyis ni cung zad med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro //
translated: At that time, the yogi/nƒ´ goes to the supreme state where there is not even the slightest duality.

original: khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges pa ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs //
analyzed: khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges pa ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs //
translated: The wrathful ones, the buddhas, the goddesses, the definite ones, the vajra of taste, K·π£itigarbha, and so forth,üîΩthe minds of supreme joy, manifest in the sky at the time of the yogi/nƒ´'s accomplishment.

original: rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa la grub pa'i dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur; ;de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri beng can gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa la grub pa'i dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur; ;de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri beng can gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur //
translated: Their desired spiritual powers will occur at dawn or midnight of the full moon.

original: rin po che 'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyi sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur //
analyzed: rin po che 'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyi sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur //
translated: The rain of flowers and jewels falls on the earth by the power of the conjunction of the supreme moment.

original: lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur //
analyzed: lus ni dang zhing rdul phran nyams pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur //
translated: The body becomes pure and free of dust, like space, and is perfected with the major and minor marks.

original: sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang //
analyzed: sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du snang //
translated: The entire threefold world appears pure and free of obscurations, like a dream.

original: skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste //
analyzed: skad ni kun nas chad pa med cing du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste //
translated: Speech becomes uninterrupted and enters the hearts of others through various languages.

original: sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang @171b zhing mi g-yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas 'khyud pa'o //üîΩsa las chu dang rtse mo can dang rlung gi rdul phran phye nas chu yi khams la 'jug par byed //
analyzed: sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang @171b zhing mi g-yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas 'khyud pa'o // sa las chu dang rtse mo can dang rlung gi rdul phran phye nas chu yi khams la 'jug par byed //
translated: The mind is filled with the bliss of the holy and embraced by the innate at all times.üîΩFrom earth, water, and wind, the particles are separated and enter the water element.

original: chu las sa me rlung phye rtse mo can la rtse mo can las sa dang chu dang rlung phye ste //
analyzed: chu las sa me rlung phye rtse mo can la rtse mo can las sa dang chu dang rlung phye ste //
translated: From water, earth, fire, and wind are separated, and from wind, earth, water, and fire are separated.

original: rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong pa la //
analyzed: rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong pa la //
translated: From the wind, the wind, earth, water, and fire are differentiated. The wind of karma is also empty.

original: rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gis gang zhig las kyi rlung gis bsnun pa gzhan rnams zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro //
analyzed: rnam gsum srid pa'i dbang gis gang zhig las kyi rlung gis bsnun pa gzhan rnams zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro //
translated: By the power of the three existences, those who are struck by the wind of karma go to other fields.

original: sangs rgyas zhing na ma lus las can min par srid gsum skyed par mdzad pa rnam par gzigs nas ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing na ma lus las can min par srid gsum skyed par mdzad pa rnam par gzigs nas ni //
translated: Having seen that all the buddha-fields are not without beings, he creates the three existences.

original: gnyi ga ro mnyam dag pa'i rdul la sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor ba ste //
analyzed: gnyi ga ro mnyam dag pa'i rdul la sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor ba ste //
translated: In the pure particles of both, all the buddhas are surrounded by the bodhisattvas.

original: so so re re'i ro yi rdul la gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje'i sras po rnams kyis bskor //
analyzed: so so re re'i ro yi rdul la gnyis ka'i rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje'i sras po rnams kyis bskor //
translated: In the particles of the taste of each one, the vajra sons are surrounded by the power of both families.

original: sa la sogs pa'i rdul la ma lus rigs la gnas pa mtha' yas mi g-yo sogs la rab zhugs rnams //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa'i rdul la ma lus rigs la gnas pa mtha' yas mi g-yo sogs la rab zhugs rnams //
translated: In the particles of earth and so forth, the infinite ones abiding in the families, well-entered into the immovable and so forth,

original: de dag rnams dang thabs cig rdo rje sems dpa' 'chags pa'i dus kyi par du mkha' la rnam par bzhugs //
analyzed: de dag rnams dang thabs cig rdo rje sems dpa' 'chags pa'i dus kyi par du mkha' la rnam par bzhugs //
translated: together with them, Vajrasattva dwells in space until the time of creation.

original: yang dag 'dzin par byed pas sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin rdul phran 'dzin //
analyzed: yang dag 'dzin par byed pas sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin rdul phran 'dzin //
translated: The earth, water, fire, wind, and space particles are held together by the correct grasping.

original: srub par byed pas tha dad rdul phran mtha' dag gcig tu gyur gyi bar du srub par byed pa ste //
analyzed: srub par byed pas tha dad rdul phran mtha' dag gcig tu gyur gyi bar du srub par byed pa ste //
translated: The churning causes the individual particles to be churned together until they become one.

original: slar yang de dag rnams ni phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i dngos la chung ngu'i dngos rnams so //
analyzed: slar yang de dag rnams ni phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i dngos la chung ngu'i dngos rnams so //
translated: Then they join together again, the primary elements with the derivative elements.

original: dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen po thams cad dag @172a *//
analyzed: dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen po thams cad dag @172a *//
translated: The shape wind arranges all the great elements

original: gis sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'god par byed //üîΩ'jig rten khams ni so so dag la slar yang 'khor yug ri bo chen po dag ni kun nas so //
analyzed: gis sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'god par byed // 'jig rten khams ni so so dag la slar yang 'khor yug ri bo chen po dag ni kun nas so //
translated: in the various buddhafields.üîΩThen, in each world system, the great surrounding mountains are formed all around.

original: de yi dbus su las kyi sa ni chen po dag gi rang bzhin 'jig rten khams su rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi dbus su las kyi sa ni chen po dag gi rang bzhin 'jig rten khams su rab tu 'gyur //
translated: In the middle of that, the great earth, which is of the nature of the four elements, is formed as the world system.

original: lhag ma longs spyod rang bzhin yul gyi bde ba byed pa rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang ba rnams; ;mtha' dag ri yi bdag po'i shar ni dag pa'i aindra ni la lho ni padma r'a ga ste //
analyzed: lhag ma longs spyod rang bzhin yul gyi bde ba byed pa rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang ba rnams; ;mtha' dag ri yi bdag po'i shar ni dag pa'i aindra ni la lho ni padma r'a ga ste //
translated: The eastern side of the lord of mountains is pure sapphire, the southern is ruby,

original: nub ni kar te ta na ser po byang ni ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zla pa chu shel lo //
analyzed: nub ni kar te ta na ser po byang ni ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zla pa chu shel lo //
translated: the western is topaz, the northern is white like the moonstone.

original: dbus ni ljang gu de yi snying por de yi nang du chud pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor chen po ste //
analyzed: dbus ni ljang gu de yi snying por de yi nang du chud pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor chen po ste //
translated: The middle is green. In its center, within it, is the great ma·πá·∏çala.

original: dang por thugs kyi rang bzhin de nas dbu ma las ni nyis 'gyur dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: dang por thugs kyi rang bzhin de nas dbu ma las ni nyis 'gyur dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin no //
translated: First, the nature of mind, then from the middle, twice the size, is the nature of speech.

original: de nas gzhan ni nyis 'gyur dag ste mda' la bcu yis bsgyur ba gyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag go /
analyzed: de nas gzhan ni nyis 'gyur dag ste mda' la bcu yis bsgyur ba gyur ba'i dpag tshad stong phrag go /
translated: Then the other, twice the size, is ten thousand yojanas, multiplied by the arrow.

original: de yi phyi rol dus rnams dag gis 'khor lo'i ngo bo de nas 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de yi phyi rol dus rnams dag gis 'khor lo'i ngo bo de nas 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Outside of that, by the directions, the nature of the wheel, then the nature of the world system.

original: 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug gis te rig byed 'bum gyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug gis te rig byed 'bum gyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala is located in the wind mandala by the six wheels and the six clans, by the hundred thousand vidyas.

original: brgyad gnyis ka ba mi bdag ri bong can gyi cha yis khang pa brtsegs pa zlum po skye gnas gzugs //
analyzed: brgyad gnyis ka ba mi bdag ri bong can gyi cha yis khang pa brtsegs pa zlum po skye gnas gzugs //
translated: The round mansion is the place of birth, by the parts of the two eights, the lord of men, and the rabbit-holder.

original: rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i dbus su phyed dang bcas pa nyi ma'i sor du 'gyur //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i dbus su phyed dang bcas pa nyi ma'i sor du 'gyur //
translated: From the uhnha of the lord of the victors, it is in the middle of the treasury of the eyes, half a finger of the sun.

original: de nas mgrin pa'i chu skyes de bzhin snying ga dang ni de nas lte @172b gsang chu skyes de bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas mgrin pa'i chu skyes de bzhin snying ga dang ni de nas lte @172b gsang chu skyes de bzhin no //
translated: Then, the lotus of the throat, likewise the heart, and then the lotus of the secret place of the navel.

original: zhabs kyi 'og dang rje ngar brla dang dbyi yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed rnams kyis te //
analyzed: zhabs kyi 'og dang rje ngar brla dang dbyi yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed rnams kyis te //
translated: The soles of the feet, the calves, the thighs, and the shoulders, likewise, by the vidyas.

original: brang phyed phyed bcas nyi mas rang dpung dpung lag rnams ni mkha' mig rgyal po nyi ma'i tshad kyis so //
analyzed: brang phyed phyed bcas nyi mas rang dpung dpung lag rnams ni mkha' mig rgyal po nyi ma'i tshad kyis so //
translated: The chest, half and half, by the sun; the arms and the forearms, by the measure of the king of the sky, the sun.

original: nyi shu 'ga' zhig lhag pa'i brgya phrag gang zhig dus dang dgu yis mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten tshad //
analyzed: nyi shu 'ga' zhig lhag pa'i brgya phrag gang zhig dus dang dgu yis mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten tshad //
translated: The measure of the world of men is one hundred and twenty, with a remainder of twenty, by the nine times.

original: rig phyed phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang chu gter chu gter phyed dang bcas pa'i rigs byed rig byed kyis //
analyzed: rig phyed phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhi dang chu gter chu gter phyed dang bcas pa'i rigs byed rig byed kyis //
translated: The four with half of the Vedas and half of the Vedas and the oceans, the K·πõttikƒÅ, the Vedas.

original: gtsug tor mgo bo 'og tu 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dpal ldan dpral ba dag dang shangs dang ni //
analyzed: gtsug tor mgo bo 'og tu 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dpal ldan dpral ba dag dang shangs dang ni //
translated: The u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a, the head, is below, and the forehead, the glorious nose of the Lord of Victors,

original: shangs kyi 'og tu ko sko'i mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa dag ste mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'i chu skyes dbus //
analyzed: shangs kyi 'og tu ko sko'i mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa dag ste mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'i chu skyes dbus //
translated: and below the nose, the edge of the cheeks, and then the throat, and in the middle of the throat, the lotus.

original: de nas snying ga lte ba gsang bar mi yi bdag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis rim pas 'gyur //
analyzed: de nas snying ga lte ba gsang bar mi yi bdag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis rim pas 'gyur //
translated: Then the heart, the navel, and the secret place, O Lord of Men, are the suns with half, in sequence.

original: gsang ba'i chu skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa yis ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid //
analyzed: gsang ba'i chu skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa yis ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid //
translated: The vajra is in the middle of the root of the secret lotus, and the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a is above, O Sage.

original: mdzod spu gsang ba'i chu skyes dbus su khu ba'i thig le mi 'gyur bde ba skyed byed gnas pa gang //
analyzed: mdzod spu gsang ba'i chu skyes dbus su khu ba'i thig le mi 'gyur bde ba skyed byed gnas pa gang //
translated: The drop of semen, which produces unchanging bliss, abides in the middle of the secret lotus and the navel.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje'i sa 'di gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo dag la'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje'i sa 'di gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo dag la'o //
translated: This glorious vajra ground, by the power of both families, is in the wheels of body, speech, and mind.

original: phyed bcas nyi ma nyir shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo ste //
analyzed: phyed bcas nyi ma nyir shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo ste //
translated: The wheel of body, speech, and mind is half a day, twenty-five days, and twice that.

original: thugs kyi phyed ni sor drug rkang pa dang bcas snying ga la gnas lhan skyes ye shes 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: thugs kyi phyed ni sor drug rkang pa dang bcas snying ga la gnas lhan skyes ye shes 'khor lo'o //
translated: Half of the mind is six finger-widths with the foot, located at the heart, the wheel of innate gnosis.

original: gsum po dag las sgo rnams bya ste nor bu'i rang bzhin gyis spras dkyil 'khor rnams las brgyad cha'o //üîΩ'gro dang 'ong bas steng dang 'og tu sku dang gsung dang thugs @173a *//
analyzed: gsum po dag las sgo rnams bya ste nor bu'i rang bzhin gyis spras dkyil 'khor rnams las brgyad cha'o // 'gro dang 'ong bas steng dang 'og tu sku dang gsung dang thugs @173a *//
translated: From the three, the doors are made, adorned with the nature of jewels, one-eighth of the ma·πá·∏çalas.

original: kyi 'khor lo dag ni nyis 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kyi 'khor lo dag ni nyis 'gyur ro //
translated: The wheels of body, speech, and mind are doubled above and below by the exhalation and inhalation.

original: lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed ni dpag tshad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed ni dpag tshad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur //
translated: The half-finger of the lord of victors is one thousand fathoms in Meru.

original: de bzhin lha yi ri po dag ni lus kyi tshad du 'gyur te rgyar ni phyed kyi tshad yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin lha yi ri po dag ni lus kyi tshad du 'gyur te rgyar ni phyed kyi tshad yin no //
translated: In the same way, the celestial mountains are the size of the body, and half that in width.

original: de yi steng du rdo rje'i rnam pa brtsegs pa cha gsum pa ste de yi yang ni phyed du 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi steng du rdo rje'i rnam pa brtsegs pa cha gsum pa ste de yi yang ni phyed du 'gyur //
translated: Above that is the vajra formation in three parts, half of that.

original: de bzhin 'og tu 'dzin ma chu dang me dang rlung dang me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin 'og tu 'dzin ma chu dang me dang rlung dang me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o //
translated: Likewise below, the zodiacs of water, fire, and wind, together with the flame, are the vajra garland.

original: phyed bcas nyi mas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs kyi 'khor lor 'gyur te lte ba mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus //
analyzed: phyed bcas nyi mas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs kyi 'khor lor 'gyur te lte ba mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus //
translated: The half-zodiacs, together with the sun, are the mind wheel of the Lord of Victors, in the center of the navel and throat lotuses.

original: gsung gi 'khor lo sku yi la 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu'i gnas nas steng du mdzod spu phyed kyi mtshams //
analyzed: gsung gi 'khor lo sku yi la 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu'i gnas nas steng du mdzod spu phyed kyi mtshams //
translated: The speech wheel is in the body wheel, from the place of the vajra gem above, to the point of the tuft, half a zodiac.

original: sgro khyud mthar ni dpal ldan 'gram par 'gyur te mi bdag dpral ba'i steng du gtsug tor dag gi mtshams //
analyzed: sgro khyud mthar ni dpal ldan 'gram par 'gyur te mi bdag dpral ba'i steng du gtsug tor dag gi mtshams //
translated: At the end of the circle of the eyebrows, there is the glorious cheek, and above the forehead of the Lord of Men, there is the point of the u·π£·πáƒ´·π£a.

original: phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba 'o //
analyzed: phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba 'o //
translated: The half-zodiacs, together with the sun, are the zodiacs of earth, water, fire, and wind, together with the flame, which is the vajra garland.

original: steng dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku 'di mnyam par 'gyur te sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: steng dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku 'di mnyam par 'gyur te sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: Above and below, this buddha body is equal, the wheels of body, speech, and mind.

original: kun nas rlung gi bgrod pa'i dbang gamse thad ka'i tshad kyis gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhin drug rnams kyis //
analyzed: kun nas rlung gi bgrod pa'i dbang gamse thad ka'i tshad kyis gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhin drug rnams kyis //
translated: By the three [finger-breadths] of the measure of the straight line, or by the six [finger-breadths] of the measure of the diagonal line,

original: rtsi bas brgyad me tshan ma dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dang bcas sor mo drug gis 'khor lor 'gyur //
analyzed: rtsi bas brgyad me tshan ma dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dang bcas sor mo drug gis 'khor lor 'gyur //
translated: [one] should measure the wheel with eight [finger-breadths] of the measure of the finger, together with the foot of the lord of the victors.

original: sgo brgyad rnams kyis bskor zhing rang gi lag mthil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan dur khrod brtag par bya //
analyzed: sgo brgyad rnams kyis bskor zhing rang gi lag mthil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan dur khrod brtag par bya //
translated: One should examine the glorious charnel ground with the finger-nails of one's own palms, surrounded by the eight gates.

original: steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis dang chu @173b gter ched kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
analyzed: steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis dang chu @173b gter ched kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur //
translated: The faces above and below, the two in the secret place, and the two in the water-treasury become the ma·πá·∏çala of the Bhagavatƒ´.

original: padma phyed la snying pa'i dbus nas gsum rnams kyis kyang de nas phreng ba dang bcas 'khor lo drug /
analyzed: padma phyed la snying pa'i dbus nas gsum rnams kyis kyang de nas phreng ba dang bcas 'khor lo drug /
translated: On half of the lotus, from the middle of the heart, with the three [finger-breadths], then the six wheels together with the garland,

original: sgo la sogs ba dag dang 'gram par 'khor lo kun nas lnga cha dag gis ngas par rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: sgo la sogs ba dag dang 'gram par 'khor lo kun nas lnga cha dag gis ngas par rab tu 'gyur //
translated: and the wheel in the gates, etc., and in the cheeks, completely divided into five parts, are well divided.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni mchod rten gzugs 'di kun nas shas rab ma yin thabs kyang ma yin no /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni mchod rten gzugs 'di kun nas shas rab ma yin thabs kyang ma yin no /
translated: The innate body is not at all this form of the stupa.

original: lhun po'i phyi rol tu ni 'og gi sa gzhi'i gnas la dngos grub brgyad bo yang dag gnas pa ste //
analyzed: lhun po'i phyi rol tu ni 'og gi sa gzhi'i gnas la dngos grub brgyad bo yang dag gnas pa ste //
translated: The eight accomplishments are situated on the lower ground outside of Meru.

original: shar du ral gra ri 'gyur te ro yi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ril bu mig sman ro tsa na //
analyzed: shar du ral gra ri 'gyur te ro yi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ril bu mig sman ro tsa na //
translated: In the east is the sword, the elixir of immortality, the pill, eye medicine, and the alchemical power to transform base metals into gold.

original: lho ru dpal ldan rkang mgyogs mi zad mtha' dag gter ni dkyil 'khor dag gi me yi zur du 'o //
analyzed: lho ru dpal ldan rkang mgyogs mi zad mtha' dag gter ni dkyil 'khor dag gi me yi zur du 'o //
translated: In the south is the glorious fleet foot, the inexhaustible treasure, in the southeast of the mandala.

original: dbus sum chod phyir thogs pa dag ste lha dang mi yi bla ma'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni de nyid do //
analyzed: dbus sum chod phyir thogs pa dag ste lha dang mi yi bla ma'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni de nyid do //
translated: In the center is the cloak of invisibility, and the divine human guru's Brahma voice.

original: nor bu gtsug tor dpral bar mgrin pa snying ga'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba la yang rdo rje ni //
analyzed: nor bu gtsug tor dpral bar mgrin pa snying ga'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba la yang rdo rje ni //
translated: The vajra is in the crown of the head, the forehead, the throat, the heart center, the navel, and the secret place.

original: gcig gnyis chu gter mda' dang klu yi dbang po dgu bcas nyin byed sor rnams dag gis rim pas so //
analyzed: gcig gnyis chu gter mda' dang klu yi dbang po dgu bcas nyin byed sor rnams dag gis rim pas so //
translated: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, and ten finger-widths, respectively, are the sun.

original: dbus dang steng 'og gsum gyi cha ste zum pa dang ni rnam par gyis pa zhi dang drag po la //
analyzed: dbus dang steng 'og gsum gyi cha ste zum pa dang ni rnam par gyis pa zhi dang drag po la //
translated: The three parts of the center, above and below, are the three parts of the bell, namely, the knob, the body, and the foot.

original: dril bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum steng ni rdo rje dang mtshungs ba lang kha dang padma'i gzugs //
analyzed: dril bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum steng ni rdo rje dang mtshungs ba lang kha dang padma'i gzugs //
translated: The bell is also divided into three parts, like the vajra, namely, the face, the body, and the foot.üîΩThe face is one-third of the bell, and the lotus petals are one-third of the face.

original: khyon ni de yi sum cha zhal dang bcas pa'i lte ba 'dab ma dag kyang de yi sum cha las //üîΩrva ni khyon dang mtshungs pa phyogs dang phyogs bral du ster rva yi zlum po dag ni zhi cha 'o //
analyzed: khyon ni de yi sum cha zhal dang bcas pa'i lte ba 'dab ma dag kyang de yi sum cha las // rva ni khyon dang mtshungs pa phyogs dang phyogs bral du ster rva yi zlum po dag ni zhi cha 'o //
translated: The horns are equal to the face, and the round part of the horns is one-third of the face.

original: phyi rol rva yi su ma cha 'og ste steng du @174a *//
analyzed: phyi rol rva yi su ma cha 'og ste steng du @174a *//
translated: The outer part of the horns is one-third of the horns.

original: ba da ri yi tsher ma'i rnam pa sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: ba da ri yi tsher ma'i rnam pa sbyor ba'o //
translated: The application is like the thorns of a bƒÅdarƒ´ fruit.

original: dril bu'i zhal rnams de bzhin 'dab ma rdo rje yang ngo bo lang kha la sogs pa de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: dril bu'i zhal rnams de bzhin 'dab ma rdo rje yang ngo bo lang kha la sogs pa de bzhin nyid //
translated: The faces of the bell are like the lotus and so on, and the vajra is also like that.

original: gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzod spu'i mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten dpangs kyi tshad //
analyzed: gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzod spu'i mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten dpangs kyi tshad //
translated: The height of the supreme Victor‚Äôs st≈´pa is measured by the tip of the secret lotus up to the ≈´r·πáƒÅ hair.

original: de yi phyed kyis gdan gyi rgya ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams //üîΩphyed dang gnyis mthar phyir byung chu skyes snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o //
analyzed: de yi phyed kyis gdan gyi rgya ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams // phyed dang gnyis mthar phyir byung chu skyes snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o //
translated: Half of that is the measure of the seat, which is perfectly level like the earth. One third of that is the measure of the sides.üîΩHalf of that again is the measure of the outer circumference, which reaches the heart and is a circle with the measure of the seat.

original: padma'i mtha' las tshad dman gzhi dang mnyam pa brang ste de yi phyogs cha yis kyang mgrin pa'o //
analyzed: padma'i mtha' las tshad dman gzhi dang mnyam pa brang ste de yi phyogs cha yis kyang mgrin pa'o //
translated: The chest is equal to the base, which is half the measure of the outer circumference of the lotus. The throat is one third of that.

original: gdan gyi phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams //
analyzed: gdan gyi phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams //
translated: The face is half the measure of the seat, which is perfectly level like the earth. One third of that is the measure of the sides.

original: gsang pa'i chu skyes dag las phyed bcas nyi mas dpangs su shin tu mnyam pa'i gdan gyi tshad 'gyur te //
analyzed: gsang pa'i chu skyes dag las phyed bcas nyi mas dpangs su shin tu mnyam pa'i gdan gyi tshad 'gyur te //
translated: The height of the perfectly level seat is one and a half times the secret lotus.

original: gdan nas padma'i sngon mtshams snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: gdan nas padma'i sngon mtshams snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dang de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'o //
translated: From the seat to the tip of the lotus is the distance to the heart circle, and from there to the base of the throat.

original: de nas gdong gi mthar ni de bzhin chu gter dus dang phyed bcas rig byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum //
analyzed: de nas gdong gi mthar ni de bzhin chu gter dus dang phyed bcas rig byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum //
translated: Then, at the end of the face, the three parts are by the Vedas, the ocean, and the half-month.

original: gdan las rig byed dag gis padma snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te //
analyzed: gdan las rig byed dag gis padma snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te //
translated: By the Vedas, from the seat, the lotus reaches the heart, and the mandala is the size of the throat.

original: phyed bcas brgyad kyis gdong pa'i tshad dang de yi steng du gdugs kyi phreng bar 'gyur ro mi yi dbang //
analyzed: phyed bcas brgyad kyis gdong pa'i tshad dang de yi steng du gdugs kyi phreng bar 'gyur ro mi yi dbang //
translated: By the eight and a half, the size of the face, and above that, the garland of parasols, O Lord of Men.

original: mdzod spu'i mtshams nas dpral ba dag dang mgo bos de nas 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di //
analyzed: mdzod spu'i mtshams nas dpral ba dag dang mgo bos de nas 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di //
translated: From the point between the eyebrows, the forehead, and the head, then here, up to the crown protrusion.

original: @174b de ltar nges par 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dang bral ba'i sku ste 'khor lo mchod rten rang bzhin no //
analyzed: @174b de ltar nges par 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dang bral ba'i sku ste 'khor lo mchod rten rang bzhin no //
translated: Thus, the boundless world systems are the body, the nature of the wheel and stupa.

original: gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur te dngul gyi chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me yi khams yin no //
analyzed: gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur te dngul gyi chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me yi khams yin no //
translated: Gold is the earth element, silver is water, and copper is the fire element.

original: lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni stong pa dang 'dres nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni stong pa dang 'dres nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Iron is air, and white and black lead is the nature of the space element, mixed with emptiness.

original: rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te //
analyzed: rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te //
translated: Yellow jewels are earth, white ones are water, and red jewels are fire.

original: nag po rlung po sngon po dang ni ljang gu de yang de bzhin 'dros pa'i khams las byung ba'o //
analyzed: nag po rlung po sngon po dang ni ljang gu de yang de bzhin 'dros pa'i khams las byung ba'o //
translated: Black is wind, and blue and green are also derived from the element of fire.

original: lan tshva sa dang mngar ba chu ru rab tu 'gyur zhing tsha ba me dang kha ba rlung yin te //
analyzed: lan tshva sa dang mngar ba chu ru rab tu 'gyur zhing tsha ba me dang kha ba rlung yin te //
translated: Salt is earth, and sweet is water; hot is fire, and bitter is wind.

original: skyur dang bska ba'i ro ni 'dres pa dag go slar yang zhing gi rngo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang // sman rnams rnam pa drug gi ro dang mchog gi ro ste khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po rnams //
analyzed: skyur dang bska ba'i ro ni 'dres pa dag go slar yang zhing gi rngo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang // sman rnams rnam pa drug gi ro dang mchog gi ro ste khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po rnams //
translated: Sour and astringent are mixed. The wombs of the fields are the medicines. The six tastes and the supreme taste are the other elements, the jewel organs.

original: sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams dang mtha' dag nad ni 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go /
analyzed: sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams dang mtha' dag nad ni 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go /
translated: On earth are the various textures, and all the waters are for the sake of taking away disease.

original: sa yis zug gser 'phrog par byed cing dug kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog par byed de me yis ni //
analyzed: sa yis zug gser 'phrog par byed cing dug kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog par byed de me yis ni //
translated: Earth takes away pain and gold, and water takes away poison. Fire

original: 'byung po rlung gis rengs pa nam mkha' yis kyang gdug pa'i lta ba rab tu lhung ba 'phrog par byed //
analyzed: 'byung po rlung gis rengs pa nam mkha' yis kyang gdug pa'i lta ba rab tu lhung ba 'phrog par byed //
translated: The wind of the elements paralyzes it, and even space steals the fallen view of the wicked.

original: ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog ste de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor bus kyang //
analyzed: ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog ste de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor bus kyang //
translated: Wisdom steals everything, and likewise the jewel that resides in the body of the king.

original: chu dang ro dang nor bu reg pa sngags dang sman rnams dag gi mthu rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: chu dang ro dang nor bu reg pa sngags dang sman rnams dag gi mthu rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab //
translated: The power of water, taste, jewel, touch, mantra, and medicine is inconceivable.

original: bcom ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu 'jug 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: bcom ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu 'jug 'gyur zhing //
translated: The Blessed One, who is of the nature of the wheel of wisdom, enters everywhere into the buddha-fields.

original: slar yang thams cad @175a *//
analyzed: slar yang thams cad @175a *//
translated: And again,

original: cad tshogs pa'i sbyor ba dag las 'bras bu'i dbang gis sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur //
analyzed: cad tshogs pa'i sbyor ba dag las 'bras bu'i dbang gis sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur //
translated: from the combination of all causes, beings enter into existence by the power of karma.

original: rang gi nyin bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag rnams kyis zla ba lhun po rdzogs pa 'dir //
analyzed: rang gi nyin bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag rnams kyis zla ba lhun po rdzogs pa 'dir //
translated: By the power of their daily journey, the twelve branches complete this moon-like Meru.

original: mchod rten rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi bdag de yi snying por dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: mchod rten rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi bdag de yi snying por dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The st≈´pa is the upper part, the vajra is the essence of the king, and the ma·πá·∏çala is the heart.

original: phyi rol tu ni rgyu skar 'khor lo rnams te las kyi sa la sa gzhi la gnas mi rnams so //
analyzed: phyi rol tu ni rgyu skar 'khor lo rnams te las kyi sa la sa gzhi la gnas mi rnams so //
translated: The outer circle of the lunar mansions is on the ground of karma, and the people are on the ground.

original: longs spyod sa la gling drug bdud rtsi 'bras bu'i ro yi kha zas can gzhan lha la sogs pa rnams //
analyzed: longs spyod sa la gling drug bdud rtsi 'bras bu'i ro yi kha zas can gzhan lha la sogs pa rnams //
translated: On the ground of enjoyment, the six continents have the food of the nectar fruit, and the gods and others are there.

original: rva la rjes su gnas pa brgyad rnams lha yi bdag po me dang dus dang lha min chu gter rlung //
analyzed: rva la rjes su gnas pa brgyad rnams lha yi bdag po me dang dus dang lha min chu gter rlung //
translated: The eight directions are the lords of the gods, fire, time, the demigods, the ocean, the wind,

original: gnod sbyin dang ni drag po 'og dang steng dang 'khor dang bcas pa khyab 'jug nyid dang chu gter gdong //
analyzed: gnod sbyin dang ni drag po 'og dang steng dang 'khor dang bcas pa khyab 'jug nyid dang chu gter gdong //
translated: the yak·π£as, and Rudra, above and below, with their retinues, Vi·π£·πáu, and the ocean-faced.

original: 'dir ni chu srin rnam shes dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung //
analyzed: 'dir ni chu srin rnam shes dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung //
translated: Here, the crocodile is consciousness, and the empty space is the element of formation, the vase is formation itself, and the wind

original: nya dang lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa tshor ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'du shes chu dang ni //
analyzed: nya dang lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa tshor ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'du shes chu dang ni //
translated: is the fish, the ram, the bull, and the copulation, which is feeling, which becomes fire, and perception is water,üîΩand the earth is the elephant, the tortoise, and the lion, and the moon is the mind.

original: gzugs dang sa dang 'gyur med dag dang lhan cig skyes pa karka ta la sogs pa'i khyim rnams so //
analyzed: gzugs dang sa dang 'gyur med dag dang lhan cig skyes pa karka ta la sogs pa'i khyim rnams so //
translated: The signs of the houses of Cancer and so forth are the forms, the elements, the immutable, and the conjoined.

original: 'di rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs ka tsa ta pa ta sa ring po thung du lhag pa'i lha //üîΩlug dang 'khrig pa karka tar ni zla ba dkar po nyi ma seng+ge bu mo srang rnams su //
analyzed: 'di rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs ka tsa ta pa ta sa ring po thung du lhag pa'i lha // lug dang 'khrig pa karka tar ni zla ba dkar po nyi ma seng+ge bu mo srang rnams su //
translated: The signs of the houses of Aries and so forth are the long and short vowels.

original: sa skyes sngags pa sgra gcan rnams te gza' lag spen pa gdengs can sdig pa gzhu yi thog mthar ro //
analyzed: sa skyes sngags pa sgra gcan rnams te gza' lag spen pa gdengs can sdig pa gzhu yi thog mthar ro //
translated: In the house of Aries, the moon is white, in Taurus the sun, in Gemini the daughter, in Cancer the lion, in Leo the moon, in Virgo the sun, in Libra the daughter, in Scorpio the lion, in Sagittarius the moon, in Capricorn the sun, in Aquarius the daughter, and in Pisces the lion.üîΩIn the first and last of the houses of Sagittarius and Pisces, respectively, are RƒÅhu and Ketu.

original: de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams ni kun @175b zhes phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye //
analyzed: de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams ni kun @175b zhes phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye //
translated: Thus, O lord of men, the elements earth and so forth are mutually combined.

original: 'gro ba 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang //
translated: This world is the nature of the karma of sentient beings, filled with all jewels.

original: gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan //
analyzed: gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan //
translated: In the earth are the wish-fulfilling tree, the supreme taste, medicine, and other tastes.

original: mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste //
analyzed: mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sems can rnams kyis mi mthong ste //
translated: All of these are created by the atoms that steal away the disease, which are not seen by sentient beings.

original: gang zhig phal pa'i rtsa dang shing dang chu dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnam mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang zhig phal pa'i rtsa dang shing dang chu dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnam mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: Those who see the ordinary veins, trees, water, dust, stones, and metals,

original: yi dags rnams kyis chu ni me chen dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams dag gis kun nas gcod 'bigs so //
analyzed: yi dags rnams kyis chu ni me chen dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams dag gis kun nas gcod 'bigs so //
translated: the hungry ghosts see water as a great fire, and the hell beings see it as a cutting and stabbing weapon.

original: 'di rnams sgrol ba'i slad du sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te //
analyzed: 'di rnams sgrol ba'i slad du sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te //
translated: In order to liberate these, the Lord of Conquerors, together with his sons, enters the stage of activity,

original: mngal ni rab tu gzung pa mdzad cing mchog gi thugs rje dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni /
analyzed: mngal ni rab tu gzung pa mdzad cing mchog gi thugs rje dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni /
translated: taking up the womb and generating enlightenment through supreme compassion.

original: nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi steng gi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te //
analyzed: nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi steng gi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te //
translated: Having conquered the afflictions and demons, he turns the wheel of Dharma in the abode on the earth.

original: sbrul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid kho na'o; ;de phyir rgyal ba'i dag pa'i sku ni skyes shing mnyams srid pa gsum po la yang gnas pa ste //
analyzed: sbrul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid kho na'o; ;de phyir rgyal ba'i dag pa'i sku ni skyes shing mnyams srid pa gsum po la yang gnas pa ste //
translated: Having performed the illusion of the emanation, the Blessed One is again just that one who has a pure body. Therefore, the pure body of the Victor is born and remains in the three existences.

original: bcom ldan de yis thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi 'dor las kyis bcings pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bcom ldan de yis thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi 'dor las kyis bcings pa ma yin no //
translated: The Blessed One never abandons the welfare of sentient beings at any time, and is not bound by karma.

original: de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su lus kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye //
analyzed: de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su lus kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye //
translated: Thus, I, the Lord of the World, remain in the three existences, like the sun in the sky.

original: sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jig @176a *//
analyzed: sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jig @176a *//
translated: I give the path to sentient beings, and take away the fear of hell.

original: 'phrog lha gzhan dag ni nam yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phrog lha gzhan dag ni nam yang ma yin no //
translated: Other gods never do this.

original: gang dag chos la mngon 'joms rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med dag la rjes su chags //
analyzed: gang dag chos la mngon 'joms rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med dag la rjes su chags //
translated: Those who are attached to their own bodies and the bodies of others, and to their own wives,

original: zhi bar gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni gnyen gyi bsod nams dag las mtho ris te //
analyzed: zhi bar gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni gnyen gyi bsod nams dag las mtho ris te //
translated: go to heaven from the fire sacrifice of their sons and the merit of their relatives, when they become peaceful.

original: mchod sbyin la ni phyugs rnams 'tshe dang g-yul du shi bar gyur na mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu 'jug /
analyzed: mchod sbyin la ni phyugs rnams 'tshe dang g-yul du shi bar gyur na mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu 'jug /
translated: In sacrifice, the animals are killed, and in war men are killed, and both are said to lead to heaven.

original: 'jug dogs lus po lhung las mchog gi go 'phang 'gro ba de rnams thar pa ster ba'i chos ma yin //üîΩde nyid lam ni rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod kyi ma gang pha ni gang //
analyzed: 'jug dogs lus po lhung las mchog gi go 'phang 'gro ba de rnams thar pa ster ba'i chos ma yin // de nyid lam ni rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod kyi ma gang pha ni gang //
translated: But the fear of falling into hell is the one thing that keeps men from sin.üîΩWho is your mother, who is your father, who are your brothers, who are your sisters, who are your friends, who are your kinsmen,

original: mchog gi bu dang bu mo spun zla tshung ma sring mo rnams dang rje bo gnyen gyi sde ni gang //
analyzed: mchog gi bu dang bu mo spun zla tshung ma sring mo rnams dang rje bo gnyen gyi sde ni gang //
translated: that you should abandon the path of truth and steal away the fear of death?

original: bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i drang srong 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbus 'dir gang gis thar par 'gro 'gyur ba //
analyzed: bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i drang srong 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbus 'dir gang gis thar par 'gro 'gyur ba //
translated: Who are these Rishis whom you have consecrated, that they should go free while the wheel of justice turns?

original: de yis nyi ma khyod kyis thub pa rnams ni bdag gi tshig las rigs gcig dag la 'jug par mdzod //
analyzed: de yis nyi ma khyod kyis thub pa rnams ni bdag gi tshig las rigs gcig dag la 'jug par mdzod //
translated: You, O Sun, must make the sages enter into the same category as myself.

original: gal te lus la dbyug pa bsnun pas sdug bsngal 'gyur na de la dbyug pa dag ni nyes pa can //
analyzed: gal te lus la dbyug pa bsnun pas sdug bsngal 'gyur na de la dbyug pa dag ni nyes pa can //
translated: If the body suffers pain when struck with a stick, then the stick is guilty,

original: dbyug pa 'di ni ma yin lag pas rab tu bskul te 'dir ni nyes pa mtha' dag lag pa yi //
analyzed: dbyug pa 'di ni ma yin lag pas rab tu bskul te 'dir ni nyes pa mtha' dag lag pa yi //
translated: The stick is not the culprit, for it acts only when impelled by the hand.üîΩThe hand is not the culprit, for it acts only when impelled by the mind.

original: 'di ni ma yin sems kyis bskul te sems kyang 'dir ni gdug pa chen po khro ba'i me yis so //
analyzed: 'di ni ma yin sems kyis bskul te sems kyang 'dir ni gdug pa chen po khro ba'i me yis so //
translated: The mind is not the culprit, for it is impelled by the great poison of anger.

original: de phyir khro ba'i me 'di 'gro ba'i dgra bo bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsod par 'gyur //
analyzed: de phyir khro ba'i me 'di 'gro ba'i dgra bo bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsod par 'gyur //
translated: Therefore, anger, like an enemy, is the foe of the Bodhisattvas.

original: chags las @176b sdang sogs skyon te rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi rang 'dod chung ma gzhan dang 'grogs las so //
analyzed: chags las @176b sdang sogs skyon te rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi rang 'dod chung ma gzhan dang 'grogs las so //
translated: Anger and the other faults arise from attachment, and attachment arises from the desire for sensual pleasures.

original: de ni rtsa nas dbyung slad mtha' dag rgyal sras rnams kyis de ni 'dod pa'i sbyin la rab tu byin //
analyzed: de ni rtsa nas dbyung slad mtha' dag rgyal sras rnams kyis de ni 'dod pa'i sbyin la rab tu byin //
translated: In order to uproot this desire, the Bodhisattvas give away all that they have.

original: de phyir sbyin la rjes su chags pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba bsod nams dag gi tshogs 'di ni //
analyzed: de phyir sbyin la rjes su chags pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba bsod nams dag gi tshogs 'di ni //
translated: Therefore, the accumulation of merit, which is the cause of the bliss of perfect enlightenment, is the result of attachment to generosity.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen du gyur cing thams cad dus su skye po rnams kyi dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen du gyur cing thams cad dus su skye po rnams kyi dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog /
translated: The Bodhisattvas, friends to all the world, at all times and in every way, free beings from the fear of the hells.

original: chags pa gang gis sems can rnams ni nyams par gyur pa de yis skyob pa rnams ni grol ba ste //
analyzed: chags pa gang gis sems can rnams ni nyams par gyur pa de yis skyob pa rnams ni grol ba ste //
translated: The protectors are liberated from that attachment by which sentient beings are defiled.

original: sems can rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig srung byed de ni skyob rnams ster bar byed //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig srung byed de ni skyob rnams ster bar byed //
translated: The protectors give protection to those who are protected by it day after day.

original: sems can rnams kyis rang snying la gnas bde ba gang zhig gtong byed de ni rgyal rnams srung bar mdzad //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyis rang snying la gnas bde ba gang zhig gtong byed de ni rgyal rnams srung bar mdzad //
translated: The kings protect that happiness which sentient beings give to their own hearts.

original: des na rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa 'di ni lha klu lha min rnams kyis bya ba dka' bar gyur //
analyzed: des na rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa 'di ni lha klu lha min rnams kyis bya ba dka' bar gyur //
translated: Therefore, this conduct of the supreme victors is difficult for gods, nƒÅgas, and demigods to perform.

original: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' yon tan yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin srog dang ni //
analyzed: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' yon tan yid dang blo dang ngar 'dzin srog dang ni //
translated: Earth, water, fire, wind, space, qualities, mind, intellect, the life force that grasps ‚ÄúI,‚Äù

original: gzugs la sogs dang mig la sogs pa yul dang yul can rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams te //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs dang mig la sogs pa yul dang yul can rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams te //
translated: forms and so on, eyes and so on, objects and subjects, and the five faculties of action

original: phyugs dang bcas pa mi yi lus la khyab byed 'di rnams dag las rigs ni thu bo gzhon nu gang //
analyzed: phyugs dang bcas pa mi yi lus la khyab byed 'di rnams dag las rigs ni thu bo gzhon nu gang //
translated: ‚Äîthese pervaders of the human body together with the cattle‚Äîfrom among these, which is the most important family, the youngest?

original: mi bdag dang bcas mi yi bla ma rigs dregs nga rgyal can khyod gang gis rigs ni thu bo yin //
analyzed: mi bdag dang bcas mi yi bla ma rigs dregs nga rgyal can khyod gang gis rigs ni thu bo yin //
translated: You, O Lord of men, who are the best of the twice-born, what is the origin of the castes?

original: bsreg bya sa dang dri ma med pa chu ru rab tu 'gyur te tu ttha ka ni ma nyid do //üîΩrlung dang nam @177a *//
analyzed: bsreg bya sa dang dri ma med pa chu ru rab tu 'gyur te tu ttha ka ni ma nyid do // rlung dang nam @177a *//
translated: The fire-offering is the earth, and the stainless is the water, and the tathatƒÅ is the very sun.

original: mkha' 'dres pa'i khams ni g-yo ba dang bcas ri bong can dang mtshal ni bdun pa yang //
analyzed: mkha' 'dres pa'i khams ni g-yo ba dang bcas ri bong can dang mtshal ni bdun pa yang //
translated: The wind and the sky are the element mixed with motion, and the moon and the coral are the seventh.

original: ka kashi ka shi sa dang mu zi mnyam dang mkha' rlung me dang chu ni ldong ros ba bla ste //
analyzed: ka kashi ka shi sa dang mu zi mnyam dang mkha' rlung me dang chu ni ldong ros ba bla ste //
translated: Kakashi, earth and antimony are equal, and the sky, wind, fire, water, and orpiment are the seven jewels.

original: btsag ni sa 'o lan tshva gang zhig ze tshva rgya mtsho skyes dang rgyam tsha nag po thab kyi tshva //
analyzed: btsag ni sa 'o lan tshva gang zhig ze tshva rgya mtsho skyes dang rgyam tsha nag po thab kyi tshva //
translated: Gypsum is the earth, and what salt is the ocean-born? And black salt is the seven jewels.

original: 'di rnams sa sogs khams te slar yang 'dir ni n'a ba s'a ra ya ba ksha ra sad dza dang / tshal k'a tsa las skyes de rnams mkha' dang rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag gi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'di rnams sa sogs khams te slar yang 'dir ni n'a ba s'a ra ya ba ksha ra sad dza dang / tshal k'a tsa las skyes de rnams mkha' dang rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag gi rang bzhin no //
translated: These are the elements earth, etc., and again here the NavƒÅsvarƒÅ, the Yavak·π£ƒÅra, the SƒÅjjaka, and the ≈öalƒÅkya are born from the sky, wind, fire, water, and earth.

original: rdo yi chu ni sa ru 'gyur te ri bong can gyi chu ni chu dang me yi chu ni me //
analyzed: rdo yi chu ni sa ru 'gyur te ri bong can gyi chu ni chu dang me yi chu ni me //
translated: The water of stone is earth, the water of the moon is water, the water of fire is fire,

original: rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin dag gi dug gi chu dang gzhan pa gri gug gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin dag gi dug gi chu dang gzhan pa gri gug gsum gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: the water of wind and of space is poison, and the water of the others is a knife.

original: gla sgang ser po sa yi khams te shag tu ka dang ra can nag po chu dang me dang rlung //
analyzed: gla sgang ser po sa yi khams te shag tu ka dang ra can nag po chu dang me dang rlung //
translated: The yellow orpiment is the element earth, the black orpiment is water, fire, and wind,

original: nag po brtsegs pa stong pa zhes bya gzhan pa nye ba'i dug ni rnam pa lnga po rig par bya //
analyzed: nag po brtsegs pa stong pa zhes bya gzhan pa nye ba'i dug ni rnam pa lnga po rig par bya //
translated: the black powder is called ‚Äúempty,‚Äù and the other poison is of five kinds.

original: rdo dang srog gi ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs 'bras bu dang mtshungs mgo dang dug la sogs pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: rdo dang srog gi ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs 'bras bu dang mtshungs mgo dang dug la sogs pa'i gzugs //
translated: The poison of stone is of various forms, like the fruit, the head, and so on.

original: de dag rnams kyi lcags ni rnam drug lhang tsher skyes dang de bzhin lha dang khab len rnams par bzhi //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi lcags ni rnam drug lhang tsher skyes dang de bzhin lha dang khab len rnams par bzhi //
translated: The iron of these is of six kinds: born of the thunderbolt, divine, and magnetic, four in all.

original: ro ni grub dang grub pa ma yin rnam pa gnyis su 'dir 'gyur 'bugs byed dang ni 'bugs byed min //
analyzed: ro ni grub dang grub pa ma yin rnam pa gnyis su 'dir 'gyur 'bugs byed dang ni 'bugs byed min //
translated: The poison is of two kinds: accomplished and unaccomplished, piercing and nonpiercing.

original: grub pa lcags ni 'bugs par byed de slar yang de ni zos pas lus kyang 'bugs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: grub pa lcags ni 'bugs par byed de slar yang de ni zos pas lus kyang 'bugs par byed pa'o //
translated: The mercury, when it is reduced to a powder, penetrates the iron; and when it is again melted, it penetrates the body.

original: gang zhig 'bugs byed min pa'i dngul chu ro de bskol ba dang ni bsgyur bar gyur pa dag gis kyang //
analyzed: gang zhig 'bugs byed min pa'i dngul chu ro de bskol ba dang ni bsgyur bar gyur pa dag gis kyang //
translated: The mercury, which does not penetrate the iron, is not the elixir; it is only by calcination and by the elixir that it is transformed.

original: @177b lcags ni 'bugs shing rjes su 'bugs te mtha' dag nad 'phrog rul pa'i lcags ni rnam par spangs nas so //
analyzed: @177b lcags ni 'bugs shing rjes su 'bugs te mtha' dag nad 'phrog rul pa'i lcags ni rnam par spangs nas so //
translated: The mercury penetrates the iron, penetrates it to the very marrow, and draws out all the impurities; the iron, freed from rust, is transformed.

original: dang por du ba'i rang bzhin dag gis 'gro ste ma la gnas shing bskol ba de ni rim pa yis //
analyzed: dang por du ba'i rang bzhin dag gis 'gro ste ma la gnas shing bskol ba de ni rim pa yis //
translated: First, the mercury, in the form of smoke, goes to the mother; it is calcined there, and gradually

original: sgra dang rab tu 'bar ba yis te de yang 'dar ba dang ni 'dar med nyid du rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: sgra dang rab tu 'bar ba yis te de yang 'dar ba dang ni 'dar med nyid du rab tu 'gyur //
translated: it is heated by the sound and the flame; it becomes trembling and non-trembling.

original: sgra ldan 'phar ldan 'bugs par byed pa ma yin de yang 'dab ma 'bugs byed 'dar dang bcas pa ste //
analyzed: sgra ldan 'phar ldan 'bugs par byed pa ma yin de yang 'dab ma 'bugs byed 'dar dang bcas pa ste //
translated: The mercury, which is endowed with sound and with trembling, does not penetrate; it is the mercury, which is endowed with wings and with trembling, that penetrates.

original: 'dar ba med pa mdung gis 'dugs byed rnam gsum 'dir yang sgyur byed rnams kyis bsgyur bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'dar ba med pa mdung gis 'dugs byed rnam gsum 'dir yang sgyur byed rnams kyis bsgyur bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The mercury, which is without trembling, is the spear; the mercury, which is threefold, is transformed by the alchemists.

original: mchog gi sman gyi stobs kyis stobs dang ldan pa rab tu 'gyur te lcags rnams thams cad bzhu ba'o //
analyzed: mchog gi sman gyi stobs kyis stobs dang ldan pa rab tu 'gyur te lcags rnams thams cad bzhu ba'o //
translated: By the power of the best medicine, he becomes strong, and all the iron melts.

original: su zhig de rnams med na sa yi steng gi gnas su 'di yi bcing pa dag ni gang zhig byed //
analyzed: su zhig de rnams med na sa yi steng gi gnas su 'di yi bcing pa dag ni gang zhig byed //
translated: If he does not have them, what bonds are there for him in the world?

original: bcings na mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur zhing de bzhin zos na 'chi ba dag kyang nyams par 'gyur //
analyzed: bcings na mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur zhing de bzhin zos na 'chi ba dag kyang nyams par 'gyur //
translated: If he is bound, he becomes a sky-goer; and likewise, if he is eaten, he escapes from death.

original: ye shes med na sa bdag rnams kyis ro yi dbang po 'di ni rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: ye shes med na sa bdag rnams kyis ro yi dbang po 'di ni rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya //
translated: If he has no knowledge, the lords of the earth should strive to obtain this sense of taste.

original: de dag rnams kyi rdzas ni du ma glu dang rol mo'i mngon par sbyor ba la yang 'gog par 'gyur //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi rdzas ni du ma glu dang rol mo'i mngon par sbyor ba la yang 'gog par 'gyur //
translated: Their substances are many, and they are also prohibited in the application of song and music.

original: gang zhig chud zos de ni mi bdag ro yi yul la ma bsregs chos kyi bya ba la ma byin //
analyzed: gang zhig chud zos de ni mi bdag ro yi yul la ma bsregs chos kyi bya ba la ma byin //
translated: He who wastes it, that king, is not burned by the objects of taste; he is not given to the performance of religion.

original: gang zhig rdzas ni sdig pa'i slad du zad par byed pa de yis de ni sdig pa dag gis bcings //
analyzed: gang zhig rdzas ni sdig pa'i slad du zad par byed pa de yis de ni sdig pa dag gis bcings //
translated: He who exhausts his substances for the sake of sin is bound by those sins.

original: de phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can dag gi don gyi slad du ma lus pa ni zad par mdzad //
analyzed: de phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can dag gi don gyi slad du ma lus pa ni zad par mdzad //
translated: Therefore, the Bodhisattva, for the sake of the welfare of all beings, has destroyed all of them.

original: gang zhig byugs pas 'phral la zangs kyi 'dab ma'i dri ma @178a *//
analyzed: gang zhig byugs pas 'phral la zangs kyi 'dab ma'i dri ma @178a *//
translated: That which, when applied, immediately removes the stains of copper

original: 'phrog par byed pa dag ni sman yin te //
analyzed: 'phrog par byed pa dag ni sman yin te //
translated: is medicine.

original: mtha' dag nad 'phrog lcags rigs 'ju bar byed pa de ni skal ldan rnams kyi sa la mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mtha' dag nad 'phrog lcags rigs 'ju bar byed pa de ni skal ldan rnams kyi sa la mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: That which removes all diseases and digests the metals is seen on the earth by the fortunate ones.

original: gzhan dag rnams kyis 'di yi bcing bar rab tu 'gyur ba gang de nges par lo dus bar dang ni //
analyzed: gzhan dag rnams kyis 'di yi bcing bar rab tu 'gyur ba gang de nges par lo dus bar dang ni //
translated: For others, that which becomes a bondage is certainly due to the time of the year

original: bdug dang dgod pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis de ni stong phrag gcig dbugs dag las lhag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdug dang dgod pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis de ni stong phrag gcig dbugs dag las lhag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and the application of fumigation and anointing. It does not go beyond a thousand breaths.üîΩAll medicines are very hot in taste, the group of digestive stimulants, the group of sour substances,

original: sman rnams thams cad shin tu tsha ba'i ro rnams dag dang 'gyur byed sde dang skyur ba'i sde rnams dang // bslang bar gyur ba'i rtsa ba mo dag gis rtag tu mnye dang bdug par yang ni rab tu 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: sman rnams thams cad shin tu tsha ba'i ro rnams dag dang 'gyur byed sde dang skyur ba'i sde rnams dang // bslang bar gyur ba'i rtsa ba mo dag gis rtag tu mnye dang bdug par yang ni rab tu 'gyur ba ste //
translated: and the roots of the stimulating class are always used for massage and fumigation.

original: dngul chu rnams ni dngul du bya ba la yang me tog btab pa rnams kyis sa bon dag pa'o //
analyzed: dngul chu rnams ni dngul du bya ba la yang me tog btab pa rnams kyis sa bon dag pa'o //
translated: Mercury is made into silver by the addition of flowers.

original: gnyis sbyor tsha la 'ching bu byi ba rta sen dug rnams kyis so snum gyis bran pas 'jam pa nyid //
analyzed: gnyis sbyor tsha la 'ching bu byi ba rta sen dug rnams kyis so snum gyis bran pas 'jam pa nyid //
translated: The seeds are purified by the addition of the two compounds, salt, stone, mouse, horse, and poison.

original: glang po mi yi chu ni len bdun blugs pa dag gis chu shing rtsi tra la sogs thal ba dang // 'gyur byed kun dang tsha ba rnams dang slar yang nye ba'i ro yi sbyangs pa de rnams sbru bar bya //
analyzed: glang po mi yi chu ni len bdun blugs pa dag gis chu shing rtsi tra la sogs thal ba dang // 'gyur byed kun dang tsha ba rnams dang slar yang nye ba'i ro yi sbyangs pa de rnams sbru bar bya //
translated: The plantain, etc., are purified by the addition of the seven waters of the elephant and man, and by the addition of all the alkalis, the hot things, and again the near-poisons.

original: yang nas yang du me yi tsha ba dag gis slar yang lan brgyar sbru bar bya zhing bskam par bya //
analyzed: yang nas yang du me yi tsha ba dag gis slar yang lan brgyar sbru bar bya zhing bskam par bya //
translated: Again and again they are purified by the addition of the heat of fire, and again they are dried a hundred times.

original: de bzhin dung gi phye ma brgya phrag sbyar bar gyur pa 'di ni mu zi dag gis bsres pa yang //
analyzed: de bzhin dung gi phye ma brgya phrag sbyar bar gyur pa 'di ni mu zi dag gis bsres pa yang //
translated: In the same way, this powder of conch-shell, mixed with a hundred parts of antimony,

original: lcags rnams zhu bar byed pa'i don du bi da 'di ni dngul chu dag gis brgyad kyi cha shas 'gyur //
analyzed: lcags rnams zhu bar byed pa'i don du bi da 'di ni dngul chu dag gis brgyad kyi cha shas 'gyur //
translated: is mixed with the eight parts of mercury for the purpose of melting the metals.

original: khyogs kyi bdug pa mtshan mo brgyad de ro yi snying gar gnas pa zhu bar gyur pa ji srid nyid //
analyzed: khyogs kyi bdug pa mtshan mo brgyad de ro yi snying gar gnas pa zhu bar gyur pa ji srid nyid //
translated: The smoke of the incense of the palanquin, which is in the heart of the corpse, dissolves into the eight nights of the moon.

original: drag por bskol pas @178b dri ma med pa 'di ni mnyes shing bzhus pas stobs dang ldan pa rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: drag por bskol pas @178b dri ma med pa 'di ni mnyes shing bzhus pas stobs dang ldan pa rab tu 'gyur //
translated: When it is heated strongly, this stainless [mercury] becomes very powerful, melted and pleased.

original: lcags gcig zhu bar gyur na nyi ma ri bong can gyi lus kyis lcags rnams thams cad kha sgyur byed //
analyzed: lcags gcig zhu bar gyur na nyi ma ri bong can gyi lus kyis lcags rnams thams cad kha sgyur byed //
translated: When one iron is melted, the body of the sun and moon [mercury] changes all the irons.

original: khyab byed sgyur ba de yang chen po dang bcas zha nye gsha' tshe spra tshil bcas pas 'jug pa ste //
analyzed: khyab byed sgyur ba de yang chen po dang bcas zha nye gsha' tshe spra tshil bcas pas 'jug pa ste //
translated: That pervading change also occurs with tin, lead, and beeswax.

original: de ltar gang zhig dngul chu'i las ni 'chad par 'gyur ba dag gis nyin zhag so sor byed pa na //
analyzed: de ltar gang zhig dngul chu'i las ni 'chad par 'gyur ba dag gis nyin zhag so sor byed pa na //
translated: Thus, one who performs the mercury work, which will be explained, day by day,

original: dus gzhan dag gis 'ching ste gsal bar lci zhing sra ba nyid dang skyon rnams kun las rab tu sgrol //
analyzed: dus gzhan dag gis 'ching ste gsal bar lci zhing sra ba nyid dang skyon rnams kun las rab tu sgrol //
translated: is freed from all faults, clearly heavy and solid, bound by other times.

original: de yis mchog gi lus la nad dang 'chi ba dang ni dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed //
analyzed: de yis mchog gi lus la nad dang 'chi ba dang ni dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed //
translated: It takes away all the suffering of sickness, death, and poverty from the supreme body.

original: kh'a phyed gser gyi padma nor gyi 'dab ldan dag la lte bar snying po'i dbus su rdo rje ste //üîΩlha dang gshin rje nor sbyin dag tu dag pa'i aindra n'i la padma r'a ga chu shel lo //üîΩnub tu rin chen kar ka ta ste me dang lha min 'phrog byed du ni rnon po zangs dang dngul //
analyzed: kh'a phyed gser gyi padma nor gyi 'dab ldan dag la lte bar snying po'i dbus su rdo rje ste // lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin dag tu dag pa'i aindra n'i la padma r'a ga chu shel lo // nub tu rin chen kar ka ta ste me dang lha min 'phrog byed du ni rnon po zangs dang dngul //
translated: In the eastern petal, in the middle of a golden lotus with a thousand petals, is a jewel in the middle of a heart, in the middle of a vajra.üîΩIn the southern petal, in the middle of a lotus of pure sapphire, is a ruby in the middle of a heart, in the middle of a vajra.üîΩIn the western petal, in the middle of a lotus of ruby, is a sapphire in the middle of a heart, in the middle of a vajra.

original: rlung gi 'dab ma dag la gser dang gser gyi lhang tsher dag la skyes pa'i gdan ni lta ba la //
analyzed: rlung gi 'dab ma dag la gser dang gser gyi lhang tsher dag la skyes pa'i gdan ni lta ba la //
translated: In the northern petal, in the middle of a lotus of crystal, is a diamond in the middle of a heart, in the middle of a vajra.

original: snying por de ster gser las skyes pa'i dzam bha la ni phyag gnyis ne'u le dang bcas mchog sbyin pa //
analyzed: snying por de ster gser las skyes pa'i dzam bha la ni phyag gnyis ne'u le dang bcas mchog sbyin pa //
translated: In the middle of the petals, in the middle of a lotus of gold, is a golden Jambhala, born of gold, with two hands, holding a mongoose and making the boon-granting gesture.

original: 'dab ma rnams la gser las skyes pa'am dngul las skyes pa'i lha mo brgyad de chu skyes mchog sbyin phyag /
analyzed: 'dab ma rnams la gser las skyes pa'am dngul las skyes pa'i lha mo brgyad de chu skyes mchog sbyin phyag /
translated: In the petals, on the petals of gold and golden lotuses, are eight goddesses born of gold or silver, with the boon-granting gesture.

original: cod pan sangs rgyas rin chen dbang po nor bu mchog sbyin phyag ste gnod sbyin mo rnams de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: cod pan sangs rgyas rin chen dbang po nor bu mchog sbyin phyag ste gnod sbyin mo rnams de bzhin nyid //
translated: On their crowns are Buddhas, with the gesture of supreme giving. The Yakshini goddesses are the same.

original: ha sogs thung ngu ring po phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab ma rnams la yi ge brgyad rnams @179a *//
analyzed: ha sogs thung ngu ring po phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab ma rnams la yi ge brgyad rnams @179a *//
translated: The eight letters, ha and so forth, long and short, are on the petals in the directions and the directions between.

original: rim pas so //
analyzed: rim pas so //
translated: In order.

original: dri dang me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag so sor dus su thun gsum zla ba'i snod du mchod byas nas //
analyzed: dri dang me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag so sor dus su thun gsum zla ba'i snod du mchod byas nas //
translated: With incense and flowers, he should worship three times a day, at the proper time, in the vessel of the moon.

original: aom dzam sv'a h'a'i mtha' ste dbus su bha la dang bcas dza lendra ya zhes pa sngags 'di yis //
analyzed: aom dzam sv'a h'a'i mtha' ste dbus su bha la dang bcas dza lendra ya zhes pa sngags 'di yis //
translated: The mantra is: O·πÉ ja·πÉ svƒÅhƒÅ at the end, in the middle, with bha·πÉ and jalen-draya.

original: rgyal po rab dga' yid kyis gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi bsrung ba'i don du chu ni rab sbyin bya //
analyzed: rgyal po rab dga' yid kyis gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi bsrung ba'i don du chu ni rab sbyin bya //
translated: The king, with a delighted mind, should give water for the protection of the alchemists.

original: de ltar srung ba'i mthu yis 'byung po'i mgon dang klu yi mgon pos ro ni 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar srung ba'i mthu yis 'byung po'i mgon dang klu yi mgon pos ro ni 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, by the power of the protection, the lord of the bh≈´tas and the lord of the nƒÅgas will not steal the corpse.

original: so phag 'gyur byed skyur ba'i sde rnams dag gis nyi ma bcu ru ro ni mnye zhing bdug par bya //
analyzed: so phag 'gyur byed skyur ba'i sde rnams dag gis nyi ma bcu ru ro ni mnye zhing bdug par bya //
translated: The corpse should be massaged and fumigated for ten days with the group of sour ingredients that cause transformation.

original: de nas slar yang snyigs ma dag la gnas pa phye nas bsre bar bya ste thams cad dus su'o //
analyzed: de nas slar yang snyigs ma dag la gnas pa phye nas bsre bar bya ste thams cad dus su'o //
translated: Then, again, the impurities should be removed, and the corpse should be cremated, all at the proper time.

original: slar yang gal te snyigs las de ni ma phyed ro ni 'chi ste de yang de la zhu bar bya //
analyzed: slar yang gal te snyigs las de ni ma phyed ro ni 'chi ste de yang de la zhu bar bya //
translated: If the dross is not separated from the mercury, the mercury will die, and it will be lost.

original: dngul chu rang gi skye gnas za na de ni slar yang gzhan gyi skye gnas thams cad rab tu za //
analyzed: dngul chu rang gi skye gnas za na de ni slar yang gzhan gyi skye gnas thams cad rab tu za //
translated: If mercury eats its own birthplace, it will also eat all other birthplaces.

original: zha nye rnon po ra gan zangs dang lhang tsher skyes sam gzhan pa zhing las skyes pa rnam dag pa //
analyzed: zha nye rnon po ra gan zangs dang lhang tsher skyes sam gzhan pa zhing las skyes pa rnam dag pa //
translated: The sharp lead, copper, and iron born from the field or born from another,

original: mnyam pa gcig tu bsreg pa'o dngul gyi bya ba la ni lhang tsher dkar po las skyes gsha' tshe mnyam //
analyzed: mnyam pa gcig tu bsreg pa'o dngul gyi bya ba la ni lhang tsher dkar po las skyes gsha' tshe mnyam //
translated: are burned together in one place. For the purpose of silver, the lead born from white iron is equal.

original: dang por drug cu'i cha shas zas ni 'ju bar 'gyur zhing de nas cha re bskyed pas 'phel bar bya //
analyzed: dang por drug cu'i cha shas zas ni 'ju bar 'gyur zhing de nas cha re bskyed pas 'phel bar bya //
translated: First, the food is digested in sixty parts, and then it increases by increasing each part.

original: rkang pa'i cha shas ji srid nyid du rab tu 'gyur te de las lhag pa rab tu sbyin mi bya //
analyzed: rkang pa'i cha shas ji srid nyid du rab tu 'gyur te de las lhag pa rab tu sbyin mi bya //
translated: It becomes as much as the part of the foot, and it does not give more than that.

original: phyogs gcig gis ni nyis 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang 'di ni de bzhin sa bon rnam par dag /
analyzed: phyogs gcig gis ni nyis 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang 'di ni de bzhin sa bon rnam par dag /
translated: By one part, it is digested twice, and again this is the pure seed.

original: de ltar gnyis gsum brgyad 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang zhu @179b pa 'di ni bi da mchog rnams kyis //
analyzed: de ltar gnyis gsum brgyad 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang zhu @179b pa 'di ni bi da mchog rnams kyis //
translated: Thus, it is doubled, tripled, and quadrupled.

original: ma zhu na ni ro la ji srid mtshan mo brgyad kyi bar du 'khor lo'i dugs su rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: ma zhu na ni ro la ji srid mtshan mo brgyad kyi bar du 'khor lo'i dugs su rab tu 'gyur //
translated: If it is not digested, it is cooked in a wheel oven for eight nights.

original: reg pa mchog gi sman rnams dag gi me la gnas pa lhang tsher lcags ni kha med 'ju bar 'gyur //
analyzed: reg pa mchog gi sman rnams dag gi me la gnas pa lhang tsher lcags ni kha med 'ju bar 'gyur //
translated: The iron, which is placed in the fire of the supreme medicine, is melted.

original: lhang tsher dag las lcags ni brgyad 'gyur stobs su 'gyur te de ni zhu ba na yang brgyad 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhang tsher dag las lcags ni brgyad 'gyur stobs su 'gyur te de ni zhu ba na yang brgyad 'gyur ro //
translated: The iron is eight times stronger than the melted iron, and it is eight times stronger when it is melted.

original: de yi sa bon la yang brgyad 'gyur yin te slar yang de las rdo rje rin chen brgyad 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yi sa bon la yang brgyad 'gyur yin te slar yang de las rdo rje rin chen brgyad 'gyur ro //
translated: The seed is eight times stronger, and the vajra gem is eight times stronger than that.

original: de ltar lcags dang rin chen rnams dang nye ba'i ro dang ro rnams ji srid khol bar gyur gyi bar //
analyzed: de ltar lcags dang rin chen rnams dang nye ba'i ro dang ro rnams ji srid khol bar gyur gyi bar //
translated: Thus, the iron, the gem, the near-essence, and the essence are boiled in the fire until they boil.

original: me yi nang du bskol bar bya ste de nas de ni 'bum phrag du ma 'bugs par rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: me yi nang du bskol bar bya ste de nas de ni 'bum phrag du ma 'bugs par rab tu 'gyur //
translated: Then, it is boiled in the fire for many hundreds of thousands of times.

original: reg rdo sman dag med na mchog gi bi da mnye ba dag dang dug rnams kyis kyang 'ju bar 'gyur //
analyzed: reg rdo sman dag med na mchog gi bi da mnye ba dag dang dug rnams kyis kyang 'ju bar 'gyur //
translated: If there is no touchstone, the best is to use a leaf of the bƒ´d≈´rƒ´ plant, or even poison.

original: 'dar ba med pa ji srid nyid de de nas sgyur byed gser ni mnyam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dar ba med pa ji srid nyid de de nas sgyur byed gser ni mnyam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur //
translated: As long as there is no shaking, the gold will be transformed into an equal amount.

original: slar yang gzhan ni nyis dang sum 'gyur gser zhu'i khu ba 'bru mar dngul chu dag la blugs pas so //
analyzed: slar yang gzhan ni nyis dang sum 'gyur gser zhu'i khu ba 'bru mar dngul chu dag la blugs pas so //
translated: Again, another [part] is doubled or tripled by pouring the gold solution into the oil or mercury.

original: rdzas kyi don du zha nye brgyad cha gser zhun khu ba dag la rab tu 'bad nas blug par bya //
analyzed: rdzas kyi don du zha nye brgyad cha gser zhun khu ba dag la rab tu 'bad nas blug par bya //
translated: For the sake of substance, eight parts of mercury should be carefully poured into the gold solution.üîΩIn the work with gold and silver, the gold is killed by sharp gold, copper, mercury, lac, realgar, and orpiment,

original: gser dngul bya ba dag la gser rnon sprul zangs zha nye mtshal dang ldong ros mu zi dag gis dang // gsha' tshe zla ba de bzhin lhang tsher skyes kyang ba bla dang ni bsreg bya dag gis bsad byas nas //
analyzed: gser dngul bya ba dag la gser rnon sprul zangs zha nye mtshal dang ldong ros mu zi dag gis dang // gsha' tshe zla ba de bzhin lhang tsher skyes kyang ba bla dang ni bsreg bya dag gis bsad byas nas //
translated: and the silver by mica, moonstone, and also by iron pyrites, and the burnt [substance] by the burnt [substance].

original: mnyam pa'i 'gyur byed dug dang lan tshva nye ba'i ro rnams dag dang lcags dang mnyam pa'i dngul chu ni //
analyzed: mnyam pa'i 'gyur byed dug dang lan tshva nye ba'i ro rnams dag dang lcags dang mnyam pa'i dngul chu ni //
translated: The equalizing transformation is done with poison, salt, and the near tastes, and the mercury is equalized with iron.

original: mkhris pa skyur po dag gis nyin zhag bcu ru mnyes nas de ni @180a *//
analyzed: mkhris pa skyur po dag gis nyin zhag bcu ru mnyes nas de ni @180a *//
translated: The mercury is heated for ten days with sour bile.

original: rdo ba'i dbus su blugs byas te //
analyzed: rdo ba'i dbus su blugs byas te //
translated: It is then placed in the middle of a stone

original: sa yi nang du zla ba drug tu steng du me dang bcas pa thams cad dus su bdugs gyur pa //
analyzed: sa yi nang du zla ba drug tu steng du me dang bcas pa thams cad dus su bdugs gyur pa //
translated: and heated for six months in the earth, above the fire, all the time.

original: dngul chu de ni bcu drug cha yis dbyangs kyis drangs pa 'bugs par byed par rab tu 'gyur te slar //
analyzed: dngul chu de ni bcu drug cha yis dbyangs kyis drangs pa 'bugs par byed par rab tu 'gyur te slar //
translated: The mercury is then drawn out with the sixteenth part of the tone and becomes penetrable again.

original: zangs dang zla ba gser mnyam dge ba'i gser 'di gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi sdug bsngal 'joms pa ste //
analyzed: zangs dang zla ba gser mnyam dge ba'i gser 'di gser 'gyur mkhan rnams dag gi sdug bsngal 'joms pa ste //
translated: This gold, equal to the gold of the gods, destroys the suffering of the alchemists.

original: dngul ni brgyad kyi cha shas byin na dag pa'i zangs ni phug pa dngul du yang ni 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: dngul ni brgyad kyi cha shas byin na dag pa'i zangs ni phug pa dngul du yang ni 'gyur ba yin //
translated: When eight parts of silver are given, pure copper becomes penetrated and becomes silver.

original: 'dzin ma la ni rdo ba gang dag 'bras bu'i lus dang mtshungs shing dung dang mgo la sogs pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: 'dzin ma la ni rdo ba gang dag 'bras bu'i lus dang mtshungs shing dung dang mgo la sogs pa'i gzugs //
translated: The stones in the holding pan, which are like the bodies of fruits, the shapes of conches, heads, and so forth,

original: de yi skye gnas de rnams la byin mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas drag po'i rlung gis bzhu bar bya //
analyzed: de yi skye gnas de rnams la byin mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas drag po'i rlung gis bzhu bar bya //
translated: are melted by the wind of the fierce fire, together with the ghee and honey.

original: de nas slar yang btags pa dang ni tsha la 'gyur byed sde tshan rnams kyis dag par byas nas ni //
analyzed: de nas slar yang btags pa dang ni tsha la 'gyur byed sde tshan rnams kyis dag par byas nas ni //
translated: Then again, with the addition of the group of the three pungent [substances], it is purified.

original: lcags kyi skye gnas de ni shes nas nyis gyur dag kyang ro la gser 'gyur mkhan gyis bzhu bar bya //
analyzed: lcags kyi skye gnas de ni shes nas nyis gyur dag kyang ro la gser 'gyur mkhan gyis bzhu bar bya //
translated: Having understood that iron-birth, the alchemist melts it down to twice its weight of mercury.

original: nyin zhag bdun du snod ni dag par 'gyur te 'bras bu gsum po ro mnyam bskol ba'i chu dang ni //
analyzed: nyin zhag bdun du snod ni dag par 'gyur te 'bras bu gsum po ro mnyam bskol ba'i chu dang ni //
