translated: For seven days it becomes pure in a vessel, and with the water boiled with the three fruits equal in taste,üîΩand with the iron powder killed by the moon, together with ghee and honey, and with mercury,

original: smon gyis bsad pa'i lcags kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dag dang bcas pa dngul chu dang bcas dang // ba yi 'o ma gsar pa rnying pa s'a li zan ni lo ma sgyur pos dman zhing lan tshva dang // rnam bral nya dang 'bru mar sogs las grol ba zos pa dag gis phyogs kyi nang du mi rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: smon gyis bsad pa'i lcags kyi phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dag dang bcas pa dngul chu dang bcas dang // ba yi 'o ma gsar pa rnying pa s'a li zan ni lo ma sgyur pos dman zhing lan tshva dang // rnam bral nya dang 'bru mar sogs las grol ba zos pa dag gis phyogs kyi nang du mi rnams kyi'o //
translated: and with fresh cow's milk, old rice, and spinach, free from salt, and free from fish, oil, and so on, the people in the region eat it.

original: stong phrag 'bugs pa brgya yis bsgyur ba'i brgya dang @180b bye ba 'bugs pa ji srid par yang shes byas nas //
analyzed: stong phrag 'bugs pa brgya yis bsgyur ba'i brgya dang @180b bye ba 'bugs pa ji srid par yang shes byas nas //
translated: Having understood that it is a thousand times a hundred times a hundred, and a hundred times a million,

original: nyin zhag so so'i dus su bza' bar bya ste nyungs kar cha las tha ma skye tshe cha shas so //
analyzed: nyin zhag so so'i dus su bza' bar bya ste nyungs kar cha las tha ma skye tshe cha shas so //
translated: One should eat at the proper time of each day. The smallest measure is a kar·π£a, the middle one a pala, and the largest one a prastha.

original: khang bzang dang ni sa yi khang pa grang ba rlung dang tshad pa dag dong bral bar rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: khang bzang dang ni sa yi khang pa grang ba rlung dang tshad pa dag dong bral bar rab tu 'gyur //
translated: A fine house, a house on the ground, a cool place, free from wind and heat, is the best.

original: 'bring po 'di ni zla ba drug gis lha yi lus po skra dkar gnyer ma dag dang bral bar byed //
analyzed: 'bring po 'di ni zla ba drug gis lha yi lus po skra dkar gnyer ma dag dang bral bar byed //
translated: This middle one, in six months, makes the body of a god, free from gray hair and wrinkles.üîΩOne should drink a decoction of karakƒ´, devadƒÅlƒ´, and the three pungent substances, bh·πõ·πÖgarƒÅja, and mƒÅpƒÅki.

original: karko t'i dang de ba d'a l'i tsha gsum bri ha t'i dang ni ma pa ki ra t'a tikta; ;bskol pa 'thungs te slar yang ma zhu ba la nyin zhag gsum du smyung bar gnas pa rab tu bya //
analyzed: karko t'i dang de ba d'a l'i tsha gsum bri ha t'i dang ni ma pa ki ra t'a tikta; ;bskol pa 'thungs te slar yang ma zhu ba la nyin zhag gsum du smyung bar gnas pa rab tu bya //
translated: Then, again, for indigestion, one should fast for three days.

original: de bzhin zla ba'i chu la sogs pa me dang dug gi chu dang rdo dang bha l'a ta yi chu //
analyzed: de bzhin zla ba'i chu la sogs pa me dang dug gi chu dang rdo dang bha l'a ta yi chu //
translated: Likewise, with water of the moon, etc., fire, poison, water, stone, and bhallƒÅtaka.

original: ngan pa'i dri dang sa dang rngo pa dug gi sha dang brtag pa gzhan rnams la yang sngags pas so //
analyzed: ngan pa'i dri dang sa dang rngo pa dug gi sha dang brtag pa gzhan rnams la yang sngags pas so //
translated: With bad smell, earth, and the meat of a poisoned animal, and in other cases, the mantrin should do the same.

original: gang zhig zos na drag tu brgyal ba ster byed dug dang mtshungs pa de rnams mtha' dag sman yin te //
analyzed: gang zhig zos na drag tu brgyal ba ster byed dug dang mtshungs pa de rnams mtha' dag sman yin te //
translated: Those which, when eaten, give a strong intoxication, are all poisons.

original: phye mar byas nas de ni cung zad mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas bza' bar bya ste de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: phye mar byas nas de ni cung zad mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas bza' bar bya ste de bzhin nyid //
translated: They should be made into a powder, and a little of that should be eaten with ghee, honey, and sugar.üîΩThat which is eaten by animals, cattle, and birds is not a medicine that grants accomplishments.

original: gsal ba mi phyugs sems can rnams kyis gang zhig za bar byed pa de ni grub ster sman ma yin; ;de dag rnams la 'chi ster mchog tu 'jigs byed gang yin de ni rnal 'byor rnams la bdud rtsir 'gyur //
analyzed: gsal ba mi phyugs sems can rnams kyis gang zhig za bar byed pa de ni grub ster sman ma yin; ;de dag rnams la 'chi ster mchog tu 'jigs byed gang yin de ni rnal 'byor rnams la bdud rtsir 'gyur //
translated: That which is most terrifying, a killer for them, becomes nectar for yogis.üîΩThe juice of the petals of the body of Dandotapa, Saliparna, and Saridag,

original: dando tpa la s'a li parn'i chu skyes s'a ri dag gi rang lus 'dab ma'i khu ba yis; ;ro dang mu zi mnyam pa khab len snod du lcags kyis nyin zhag gsum dag tu yang mnyes byas nas //
analyzed: dando tpa la s'a li parn'i chu skyes s'a ri dag gi rang lus 'dab ma'i khu ba yis; ;ro dang mu zi mnyam pa khab len snod du lcags kyis nyin zhag gsum dag tu yang mnyes byas nas //
translated: equal to mercury and antimony, should be stirred with iron in a magnetic vessel for three days.

original: gang zhig zla ba drug tu nyin zhag so so'i dus su tam ka'i rkang pa'i tshad ni za byed pa /
analyzed: gang zhig zla ba drug tu nyin zhag so so'i dus su tam ka'i rkang pa'i tshad ni za byed pa /
translated: One who eats the measure of a tamka foot every day for six months,

original: @181a *// de ni mdze la sogs pa'i nad las grol zhing skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral brgyad gnyis lo lon dbyibs //
analyzed: @181a *// de ni mdze la sogs pa'i nad las grol zhing skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral brgyad gnyis lo lon dbyibs //
translated: He is freed from leprosy and other diseases, and from gray hair and wrinkles.

original: bokk'a na dang bar snang shaktu k'i ri'i chu yis rab g-yo dngul chu dag kyang gsad par bya //
analyzed: bokk'a na dang bar snang shaktu k'i ri'i chu yis rab g-yo dngul chu dag kyang gsad par bya //
translated: Mercury is killed by the water of the Bhogavatƒ´ and ≈öaktupuspa mountains, and by the water of the sky.

original: sman gzhan dag gis bsad pa la ni dmar ring lhang tsher skyes dang gser dang khab len mnyam pa dag /
analyzed: sman gzhan dag gis bsad pa la ni dmar ring lhang tsher skyes dang gser dang khab len mnyam pa dag /
translated: When it is killed by other medicines, it is like gold and a magnet, long and red, and has a sharp point.

original: gcig tu byas nas srog bcas dri ma rnam bral dngul chu dag la srang drug gis ni gong bu ste //
analyzed: gcig tu byas nas srog bcas dri ma rnam bral dngul chu dag la srang drug gis ni gong bu ste //
translated: Having made it into one, the mercury, free from impurities, with a weight of six palas, is a lump.

original: sngar brjod khab len snod du phyur khu dag gis bskol bar gyur pa gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar 'phrog /
analyzed: sngar brjod khab len snod du phyur khu dag gis bskol bar gyur pa gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar 'phrog /
translated: In the vessel of the magnet, previously mentioned, it is boiled with the juice. It removes wrinkles and gray hair.

original: zla ba drug dang gnyis gcig zla ba mi bdag dang bcas nyin zhag bcu dang zhag bdun zhag gsum dang // zhag dang skad cig gcig gis 'di yi mthu ngag las ni lus la dngos grub tu yang rab tu 'gyur //
analyzed: zla ba drug dang gnyis gcig zla ba mi bdag dang bcas nyin zhag bcu dang zhag bdun zhag gsum dang // zhag dang skad cig gcig gis 'di yi mthu ngag las ni lus la dngos grub tu yang rab tu 'gyur //
translated: In six months, two months, one month, with the king of months, in ten days, seven days, three days, in one day, and in one moment, its power is transferred from the mouth to the body, and it becomes an accomplishment.

original: thun mong pa dang 'bring po 'jigs pa dag dang rnam par bral ba mchog ni ye shes grub pa ste //
analyzed: thun mong pa dang 'bring po 'jigs pa dag dang rnam par bral ba mchog ni ye shes grub pa ste //
translated: The common and middling are free from fear, and the supreme is the accomplishment of wisdom.üîΩThe supreme is the power of one‚Äôs own virtuous karma, not from the next life.

original: mchog sman skyes bu'i rang gis byas pa'i dge dbang las te skye ba gcig gi rjes 'bugs dag las min; ;gang na 'khri shing ljon pa gzhan gyi dngos dang nyin zhag so so'i dus su dud 'gro rnam par rtsod //
analyzed: mchog sman skyes bu'i rang gis byas pa'i dge dbang las te skye ba gcig gi rjes 'bugs dag las min; ;gang na 'khri shing ljon pa gzhan gyi dngos dang nyin zhag so so'i dus su dud 'gro rnam par rtsod //
translated: Where the creepers and trees of others‚Äô things are disputed by animals day by day,

original: ral gri dag la padma'i skud pa'i sdong bu mi yi snum gyi mar mes gter ni gsal bar byed //
analyzed: ral gri dag la padma'i skud pa'i sdong bu mi yi snum gyi mar mes gter ni gsal bar byed //
translated: The sword-like lotus stalks are illuminated by the human oil lamp.

original: der ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung po'i bdag po dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya //
analyzed: der ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung po'i bdag po dag gi sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya //
translated: There, day by day, the recitation of the mantras of the lords of spirits should be performed.

original: ji srid brko ba'i mtshan mar gyur gyi bar te de nas sngags pa rnams la @181b rdzas kyi dngos grub bo //
analyzed: ji srid brko ba'i mtshan mar gyur gyi bar te de nas sngags pa rnams la @181b rdzas kyi dngos grub bo //
translated: Until the signs of digging appear, then for the mantra practitioners there is the accomplishment of substances.

original: dang por rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa skye gnas drug gi sngags rnams bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: dang por rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa skye gnas drug gi sngags rnams bsgrub par bya //
translated: First, the mantras of the six birthplaces blessed by the vajra of the lord of victors should be accomplished.

original: gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrubs nas slar yang sa gzhi la ni zhing du smra ba rnams kyang bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: gnod sbyin mo rnams bsgrubs nas slar yang sa gzhi la ni zhing du smra ba rnams kyang bsgrub par bya //
translated: Having accomplished the Yak·π£i·πáƒ´s, one should accomplish the fields on the ground.

original: klu mo rnams ni sgrub pa byas nas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro dang sman de rnams ni bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: klu mo rnams ni sgrub pa byas nas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro dang sman de rnams ni bsgrub par bya //
translated: Having accomplished the NƒÅgƒ´s, one should accomplish the nectar fruit tastes and herbs.

original: mkha' 'gro ma rnams sgrub pa byas nas mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa'i lha min rnams kyang bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma rnams sgrub pa byas nas mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa'i lha min rnams kyang bsgrub par bya //
translated: Having accomplished the ·∏åƒÅkinƒ´s, one should accomplish the most terrifying asuras.

original: klu la sogs rnams sgrub pa byas nas rab mchog lha dang mi rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: klu la sogs rnams sgrub pa byas nas rab mchog lha dang mi rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya //
translated: Having accomplished the NƒÅgas and so forth, the yogƒ´ should accomplish the supreme gods and humans.

original: du ba la sogs sgrub pa byas nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i dbu ma dag ni bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: du ba la sogs sgrub pa byas nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i dbu ma dag ni bsgrub par bya //
translated: Having accomplished the smoke and so forth, one should accomplish the central channel that terrifies death.üîΩHaving accomplished the life and so forth, one should accomplish the melting bindu of the rabbit-holder.

original: srog la sogs rnams sgrub pa byas nas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba'i thig le rnams ni bsgrub par bya; ;dam pa'i bde ba bsgrubs nas lhan cig skyes ba rgyal ba'i sku ni kun tu 'gro ba bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: srog la sogs rnams sgrub pa byas nas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba'i thig le rnams ni bsgrub par bya; ;dam pa'i bde ba bsgrubs nas lhan cig skyes ba rgyal ba'i sku ni kun tu 'gro ba bsgrub par bya //
translated: Having accomplished the supreme bliss, one should accomplish the all-pervading body of the Victor, coemergent.

original: sems can rnams la 'chi ster gang de grub pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtha' dag bdud rtsi ste //
analyzed: sems can rnams la 'chi ster gang de grub pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtha' dag bdud rtsi ste //
translated: All the poisons of sentient beings are blessed by the mantra of accomplishment as ambrosia.

original: 'dod pa'i dngos grub gang zhig bgrod bya min pa de yang srid gsum gnas su bsam gtan bgrod bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dngos grub gang zhig bgrod bya min pa de yang srid gsum gnas su bsam gtan bgrod bya'o //
translated: Even that which is not to be traversed for the attainment of desire is to be traversed in the three worlds by meditation.

original: ye shes gang zhig rnyed dka' dag kyang rdo rje padmar bde bas byin rlabs rnyed pa sla ba nyid //
analyzed: ye shes gang zhig rnyed dka' dag kyang rdo rje padmar bde bas byin rlabs rnyed pa sla ba nyid //
translated: Even that wisdom which is difficult to attain is easily attained by the blessing of bliss in the vajra and lotus.

original: de lta de ltar rdo rje can te srog chags rnams la thams cad dus su bde mnyam ster gyur cig /
analyzed: de lta de ltar rdo rje can te srog chags rnams la thams cad dus su bde mnyam ster gyur cig /
translated: Thus, may the vajra-holder always bestow the bliss of equality to all beings.

original: sgra gcan me dang zla ba nyi ma bzhi por brjod de sa @182a *//
analyzed: sgra gcan me dang zla ba nyi ma bzhi por brjod de sa @182a *//
translated: Rahu, fire, moon, and sun are said to be the four.

original: sa chu bsreg za rlung dang stong pa gang //
analyzed: sa chu bsreg za rlung dang stong pa gang //
translated: Earth, water, fire, wind, and space

original: lnga po dag gi gza' yi tshogs pa gcig shos dag ni drug pa lhun po 'di yi phyogs rnams su //
analyzed: lnga po dag gi gza' yi tshogs pa gcig shos dag ni drug pa lhun po 'di yi phyogs rnams su //
translated: are the other group of five planets in the directions of this Meru, the sixth.

original: gling rnams dag ni bzhi por rab tu 'gyur te yul rnams dag ni lnga por phyi rol dag tu gsungs //
analyzed: gling rnams dag ni bzhi por rab tu 'gyur te yul rnams dag ni lnga por phyi rol dag tu gsungs //
translated: The four continents are in the four directions, and the five countries are said to be outside.

original: snying stobs la sogs yon tan rnams ni gsum po gzhan pa 'di'o lus kyi dbus su de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: snying stobs la sogs yon tan rnams ni gsum po gzhan pa 'di'o lus kyi dbus su de bzhin nyid //
translated: The qualities of sattva, etc., are the three others.

original: padmar rnam shes dga' ba khrag dang bdud rtsi zhes pa dang por bzhi po dag go de las ni //
analyzed: padmar rnam shes dga' ba khrag dang bdud rtsi zhes pa dang por bzhi po dag go de las ni //
translated: In the middle of the body is tathatƒÅ, in the lotus is consciousness, joy, blood, and nectar.

original: gang zhig rus pa la sogs mtha' dag rnams kyang lnga po de nas mig la sogs pa drug po ste //
analyzed: gang zhig rus pa la sogs mtha' dag rnams kyang lnga po de nas mig la sogs pa drug po ste //
translated: From that, the five are all the bones, etc., and from that, the six are the eyes, etc.

original: lag pa rkang pa dag ni bzhi po lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo rnams ni lnga po'o //
analyzed: lag pa rkang pa dag ni bzhi po lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo rnams ni lnga po'o //
translated: The four are the hands and feet, and the five are the fingers and toes located in the hands and feet.

original: de rnams tshigs ni gsum po gang zhig 'dir ni rim pa mtha' dag rigs 'di la ni rig par bya //
analyzed: de rnams tshigs ni gsum po gang zhig 'dir ni rim pa mtha' dag rigs 'di la ni rig par bya //
translated: The three joints are here, and the entire sequence should be known in this family.

original: sa 'dzin de nyid rnam dbye rnams dang ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro dang nyi ma nyi shu zhes pa dang // dbye ba drug cu mi rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus la gnas pa bug pa drug dang zla ba'i grangs //
analyzed: sa 'dzin de nyid rnam dbye rnams dang ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro dang nyi ma nyi shu zhes pa dang // dbye ba drug cu mi rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus la gnas pa bug pa drug dang zla ba'i grangs //
translated: The earth-holder is the twenty suns with divisions and tastes transformed by taste, and the sixty divisions are the measure of the six openings and the moon in the entire body of humans.

original: de dag thams cad bsdus pa sum 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur te lnga bcu rtsa bzhi srog gi rgyu ba dang // gza' rnams dag gis rgyu ba gang de slar yang gcig shos rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma yi rgyu bar brjod //
analyzed: de dag thams cad bsdus pa sum 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur te lnga bcu rtsa bzhi srog gi rgyu ba dang // gza' rnams dag gis rgyu ba gang de slar yang gcig shos rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma yi rgyu bar brjod //
translated: That movement of the planets is again said to be the movement of the yoginƒ´s by the others.

original: ye shes nam mkha' gnyis dang slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni theg pa dag dang dkon mchog gsum po yang //
analyzed: ye shes nam mkha' gnyis dang slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni theg pa dag dang dkon mchog gsum po yang //
translated: The two of wisdom and space, and again this other one, is the vehicles and the Three Jewels.üîΩThe mƒÅras of afflictions and abodes, and again the bases of supernatural powers, the outflows,

original: nyon mongs bdud dang gnas rnams dang ni slar yang nges par rdzu @182b 'phrul rkang pa zag pa rnams dag dang // mi 'jigs pa dang bden pa rnams dang slar yang de bzhin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang dag par //
analyzed: nyon mongs bdud dang gnas rnams dang ni slar yang nges par rdzu @182b 'phrul rkang pa zag pa rnams dag dang // mi 'jigs pa dang bden pa rnams dang slar yang de bzhin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang dag par //
translated: the forms of fearlessness, the truths, and again the foundations of mindfulness,

original: bsdu ba bzhi yi mtha' rnams rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bsdu ba bzhi yi mtha' rnams rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyi rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya //
translated: the yogin should meditate on the ends of the four summaries with the vajras of the Victorious Lord.

original: mngon shes lnga dang stobs dang lta ba rnams dang rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi spyan lnga dang // de bzhin phung po dbang po dran pa zhes pa drug dang byang chub yan lag bdun dang mchod pa ni //
analyzed: mngon shes lnga dang stobs dang lta ba rnams dang rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi spyan lnga dang // de bzhin phung po dbang po dran pa zhes pa drug dang byang chub yan lag bdun dang mchod pa ni //
translated: The five superknowledges, the ten powers, the four forms of fearlessness, the four kinds of correct knowledge, the three special foundations of mindfulness, and great compassion,

original: bdun te lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnams so so'i legs 'jug gzugs can rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang // bug pa zhes bya yan lag dgu ni gsung rab mchog ste sa rnams dag ni phyogs kyi tshad yin no //
analyzed: bdun te lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnams so so'i legs 'jug gzugs can rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang // bug pa zhes bya yan lag dgu ni gsung rab mchog ste sa rnams dag ni phyogs kyi tshad yin no //
translated: The five eyes, the six higher knowledges, the seven parts of awakening, the eightfold path, the eight liberations, the nine successive meditative absorptions, and the ten powers of a superior being,

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stobs dang gsal bar dbang bcu dang ni yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel dag /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stobs dang gsal bar dbang bcu dang ni yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel dag /
translated: The ten powers of the buddhas, the ten masteries, the twelve branches of the scriptures,

original: skye ba dang ni 'gog pa dag go de bzhin nyis 'gyur dgu ni ma 'dres pa yi sangs rgyas chos //
analyzed: skye ba dang ni 'gog pa dag go de bzhin nyis 'gyur dgu ni ma 'dres pa yi sangs rgyas chos //
translated: The four forms of correct knowledge, the four forms of fearlessness, the eighteen distinctive qualities of a buddha,

original: rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang dpe byad rnams kyang brgyad cu ste //
analyzed: rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dag dang dpe byad rnams kyang brgyad cu ste //
translated: The thirty-two major marks of a superior being, and the eighty minor marks of a superior being,

original: khyab bdag mchog gi go 'phang 'di dag mtha' dag sngags pa yi ni lus la bsgom par bya ba yin //
analyzed: khyab bdag mchog gi go 'phang 'di dag mtha' dag sngags pa yi ni lus la bsgom par bya ba yin //
translated: All these supreme states of the all-pervading Lord are to be meditated upon in the body of the mantrin.

original: zla ba'i rang bzhin gcig ste zung dang lag pa mig dang 'khrig ba phyogs dang bgrod pa dag ni gnyis //
analyzed: zla ba'i rang bzhin gcig ste zung dang lag pa mig dang 'khrig ba phyogs dang bgrod pa dag ni gnyis //
translated: One is of the nature of the moon, two are the pair, hand, eye, and embrace, three are the directions and the goings,

original: 'jig rten dus dang yon tan me ni gsum mo chu gter dus dang rig byed dag ni bzhi ru brjod //
analyzed: 'jig rten dus dang yon tan me ni gsum mo chu gter dus dang rig byed dag ni bzhi ru brjod //
translated: three are the worldly times and the qualities, four are said to be the ocean, time, and the Vedas,

original: mda' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams ni nges par @183a *//
analyzed: mda' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams ni nges par @183a *//
translated: five are definitely the arrows, elements, and senses,

original: lnga ru rab tu 'gyur te ro dang dus ni drug /
analyzed: lnga ru rab tu 'gyur te ro dang dus ni drug /
translated: six are the tastes and times,

original: gza' dang ri bo thub pa zhes pa bdun gyi grangs te de bzhin klu dang nor ni brgyad yin no //
analyzed: gza' dang ri bo thub pa zhes pa bdun gyi grangs te de bzhin klu dang nor ni brgyad yin no //
translated: seven is the number of the planets, mountains, and sages, and likewise eight is the wealth of the nƒÅgas,

original: rtsa dang bug pa gza' dang gter yang dgu ste phyogs ni bcu dang dbang phyug dag ni bcu gcig go /
analyzed: rtsa dang bug pa gza' dang gter yang dgu ste phyogs ni bcu dang dbang phyug dag ni bcu gcig go /
translated: nine is the channels, orifices, planets, and treasures, ten are the directions, and eleven are the lords,

original: nyi ma lus med ma nu srid pa gang dang tshes dang mi bdag bcu gnyis nas ni re re 'phel //
analyzed: nyi ma lus med ma nu srid pa gang dang tshes dang mi bdag bcu gnyis nas ni re re 'phel //
translated: twelve are the sun, body, Manu, existence, lunar day, and king, increasing by one each.

original: nyes pa 'di dag bco brgyad yin te rgyal ba mchog ni ma lus de rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
analyzed: nyes pa 'di dag bco brgyad yin te rgyal ba mchog ni ma lus de rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
translated: These are the eighteen faults. The supreme Victor is all of them, twenty-four.

original: de nyid ces grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga yin te gnyis skyes zhes pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: de nyid ces grangs nyi shu rtsa lnga yin te gnyis skyes zhes pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nyid du 'gyur //
translated: That very [number] is twenty-five, and the two-born is thirty-two.

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad dag tu nges par rdo rje'i tshig ni rdo rje can gyis sbas pa ste //
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po thams cad dag tu nges par rdo rje'i tshig ni rdo rje can gyis sbas pa ste //
translated: In all the kings of tantras, the vajra words are certainly hidden by the vajra-holders.

original: dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du ma lus pa yang mngon sum gsungs //
analyzed: dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du ma lus pa yang mngon sum gsungs //
translated: In the Original Buddha, for the liberation of beings, all is also directly stated.

original: de phyir 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag las mtha' dag ma tshang med pa'i rgyud ni bla ma ste //
analyzed: de phyir 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa dag las mtha' dag ma tshang med pa'i rgyud ni bla ma ste //
translated: Therefore, the tantra that is not incomplete in all respects, mundane and transcendent, is the guru.

original: dpal ldan rgyud ni dang po'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mngon par brjod pa zla ba bzang //
analyzed: dpal ldan rgyud ni dang po'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mngon par brjod pa zla ba bzang //
translated: The glorious tantra is the Original Buddha, the complete expression of the Lord of Victors, the good moon.

original: gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang // reg bya gzugs dang sems med rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing 'ching dang grol dang byed po med //
analyzed: gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang // reg bya gzugs dang sems med rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing 'ching dang grol dang byed po med //
translated: No touch, no form, no mind, no nature, no person, no bondage, no liberation, no creator,

original: sa bon dang ni gsal ba'i dus med mtha' dag srid par sdug bsngal bde ba nyid kyi rang bzhin med //
analyzed: sa bon dang ni gsal ba'i dus med mtha' dag srid par sdug bsngal bde ba nyid kyi rang bzhin med //
translated: No seed, no manifestation, no time, no suffering, no happiness, no essence in the entirety of existence,

original: mya ngan 'das pa mtshan ma med cing byed @183b pa rnams bral yon tan med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa mtshan ma med cing byed @183b pa rnams bral yon tan med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to that nirvƒÅ·πáa, which is signless, free from activity, and devoid of qualities.

original: dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje skyes bu dpe zla med cing thams cad du 'gro spros pa med //
analyzed: dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje skyes bu dpe zla med cing thams cad du 'gro spros pa med //
translated: The vajra being, who is beyond time, variety, and so forth, is incomparable, omnipresent, and free from conceptual elaboration.

original: brtsegs pa la gnas rna ba sna dang kha dang mig dang mgo ste thams cad nas ni phyag dang zhabs //
analyzed: brtsegs pa la gnas rna ba sna dang kha dang mig dang mgo ste thams cad nas ni phyag dang zhabs //
translated: His hands and feet reach everywhere, his ears and nose, mouth and eyes, and his head are all stacked up.

original: 'byung ba'i mtha' ste 'byung po'i mgon po srid pa gsum po mchog 'dzin rgyu rnams dag gi rgyur gyur pa //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i mtha' ste 'byung po'i mgon po srid pa gsum po mchog 'dzin rgyu rnams dag gi rgyur gyur pa //
translated: He is the end of the elements, the lord of beings, the holder of the three existences, the cause of all causes.

original: rig pa la sogs rnal 'byor dag gi bgrod bya mchog bde'i go 'phang dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rig pa la sogs rnal 'byor dag gi bgrod bya mchog bde'i go 'phang dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to KƒÅlacakra, the supreme state of bliss to be traversed by the yogis of the awareness and so forth.

original: spro byed nus pa'i ngo bo glog gi me dang mtshungs shing nyi ma bcu gnyis dag gi gzi brjid can //
analyzed: spro byed nus pa'i ngo bo glog gi me dang mtshungs shing nyi ma bcu gnyis dag gi gzi brjid can //
translated: The nature of the expanding light is like the lightning fire and has the brilliance of twelve suns.

original: ye shes rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi go 'phang bgrod byed rnam par bcad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi go 'phang bgrod byed rnam par bcad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the wisdom vajra, the state of supreme appearance, which is the eliminator of the darkness of ignorance.

original: dkar po 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po ri bong 'dzin pa las 'dzag 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag gnas //
analyzed: dkar po 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po ri bong 'dzin pa las 'dzag 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag gnas //
translated: The white nectar, the lord of the three worlds, drips from the moon and is perfectly situated on the crown of the world.

original: bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms par byed pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms par byed pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the bindu form, which is the nectar that eliminates death and conquers the fear of existence.

original: sems tsam sngags kyi ngo bo lha yis yongs su bskor ba sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i rang bzhin te //
analyzed: sems tsam sngags kyi ngo bo lha yis yongs su bskor ba sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i rang bzhin te //
translated: The nature of mantra, mind only, is surrounded by deities, which are the nature of suffering and bliss.

original: dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ni rang gis byas pa'i nyams myong mi bzad rnams la mi bzad pa //
analyzed: dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ni rang gis byas pa'i nyams myong mi bzad rnams la mi bzad pa //
translated: The peaceful form of the sublime ones is unbearable for those who have created unbearable experiences.

original: gang gis las gang rab byas rang gi sems la cho ga bzhin du de yi 'bras bu de bskyed pa //
analyzed: gang gis las gang rab byas rang gi sems la cho ga bzhin du de yi 'bras bu de bskyed pa //
translated: Whatever action is performed, the result of that is produced in one's mind, according to the rite.

original: 'jig rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can srid gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag @184a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can srid gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag @184a *//
translated: I pay homage to Vajrasattva, the Lord of the World, who has various forms and creates the three existences.

original: 'tshal lo // gcig dang du ma dag kyang gcig cing mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g-yas dang g-yon dang mdun dang rgyab //
analyzed: 'tshal lo // gcig dang du ma dag kyang gcig cing mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g-yas dang g-yon dang mdun dang rgyab //
translated: I pay homage to you, the one who is both one and many, who is both equal and unequal, who is both right and left, front and back,

original: steng 'og kun nas dkar ljang sna tshogs kha dog chen po gcig gi gzugs te thung ngu ring po dang // shin tu ring po yon tan med ces yon tan dang bcas bud med skyes pa'ang skyes pa bud med min //
analyzed: steng 'og kun nas dkar ljang sna tshogs kha dog chen po gcig gi gzugs te thung ngu ring po dang // shin tu ring po yon tan med ces yon tan dang bcas bud med skyes pa'ang skyes pa bud med min //
translated: who is above and below, who is all around, who is white, green, and various, who is the form of the great one, who is short, long, and very long, who is said to be without qualities and to possess qualities, who is neither female nor male, but is both female and male.

original: gang zhig kun gyi rten gcig bha ga bzang mo mchog gi bha ga khyod la 'dud de khyod la 'dud //
analyzed: gang zhig kun gyi rten gcig bha ga bzang mo mchog gi bha ga khyod la 'dud de khyod la 'dud //
translated: I bow to you, the Bhaga of the Bhaga of the supreme and excellent Bhaga, the sole support of all.

original: gang zhig mi yi 'jig rten dag na dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig bral de bdag ste //
analyzed: gang zhig mi yi 'jig rten dag na dpal ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig bral de bdag ste //
translated: I am that sinless one in the human world, the glorious guru, the vajra-holder.

original: de la gnod pa byas pas srog chags rnams ni nges par dmyal bar 'gyur te 'di la ngo mtshar med //
analyzed: de la gnod pa byas pas srog chags rnams ni nges par dmyal bar 'gyur te 'di la ngo mtshar med //
translated: By harming them, one will certainly go to hell, and there is no wonder in that.

original: de mnyes pa yis bdag ni mgu ste de la khro ba'i me yis khros pa zhes pa chen po'o //
analyzed: de mnyes pa yis bdag ni mgu ste de la khro ba'i me yis khros pa zhes pa chen po'o //
translated: I am pleased by pleasing them, and by the fire of anger towards them, I am greatly angered.

original: de nyid sems can rnams la thar pa bde mnyam 'bras ster bu rnams dag gi phyag 'os mchod 'os so //
analyzed: de nyid sems can rnams la thar pa bde mnyam 'bras ster bu rnams dag gi phyag 'os mchod 'os so //
translated: They are the ones who give the fruit of liberation, the bliss of equality, to sentient beings, and are worthy of the homage and worship of their children.

original: sdig can gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs pad bzang po dag la dus gsum phyag mi byed //
analyzed: sdig can gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs pad bzang po dag la dus gsum phyag mi byed //
translated: The sinful one is the one who does not pay homage to the lotus feet of the glorious guru three times a day.

original: mi shes gang yin gang zhig rnam mang me tog rnams kyis dus gsum du ni mandal mi byed pa //
analyzed: mi shes gang yin gang zhig rnam mang me tog rnams kyis dus gsum du ni mandal mi byed pa //
translated: The ignorant one is the one who does not make mandalas three times a day with many flowers.

original: myur du mnar med 'gro ba gang yin gang zhig bde mnyam ster byed bla ma skyo ba skyed pa bo //
analyzed: myur du mnar med 'gro ba gang yin gang zhig bde mnyam ster byed bla ma skyo ba skyed pa bo //
translated: The one who quickly goes to Avici is the one who causes weariness in the guru who gives the bliss of equality.

original: shes rab ye shes thob pa gang yin ma nyams gang zhig mchog gi bla ma'i zhabs ni mi spong ba //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes thob pa gang yin ma nyams gang zhig mchog gi bla ma'i zhabs ni mi spong ba //
translated: The one who has attained the wisdom of wisdom, the one who does not transgress, is the one who does not abandon the feet of the supreme guru.

original: nyams pa gang yin gang zhig rtsa gsum @184b dag la gnas pa'i rlung ni mtha' yas dus su bsad pa'o //
analyzed: nyams pa gang yin gang zhig rtsa gsum @184b dag la gnas pa'i rlung ni mtha' yas dus su bsad pa'o //
translated: The one who is destroyed is the one who kills the wind that resides in the three channels at all times.

original: dpa' bo gang yin gang zhig mnyam dang mi mnyam lam la srog dang thur sel rlung ni gsod byed pa'o //
analyzed: dpa' bo gang yin gang zhig mnyam dang mi mnyam lam la srog dang thur sel rlung ni gsod byed pa'o //
translated: The hero is the one who kills the life-force and downward-voiding winds on the path of even and uneven.

original: sbyin bdag gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla mar rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs thams cad ster //
analyzed: sbyin bdag gang yin gang zhig dpal ldan bla mar rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs thams cad ster //
translated: The benefactor is the one who gives his own body, children, wife, and all to the glorious guru.üîΩThe low-born is the one who is deceitful, his mind drawn by the sin of his own heart, and full of deceit.

original: ma rabs gang yin gang zhig slu byed rang gi snying gi sdig pas drangs pa'i sems dang g-yo sgyu can; ;dpal ldan dpal gyi chos kyi 'khor lo lha yi mchog gis btud pa'i gdan ni kha dog sna tshogs pa //
analyzed: ma rabs gang yin gang zhig slu byed rang gi snying gi sdig pas drangs pa'i sems dang g-yo sgyu can; ;dpal ldan dpal gyi chos kyi 'khor lo lha yi mchog gis btud pa'i gdan ni kha dog sna tshogs pa //
translated: The glorious Dharmacakra, the seat of the supreme god, is of various colors.

original: de la sangs rgyas lha dang mi yi bla ma nye bar bzhags pas zla ba'i zhu ba rtogs pa na //
analyzed: de la sangs rgyas lha dang mi yi bla ma nye bar bzhags pas zla ba'i zhu ba rtogs pa na //
translated: There, the Buddha, the guru of gods and humans, resides, and the moon's request is understood.

original: sems can don gyi slad du mi yi bdag po rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa gang //
analyzed: sems can don gyi slad du mi yi bdag po rgyud kyi rgyal po dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs pa gang //
translated: For the sake of sentient beings, the king of tantras, the first Buddha, is spoken by the lord of men.

original: de yang da lta bdag gis de rnams a'a li k'a li nyung ngu'i rgyud du bkod do nyi ma kye /
analyzed: de yang da lta bdag gis de rnams a'a li k'a li nyung ngu'i rgyud du bkod do nyi ma kye /
translated: Moreover, I have now set them down in the brief Tantra of the Ali Kali.

original: sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa dag las dus kyi 'khor lo bdag gis phreng 'dzin sdeb sbyor bcings pas brjod //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa dag las dus kyi 'khor lo bdag gis phreng 'dzin sdeb sbyor bcings pas brjod //
translated: O Sun! I, the holder of the garland, have bound them in the Wheel of Time, which was spoken by the Buddha.

original: padma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod kyis 'di ni sngags pa rnams la bstan pa nyid du mdzod //
analyzed: padma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod kyis 'di ni sngags pa rnams la bstan pa nyid du mdzod //
translated: O Vajra Holder, white lotus, you should teach this to the mantrins.

original: ji ltar nyi ma dang bcas thub pa'i rigs ni shes rab ye shes thob pa 'di las byung gyur pa //
analyzed: ji ltar nyi ma dang bcas thub pa'i rigs ni shes rab ye shes thob pa 'di las byung gyur pa //
translated: Just as the family of the Sage, together with the sun, has arisen from this attainment of the wisdom of insight,

original: rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin las de bzhin 'gyur bar shog /
analyzed: rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i drin las de bzhin 'gyur bar shog /
translated: may beings who dwell in the three worlds become like that through the kindness of the Wheel of Time.

original: nyi ma khyod dam mi dbang phyi mar gyur ba'i srid par dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor gcig las ni //
analyzed: nyi ma khyod dam mi dbang phyi mar gyur ba'i srid par dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor gcig las ni //
translated: O Sun! In your next existence as a lord of men, through the yoga of the Wheel of Time,

original: tshangs pa'i rigs 'di las skyes mi yi @185a *//
analyzed: tshangs pa'i rigs 'di las skyes mi yi @185a *//
translated: may you be born from this family of Brahma,üîΩand may you be a king of men.

original: bdag po grags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs bdag gi dga' ma ni //
analyzed: bdag po grags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs bdag gi dga' ma ni //
translated: I, the famous one, am born from Manjushri.

original: dpal ldan sgrol ma pad dkar can ni yon tan kun gter 'jig rten mgon po chu skyes mtshan ma can //üîΩautpal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin du ltos //
analyzed: dpal ldan sgrol ma pad dkar can ni yon tan kun gter 'jig rten mgon po chu skyes mtshan ma can // autpal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin du ltos //
translated: The glorious TƒÅrƒÅ with the white lotus is the treasure of all good qualities, the protector of the world, marked with the sign of the lotus.üîΩWith the stalk of the lotus, see the meaning of all existence, in oneself and others, just as it is.

original: autpal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin mthong nas //
analyzed: autpal sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin mthong nas //
translated: With the stalk of the lotus, having seen the meaning of all existence, in oneself and others, just as it is,

original: thub pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhan cig nyi mas cod pan bcas pa'i mgo dang lag pa dag gis ni //
analyzed: thub pa'i dbang po rnams dang lhan cig nyi mas cod pan bcas pa'i mgo dang lag pa dag gis ni //
translated: together with the lords of sages, with heads and hands holding the sun and the crown,

original: rigs ldan zhabs kyi padmar phyag dag 'tshal nas smras pa ston pa gcig pu mchog gi thugs rje yis //
analyzed: rigs ldan zhabs kyi padmar phyag dag 'tshal nas smras pa ston pa gcig pu mchog gi thugs rje yis //
translated: having bowed to the lotus feet of the one of the lineage, he said: ‚ÄúBy the compassion of the one teacher, the supreme one,

original: thub pa'i rigs ni 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las phyung nas ye shes lam la gzhag par mdzod //
analyzed: thub pa'i rigs ni 'jigs rung 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las phyung nas ye shes lam la gzhag par mdzod //
translated: having drawn out the lineage of sages from the terrifying suffering of sa·πÉsƒÅra, establish them on the path of wisdom.

original: khyod ni rgan yang gzhon nu mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras po yin yang thog mar dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod //
analyzed: khyod ni rgan yang gzhon nu mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras po yin yang thog mar dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod //
translated: You are old, but all the young are the sons of the Victorious Ones; you are the first Buddha, but you are the first Buddha.‚Äù

original: bud med sbyor zhing tshangs par spyod ldan mchog gi thugs rje dag gis 'jig rten gnyen te gshin rje'i dgra //
analyzed: bud med sbyor zhing tshangs par spyod ldan mchog gi thugs rje dag gis 'jig rten gnyen te gshin rje'i dgra //
translated: You are a friend to the world, a foe to the Lord of Death, a woman, yet endowed with the highest compassion and celibacy.

original: khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud //
analyzed: khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud //
translated: You are peaceful, yet you are the good vajra, the snatcher of the fear of death, you are always the demon of the demons.

original: khyod ni grol yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa khyod ni rab tu 'jug /
analyzed: khyod ni grol yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa khyod ni rab tu 'jug /
translated: You are liberated, yet you are famous in this existence, you are engaged for the sake of ripening beings.

original: tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btung bar gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar lhung //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i rigs las nyi ma bdag ni thub pa'i rigs kyis btung bar gyur pa zhabs kyi rtsa bar lhung //
translated: I, the sun, born from the Brahma family, have fallen at the root of the feet of the Sage, who has become my drink.

original: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du dus kyi 'khor lo @185b mtha' dag sa la rab tu gsal bar byas //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du dus kyi 'khor lo @185b mtha' dag sa la rab tu gsal bar byas //
translated: For the sake of the liberation of beings, you have fully illuminated the Wheel of Time on the earth.
